163std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> iuse_transform::clone() const
164{
165 return std::make_unique<iuse_transform>( *this );
166}
167
168void iuse_transform::load( const JsonObject &obj )
169{
170 obj.read( "target", target, true );
171
172 obj.read( "msg", msg_transform );
173 obj.read( "variant_type", variant_type );
174 obj.read( "container", container );
175 obj.read( "sealed", sealed );
176 if( obj.has_member( "target_charges" ) && obj.has_member( "rand_target_charges" ) ) {
177 obj.throw_error_at( "target_charges",
178 "Transform actor specified both fixed and random target charges" );
179 }
180 obj.read( "target_charges", ammo_qty );
181 if( obj.has_array( "rand_target_charges" ) ) {
182 for( const int charge : obj.get_array( "rand_target_charges" ) ) {
183 random_ammo_qty.push_back( charge );
184 }
185 if( random_ammo_qty.size() < 2 ) {
186 obj.throw_error_at( "rand_target_charges",
187 "You must specify two or more values to choose between" );
188 }
189 }
190 obj.read( "target_ammo", ammo_type );
191
192 obj.read( "target_timer", target_timer );
193
194 if( !ammo_type.is_empty() && !container.is_empty() ) {
195 obj.throw_error_at( "target_ammo", "Transform actor specified both ammo type and container type" );
196 }
197
198 obj.read( "active", active );
199
200 obj.read( "moves", moves );
201 if( moves < 0 ) {
202 obj.throw_error_at( "moves", "transform actor specified negative moves" );
203 }
204
205 obj.read( "need_fire", need_fire );
206 need_fire = std::max( need_fire, 0 );
207 if( !obj.read( "need_charges_msg", need_charges_msg ) ) {
208 need_charges_msg = to_translation( "The %s is empty!" );
209 }
210
211 obj.read( "need_charges", need_charges );
212 need_charges = std::max( need_charges, 0 );
213 if( !obj.read( "need_fire_msg", need_fire_msg ) ) {
214 need_fire_msg = to_translation( "You need a source of fire!" );
215 }
216
217 obj.read( "need_worn", need_worn );
218 obj.read( "need_wielding", need_wielding );
219
220 obj.read( "need_empty", need_empty );
221
222 obj.read( "qualities_needed", qualities_needed );
223
224 obj.read( "menu_text", menu_text );
225}
226
227std::optional<int> iuse_transform::use( Character *p, item &it, const tripoint & ) const
228{
229 int scale = 1;
230 auto iter = it.type->ammo_scale.find( type );
231 if( iter != it.type->ammo_scale.end() ) {
232 scale = iter->second;
233 }
234 if( !p ) {
235 debugmsg( "%s called action transform that requires character but no character is present",realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/iuse_actor.cpp"
, "236", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "%s called action transform that requires character but no character is present"
, it.typeId().str())
236 it.typeId().str() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/iuse_actor.cpp"
, "236", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "%s called action transform that requires character but no character is present"
, it.typeId().str());
237 return std::nullopt;
238 }
239
240 int result = 0;
241
242 if( need_fire ) {
243 if( !p->use_charges_if_avail( itype_fire, need_fire ) ) {
244 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, need_fire_msg, it.tname() );
245 return std::nullopt;
246 }
247 if( p->cant_do_underwater() ) {
248 return std::nullopt;
249 }
250 }
251
252 if( !msg_transform.empty() ) {
253 p->add_msg_if_player( m_neutral, msg_transform, it.tname() );
254 }
255
256 p->moves -= moves;
257
258 if( need_fire && p->has_trait( trait_PYROMANIA ) ) {
259 if( one_in( 2 ) ) {
260 p->add_msg_if_player( m_mixed,
261 _( "You light a fire, but it isn't enough. You need to light more." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You light a fire, but it isn't enough. You need to light more."
) ) ) );
262 } else {
263 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You happily light a fire." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You happily light a fire." )
) ) );
264 p->add_morale( MORALE_PYROMANIA_STARTFIRE, 5, 10, 3_hours, 2_hours );
265 p->rem_morale( MORALE_PYROMANIA_NOFIRE );
266 }
267 }
268
269 if( it.count_by_charges() != target->count_by_charges() && it.count() > 1 ) {
270 item take_one = it.split( 1 );
271 do_transform( p, take_one, variant_type );
272 p->i_add_or_drop( take_one );
273 } else {
274 do_transform( p, it, variant_type );
275 }
276
277 if( it.is_tool() ) {
278 result = scale;
279 }
280 return result;
281}
282
283void iuse_transform::do_transform( Character *p, item &it, const std::string &variant_type ) const
284{
285 item obj_copy( it );
286 item *obj;
287 // defined here to allow making a new item assigned to the pointer
288 item obj_it;
289 if( container.is_empty() ) {
290 obj = &it.convert( target, p );
291 obj->set_itype_variant( variant_type );
292 if( ammo_qty >= 0 || !random_ammo_qty.empty() ) {
293 int qty;
294 if( !random_ammo_qty.empty() ) {
295 const int index = rng( 1, random_ammo_qty.size() - 1 );
296 qty = rng( random_ammo_qty[index - 1], random_ammo_qty[index] );
297 } else {
298 qty = ammo_qty;
299 }
300 if( !ammo_type.is_empty() ) {
301 obj->ammo_set( ammo_type, qty );
302 } else if( obj->is_ammo() ) {
303 obj->charges = qty;
304 } else if( !obj->ammo_current().is_null() ) {
305 obj->ammo_set( obj->ammo_current(), qty );
306 } else if( obj->has_flag( flag_RADIO_ACTIVATION ) && obj->has_flag( flag_BOMB ) ) {
307 obj->set_countdown( 1 );
308 } else {
309 obj->set_countdown( qty );
310 }
311 }
312 } else {
313 obj = &it.convert( container, p );
314 obj->set_itype_variant( variant_type );
315 int count = std::max( ammo_qty, 1 );
316 item cont;
317 if( target->count_by_charges() ) {
318 cont = item( target, calendar::turn, count );
319 count = 1;
320 } else {
321 cont = item( target, calendar::turn );
322 }
323 for( int i = 0; i < count; i++ ) {
324 if( !it.put_in( cont, pocket_type::CONTAINER ).success() ) {
325 it.put_in( cont, pocket_type::MIGRATION );
326 }
327 }
328 if( sealed ) {
329 it.seal();
330 }
331 }
332
333 if( target_timer > 0_seconds ) {
334 obj->countdown_point = calendar::turn + target_timer;
335 }
336 obj->active = active || obj->has_temperature() || target_timer > 0_seconds;
337 if( p && p->is_worn( *obj ) ) {
338 if( !obj->is_armor() ) {
339 item_location il = item_location( *p, obj );
340 p->takeoff( il );
341 } else {
342 p->calc_encumbrance();
343 p->update_bodytemp();
344 p->on_worn_item_transform( obj_copy, *obj );
345 }
346 }
347}
348
349ret_val<void> iuse_transform::can_use( const Character &p, const item &it,
350 const tripoint & ) const
351{
352 if( need_worn && !p.is_worn( it ) ) {
353 return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "You need to wear the %1$s before activating it." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You need to wear the %1$s before activating it."
) ) ),
354 it.tname() );
355 }
356 if( need_wielding && !p.is_wielding( it ) ) {
357 return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "You need to wield the %1$s before activating it." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You need to wield the %1$s before activating it."
) ) ),
358 it.tname() );
359 }
360 if( need_empty && !it.empty() ) {
361 return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "You need to empty the %1$s before activating it." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You need to empty the %1$s before activating it."
) ) ),
362 it.tname() );
363 }
364
365 if( p.is_worn( it ) ) {
366 item tmp = item( target );
367 if( !tmp.has_flag( flag_OVERSIZE ) && !tmp.has_flag( flag_SEMITANGIBLE ) ) {
368 for( const trait_id &mut : p.get_mutations() ) {
369 const mutation_branch &branch = mut.obj();
370 if( branch.conflicts_with_item( tmp ) ) {
371 return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "Your %1$s mutation prevents you from doing that." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your %1$s mutation prevents you from doing that."
) ) ),
372 p.mutation_name( mut ) );
373 }
374 }
375 }
376 }
377
378 if( need_charges && it.ammo_remaining( &p, true ) < need_charges ) {
379 return ret_val<void>::make_failure( string_format( need_charges_msg, it.tname() ) );
380 }
381
382 if( qualities_needed.empty() ) {
383 return ret_val<void>::make_success();
384 }
385
386 std::map<quality_id, int> unmet_reqs;
387 inventory inv;
388 inv.form_from_map( p.pos(), 1, &p, true, true );
389 for( const auto &quality : qualities_needed ) {
390 if( !p.has_quality( quality.first, quality.second ) &&
391 !inv.has_quality( quality.first, quality.second ) ) {
392 unmet_reqs.insert( quality );
393 }
394 }
395 if( unmet_reqs.empty() ) {
396 return ret_val<void>::make_success();
397 }
398 std::string unmet_reqs_string = enumerate_as_string( unmet_reqs.begin(), unmet_reqs.end(),
399 [&]( const std::pair<quality_id, int> &unmet_req ) {
400 return string_format( "%s %d", unmet_req.first.obj().name, unmet_req.second );
401 } );
402 return ret_val<void>::make_failure( n_gettext( "You need a tool with %s.",
403 "You need tools with %s.",
404 unmet_reqs.size() ), unmet_reqs_string );
405}
406
407std::string iuse_transform::get_name() const
408{
409 if( !menu_text.empty() ) {
410 return menu_text.translated();
411 }
412 return iuse_actor::get_name();
413}
414
415void iuse_transform::finalize( const itype_id & )
416{
417 if( !item::type_is_defined( target ) ) {
418 debugmsg( "Invalid transform target: %s", target.c_str() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/iuse_actor.cpp"
, "418", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Invalid transform target: %s",
target.c_str());
419 }
420
421 if( !container.is_empty() ) {
422 if( !item::type_is_defined( container ) ) {
423 debugmsg( "Invalid transform container: %s", container.c_str() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/iuse_actor.cpp"
, "423", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Invalid transform container: %s"
, container.c_str());
424 }
425
426 // todo: check contents fit container?
427 // transform uses migration pocket if not
428 }
429}
430
431void iuse_transform::info( const item &it, std::vector<iteminfo> &dump ) const
432{
433 item dummy( target, calendar::turn, std::max( ammo_qty, 1 ) );
434 dummy.set_itype_variant( variant_type );
435 // If the variant is to be randomized, use default no-variant name
436 if( variant_type == "<any>" ) {
437 dummy.clear_itype_variant();
438 }
439 if( it.has_flag( flag_FIT ) ) {
440 dummy.set_flag( flag_FIT );
441 }
442 dump.emplace_back( "TOOL", string_format( _( "<bold>Turns into</bold>: %s" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<bold>Turns into</bold>: %s"
) ) ),
443 dummy.tname() ) );
444
445 if( target_timer > 0_seconds ) {
446 dump.emplace_back( "TOOL", _( "Countdown: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Countdown: " ) ) ), to_seconds<int>( target_timer ) );
447 }
448
449 const auto *explosion_use = dummy.get_use( "explosion" );
450 if( explosion_use != nullptr ) {
451 explosion_use->get_actor_ptr()->info( it, dump );
452 }
453}
454
455std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> unpack_actor::clone() const
456{
457 return std::make_unique<unpack_actor>( *this );
458}
459
460void unpack_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
461{
462 obj.read( "group", unpack_group );
463 obj.read( "items_fit", items_fit );
464 assign( obj, "filthy_volume_threshold", filthy_vol_threshold );
465}
466
467std::optional<int> unpack_actor::use( Character *p, item &it, const tripoint & ) const
468{
469 std::vector<item> items = item_group::items_from( unpack_group, calendar::turn );
470 item last_armor;
471
472 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You unpack the %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You unpack the %s." ) ) ), it.tname() );
473
474 map &here = get_map();
475 for( item &content : items ) {
476 if( content.is_armor() ) {
477 if( items_fit ) {
478 content.set_flag( flag_FIT );
479 } else if( content.typeId() == last_armor.typeId() ) {
480 if( last_armor.has_flag( flag_FIT ) ) {
481 content.set_flag( flag_FIT );
482 } else if( !last_armor.has_flag( flag_FIT ) ) {
483 content.unset_flag( flag_FIT );
484 }
485 }
486 last_armor = content;
487 }
488
489 if( content.get_total_capacity() >= filthy_vol_threshold &&
490 it.has_flag( flag_FILTHY ) ) {
491 content.set_flag( flag_FILTHY );
492 }
493
494 here.add_item_or_charges( p->pos(), content );
495 }
496
497 p->i_rem( &it );
498
499 return 0;
500}
501
502void unpack_actor::info( const item &, std::vector<iteminfo> &dump ) const
503{
504 dump.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
505 _( "This item could be unpacked to receive something." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "This item could be unpacked to receive something."
) ) ) );
506}
507
508std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> message_iuse::clone() const
509{
510 return std::make_unique<message_iuse>( *this );
511}
512
513void message_iuse::load( const JsonObject &obj )
514{
515 obj.read( "name", name );
516 obj.read( "message", message );
517}
518
519std::optional<int> message_iuse::use( Character *p, item &it,
520 const tripoint &pos ) const
521{
522 if( !p ) {
523 return std::nullopt;
524 }
525
526 if( p->sees( pos ) && !message.empty() ) {
527 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, message.translated(), it.tname() );
528 }
529
530 return 0;
531}
532
533std::string message_iuse::get_name() const
534{
535 if( !name.empty() ) {
536 return name.translated();
537 }
538 return iuse_actor::get_name();
539}
540
541std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> sound_iuse::clone() const
542{
543 return std::make_unique<sound_iuse>( *this );
544}
545
546void sound_iuse::load( const JsonObject &obj )
547{
548 obj.read( "name", name );
549 obj.read( "sound_message", sound_message );
550 obj.read( "sound_volume", sound_volume );
551 obj.read( "sound_id", sound_id );
552 obj.read( "sound_variant", sound_variant );
553}
554
555std::optional<int> sound_iuse::use( Character *, item &,
556 const tripoint &pos ) const
557{
558 sounds::sound( pos, sound_volume, sounds::sound_t::alarm, sound_message.translated(), true,
559 sound_id, sound_variant );
560 return 0;
561}
562
563std::string sound_iuse::get_name() const
564{
565 if( !name.empty() ) {
566 return name.translated();
567 }
568 return iuse_actor::get_name();
569}
570
571std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> explosion_iuse::clone() const
572{
573 return std::make_unique<explosion_iuse>( *this );
574}
575
576// For an explosion (which releases some kind of gas), this function
577// calculates the points around that explosion where to create those
578// gas fields.
579// Those points must have a clear line of sight and a clear path to
580// the center of the explosion.
581// They must also be passable.
582static std::vector<tripoint> points_for_gas_cloud( const tripoint &center, int radius )
583{
584 map &here = get_map();
585 std::vector<tripoint> result;
586 for( const tripoint &p : closest_points_first( center, radius ) ) {
587 if( here.impassable( p ) ) {
588 continue;
589 }
590 if( p != center ) {
591 if( !here.clear_path( center, p, radius, 1, 100 ) ) {
592 // Can not splatter gas from center to that point, something is in the way
593 continue;
594 }
595 }
596 result.push_back( p );
597 }
598 return result;
599}
600
601void explosion_iuse::load( const JsonObject &obj )
602{
603 if( obj.has_object( "explosion" ) ) {
604 JsonObject expl = obj.get_object( "explosion" );
605 explosion = load_explosion_data( expl );
606 }
607
608 obj.read( "draw_explosion_radius", draw_explosion_radius );
609 if( obj.has_member( "draw_explosion_color" ) ) {
610 draw_explosion_color = color_from_string( obj.get_string( "draw_explosion_color" ) );
611 }
612 obj.read( "do_flashbang", do_flashbang );
613 obj.read( "flashbang_player_immune", flashbang_player_immune );
614 obj.read( "fields_radius", fields_radius );
615 if( obj.has_member( "fields_type" ) || fields_radius > 0 ) {
616 fields_type = field_type_id( obj.get_string( "fields_type" ) );
617 }
618 obj.read( "fields_min_intensity", fields_min_intensity );
619 obj.read( "fields_max_intensity", fields_max_intensity );
620 if( fields_max_intensity == 0 ) {
621 fields_max_intensity = fields_type.obj().get_max_intensity();
622 }
623 obj.read( "emp_blast_radius", emp_blast_radius );
624 obj.read( "scrambler_blast_radius", scrambler_blast_radius );
625}
626
627std::optional<int> explosion_iuse::use( Character *p, item &, const tripoint &pos ) const
628{
629 if( explosion.power >= 0.0f ) {
630 explosion_handler::explosion( p, pos, explosion );
631 }
632
633 if( draw_explosion_radius >= 0 ) {
634 explosion_handler::draw_explosion( pos, draw_explosion_radius, draw_explosion_color );
635 }
636 if( do_flashbang ) {
637 explosion_handler::flashbang( pos, flashbang_player_immune );
638 }
639 map &here = get_map();
640 if( fields_radius >= 0 && fields_type.id() ) {
641 std::vector<tripoint> gas_sources = points_for_gas_cloud( pos, fields_radius );
642 for( tripoint &gas_source : gas_sources ) {
643 const int field_intensity = rng( fields_min_intensity, fields_max_intensity );
644 here.add_field( gas_source, fields_type, field_intensity, 1_turns );
645 }
646 }
647 if( scrambler_blast_radius >= 0 ) {
648 for( const tripoint &dest : here.points_in_radius( pos, scrambler_blast_radius ) ) {
649 explosion_handler::scrambler_blast( dest );
650 }
651 }
652 if( emp_blast_radius >= 0 ) {
653 for( const tripoint &dest : here.points_in_radius( pos, emp_blast_radius ) ) {
654 explosion_handler::emp_blast( dest );
655 }
656 }
657 return 1;
658}
659
660void explosion_iuse::info( const item &, std::vector<iteminfo> &dump ) const
661{
662 if( explosion.power <= 0 ) {
663 // TODO: List other effects, like EMP and clouds
664 return;
665 }
666
667 dump.emplace_back( "TOOL", _( "Power at epicenter: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Power at epicenter: " ) ) ), explosion.power );
668 const shrapnel_data &sd = explosion.shrapnel;
669 if( sd.casing_mass > 0 ) {
670 dump.emplace_back( "TOOL", _( "Casing mass: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Casing mass: " ) ) ), sd.casing_mass );
671 dump.emplace_back( "TOOL", _( "Fragment mass: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Fragment mass: " ) ) ), string_format( "%.2f",
672 sd.fragment_mass ) );
673 }
674}
675
676std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> consume_drug_iuse::clone() const
677{
678 return std::make_unique<consume_drug_iuse>( *this );
679}
680
681static effect_data load_effect_data( const JsonObject &e )
682{
683 time_duration time;
684 if( e.has_string( "duration" ) ) {
685 time = read_from_json_string<time_duration>( e.get_member( "duration" ), time_duration::units );
686 } else {
687 time = time_duration::from_turns( e.get_int( "duration", 0 ) );
688 }
689 return effect_data( efftype_id( e.get_string( "id" ) ), time,
690 bodypart_id( e.get_string( "bp", "bp_null" ) ), e.get_bool( "permanent", false ) );
691}
692
693void consume_drug_iuse::load( const JsonObject &obj )
694{
695 obj.read( "activation_message", activation_message );
696 obj.read( "charges_needed", charges_needed );
697 obj.read( "tools_needed", tools_needed );
698
699 if( obj.has_array( "effects" ) ) {
700 for( const JsonObject e : obj.get_array( "effects" ) ) {
701 effects.push_back( load_effect_data( e ) );
702 }
703 }
704 optional( obj, false, "damage_over_time", damage_over_time );
705 obj.read( "stat_adjustments", stat_adjustments );
706 obj.read( "fields_produced", fields_produced );
707 obj.read( "moves", moves );
708
709 for( JsonArray vit : obj.get_array( "vitamins" ) ) {
710 int lo = vit.get_int( 1 );
711 int hi = vit.size() >= 3 ? vit.get_int( 2 ) : lo;
712 vitamins.emplace( vitamin_id( vit.get_string( 0 ) ), std::make_pair( lo, hi ) );
713 }
714
715 used_up_item = obj.get_string( "used_up_item", used_up_item );
716
717}
718
719void consume_drug_iuse::info( const item &, std::vector<iteminfo> &dump ) const
720{
721 const std::string vits = enumerate_as_string( vitamins.begin(), vitamins.end(),
722 []( const decltype( vitamins )::value_type & v ) {
723 const time_duration rate = get_player_character().vitamin_rate( v.first );
724 if( rate <= 0_turns ) {
725 return std::string();
726 }
727
728 const int lo = v.second.first;
729 const int hi = v.second.second;
730
731 if( v.first->type() == vitamin_type::VITAMIN ) {
732 return string_format( lo == hi ? "%s (%i%%)" : "%s (%i-%i%%)", v.first.obj().name(), lo, hi );
733 }
734 return string_format( lo == hi ? "%s (%i U)" : "%s (%i-%i U)", v.first.obj().name(), lo, hi );
735 } );
736
737 if( !vits.empty() ) {
738 dump.emplace_back( "TOOL", _( "Vitamins (RDA) and Compounds (U): " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Vitamins (RDA) and Compounds (U): "
) ) ), vits );
739 }
740
741 if( tools_needed.count( itype_syringe ) ) {
742 dump.emplace_back( "TOOL", _( "You need a <info>syringe</info> to inject this drug." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You need a <info>syringe</info> to inject this drug."
) ) ) );
743 }
744}
745
746std::optional<int> consume_drug_iuse::use( Character *p, item &it, const tripoint & ) const
747{
748 auto need_these = tools_needed;
749
750 // Check prerequisites first.
751 for( const auto &tool : need_these ) {
752 if( !p->has_amount( tool.first, 1 ) ) {
753 p->add_msg_player_or_say( _( "You need %1$s to consume %2$s!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You need %1$s to consume %2$s!"
) ) ),
754 _( "I need a %1$s to consume %2$s!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "I need a %1$s to consume %2$s!"
) ) ),
755 item::nname( tool.first ),
756 it.type_name( 1 ) );
757 return std::nullopt;
758 }
759 }
760 for( const auto &consumable : charges_needed ) {
761 // Amount == -1 means need one, but don't consume it.
762 if( !p->has_charges( consumable.first, ( consumable.second == -1 ) ?
763 1 : consumable.second ) ) {
764 p->add_msg_player_or_say( _( "You need %1$s to consume %2$s!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You need %1$s to consume %2$s!"
) ) ),
765 _( "I need a %1$s to consume %2$s!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "I need a %1$s to consume %2$s!"
) ) ),
766 item::nname( consumable.first ),
767 it.type_name( 1 ) );
768 return std::nullopt;
769 }
770 }
771 // Apply the various effects.
772 for( const effect_data &eff : effects ) {
773 time_duration dur = eff.duration;
774 if( p->has_trait( trait_TOLERANCE ) ) {
775 dur *= .8;
776 } else if( p->has_trait( trait_LIGHTWEIGHT ) ) {
777 dur *= 1.2;
778 }
779 p->add_effect( eff.id, dur, eff.bp, eff.permanent );
780 }
781 //Apply the various damage_over_time
782 for( const damage_over_time_data &Dot : damage_over_time ) {
783 p->add_damage_over_time( Dot );
784 }
785 for( const auto &stat_adjustment : stat_adjustments ) {
786 p->mod_stat( stat_adjustment.first, stat_adjustment.second );
787 }
788 map &here = get_map();
789 for( const auto &field : fields_produced ) {
790 const field_type_id fid = field_type_id( field.first );
791 for( int i = 0; i < 3; i++ ) {
792 point offset( rng( -2, 2 ), rng( -2, 2 ) );
793 here.add_field( p->pos_bub() + offset, fid, field.second );
794 }
795 }
796
797 for( const auto &v : vitamins ) {
798 const int lo = v.first->RDA_to_default( v.second.first );
799 const int high = v.first->RDA_to_default( v.second.second );
800
801 // have to update the daily estimate with the vitamins from the drug as well
802 p->daily_vitamins[v.first].first += lo;
803
804 p->vitamin_mod( v.first, rng( lo, high ) );
805 }
806
807 // Output message.
808 p->add_msg_if_player( activation_message.translated(), it.type_name( 1 ) );
809 // Consume charges.
810 for( const auto &consumable : charges_needed ) {
811 if( consumable.second != -1 ) {
812 p->use_charges( consumable.first, consumable.second );
813 }
814 }
815
816 if( !used_up_item.empty() ) {
817 item used_up( used_up_item, it.birthday() );
818 p->i_add_or_drop( used_up );
819 }
820
821 p->moves -= moves;
822 return 1;
823}
824
825std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> delayed_transform_iuse::clone() const
826{
827 return std::make_unique<delayed_transform_iuse>( *this );
828}
829
830void delayed_transform_iuse::load( const JsonObject &obj )
831{
832 iuse_transform::load( obj );
833 obj.get_member( "not_ready_msg" ).read( not_ready_msg );
834 transform_age = obj.get_int( "transform_age" );
835}
836
837int delayed_transform_iuse::time_to_do( const item &it ) const
838{
839 // TODO: change return type to time_duration
840 return transform_age - to_turns<int>( it.age() );
841}
842
843std::optional<int> delayed_transform_iuse::use( Character *p, item &it,
844 const tripoint &pos ) const
845{
846 if( time_to_do( it ) > 0 ) {
847 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, "%s", not_ready_msg );
848 return std::nullopt;
849 }
850 return iuse_transform::use( p, it, pos );
851}
852
853std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> place_monster_iuse::clone() const
854{
855 return std::make_unique<place_monster_iuse>( *this );
856}
857
858void place_monster_iuse::load( const JsonObject &obj )
859{
860 mtypeid = mtype_id( obj.get_string( "monster_id" ) );
861 obj.read( "friendly_msg", friendly_msg );
862 obj.read( "hostile_msg", hostile_msg );
863 obj.read( "difficulty", difficulty );
864 obj.read( "moves", moves );
865 obj.read( "place_randomly", place_randomly );
866 obj.read( "is_pet", is_pet );
867 obj.read( "need_charges", need_charges );
868 need_charges = std::max( need_charges, 0 );
869
870 if( obj.has_array( "skills" ) ) {
871 JsonArray skills_ja = obj.get_array( "skills" );
872 for( JsonValue s : skills_ja ) {
873 skills.emplace( s.get_string() );
874 }
875 }
876}
877
878std::optional<int> place_monster_iuse::use( Character *p, item &it, const tripoint & ) const
879{
880 if( it.ammo_remaining() < need_charges ) {
881 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "This requires %d charges to activate." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "This requires %d charges to activate."
) ) ), need_charges );
882 return std::nullopt;
883 }
884
885 shared_ptr_fast<monster> newmon_ptr = make_shared_fast<monster>( mtypeid );
886 monster &newmon = *newmon_ptr;
887 newmon.init_from_item( it );
888 if( place_randomly ) {
889 // place_critter_around returns the same pointer as its parameter (or null)
890 if( !g->place_critter_around( newmon_ptr, p->pos(), 1 ) ) {
891 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "There is no adjacent square to release the %s in!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "There is no adjacent square to release the %s in!"
) ) ),
892 newmon.name() );
893 return std::nullopt;
894 }
895 } else {
896 const std::string query = string_format( _( "Place the %s where?" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Place the %s where?" ) ) ), newmon.name() );
897 const std::optional<tripoint> pnt_ = choose_adjacent( query );
898 if( !pnt_ ) {
899 return std::nullopt;
900 }
901 // place_critter_at returns the same pointer as its parameter (or null)
902 if( !g->place_critter_at( newmon_ptr, *pnt_ ) ) {
903 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You cannot place a %s there." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You cannot place a %s there."
) ) ), newmon.name() );
904 return std::nullopt;
905 }
906 }
907 p->moves -= moves;
908
909 newmon.ammo = newmon.type->starting_ammo;
910 if( !newmon.has_flag( mon_flag_INTERIOR_AMMO ) ) {
911 for( std::pair<const itype_id, int> &amdef : newmon.ammo ) {
912 item ammo_item( amdef.first, calendar::turn_zero );
913 const int available = p->charges_of( amdef.first );
914 if( available == 0 ) {
915 amdef.second = 0;
916 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info,
917 _( "If you had standard factory-built %1$s bullets, you could load the %2$s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "If you had standard factory-built %1$s bullets, you could load the %2$s."
) ) ),
918 ammo_item.type_name( 2 ), newmon.name() );
919 continue;
920 }
921 // Don't load more than the default from the monster definition.
922 ammo_item.charges = std::min( available, amdef.second );
923 p->use_charges( amdef.first, ammo_item.charges );
924 //~ First %s is the ammo item (with plural form and count included), second is the monster name
925 p->add_msg_if_player( n_gettext( "You load %1$d x %2$s round into the %3$s.",
926 "You load %1$d x %2$s rounds into the %3$s.", ammo_item.charges ),
927 ammo_item.charges, ammo_item.type_name( ammo_item.charges ),
928 newmon.name() );
929 amdef.second = ammo_item.charges;
930 }
931 }
932
933 float skill_offset = 0;
934 for( const skill_id &sk : skills ) {
935 skill_offset += p->get_skill_level( sk ) / 2.0f;
936 }
937 /** @EFFECT_INT increases chance of a placed turret being friendly */
938 if( rng( 0, p->int_cur / 2 ) + skill_offset < rng( 0, difficulty ) ) {
939 if( hostile_msg.empty() ) {
940 p->add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "You deploy the %s wrong. It is hostile!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You deploy the %s wrong. It is hostile!"
) ) ), newmon.name() );
941 } else {
942 p->add_msg_if_player( m_bad, "%s", hostile_msg );
943 }
944 } else {
945 if( friendly_msg.empty() ) {
946 p->add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "You deploy the %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You deploy the %s." ) ) ), newmon.name() );
947 } else {
948 p->add_msg_if_player( m_warning, "%s", friendly_msg );
949 }
950 newmon.friendly = -1;
951 if( is_pet ) {
952 newmon.add_effect( effect_pet, 1_turns, true );
953 }
954 }
955 return 1;
956}
957
958std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> place_npc_iuse::clone() const
959{
960 return std::make_unique<place_npc_iuse>( *this );
961}
962
963void place_npc_iuse::load( const JsonObject &obj )
964{
965 npc_class_id = string_id<npc_template>( obj.get_string( "npc_class_id" ) );
966 obj.read( "summon_msg", summon_msg );
967 obj.read( "moves", moves );
968 obj.read( "place_randomly", place_randomly );
969}
970
971std::optional<int> place_npc_iuse::use( Character *p, item &, const tripoint & ) const
972{
973 map &here = get_map();
974 const tripoint_range<tripoint> target_range = place_randomly ?
975 points_in_radius( p->pos(), radius ) :
976 points_in_radius( choose_adjacent( _( "Place npc where?" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Place npc where?" ) ) ) ).value_or( p->pos() ), 0 );
977
978 const std::optional<tripoint> target_pos =
979 random_point( target_range, [&here]( const tripoint & t ) {
980 return here.passable( t ) && here.has_floor_or_support( t ) &&
981 !get_creature_tracker().creature_at( t );
982 } );
983
984 if( !target_pos.has_value() ) {
985 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "There is no square to spawn npc in!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "There is no square to spawn npc in!"
) ) ) );
986 return std::nullopt;
987 }
988
989 here.place_npc( target_pos.value().xy(), npc_class_id );
990 p->mod_moves( -moves );
991 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, "%s", summon_msg );
992 return 1;
993}
994
995std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> deploy_furn_actor::clone() const
996{
997 return std::make_unique<deploy_furn_actor>( *this );
998}
999
1000void deploy_furn_actor::info( const item &, std::vector<iteminfo> &dump ) const
1001{
1002 std::vector<std::string> can_function_as;
1003 const furn_t &the_furn = furn_type.obj();
1004 const std::string furn_name = the_furn.name();
1005
1006 if( the_furn.workbench ) {
1007 can_function_as.emplace_back( _( "a <info>crafting station</info>" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "a <info>crafting station</info>"
) ) ) );
1008 }
1009 if( the_furn.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_BUTCHER_EQ ) ) {
1010 can_function_as.emplace_back(
1011 _( "a place to hang <info>corpses for butchering</info>" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "a place to hang <info>corpses for butchering</info>"
) ) ) );
1012 }
1013 if( the_furn.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_FLAT_SURF ) ) {
1014 can_function_as.emplace_back(
1015 _( "a flat surface to <info>butcher</info> onto or <info>eat meals</info> from" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "a flat surface to <info>butcher</info> onto or <info>eat meals</info> from"
) ) ) );
1016 }
1017 if( the_furn.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_CAN_SIT ) ) {
1018 can_function_as.emplace_back( _( "a place to <info>sit</info>" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "a place to <info>sit</info>"
) ) ) );
1019 }
1020 if( the_furn.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_HIDE_PLACE ) ) {
1021 can_function_as.emplace_back( _( "a place to <info>hide</info>" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "a place to <info>hide</info>"
) ) ) );
1022 }
1023 if( the_furn.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_FIRE_CONTAINER ) ) {
1024 can_function_as.emplace_back( _( "a safe place to <info>contain a fire</info>" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "a safe place to <info>contain a fire</info>"
) ) ) );
1025 }
1026 if( the_furn.crafting_pseudo_item == itype_char_smoker ) {
1027 can_function_as.emplace_back( _( "a place to <info>smoke or dry food</info> for preservation" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "a place to <info>smoke or dry food</info> for preservation"
) ) ) );
1028 }
1029
1030 if( can_function_as.empty() ) {
1031 dump.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
1032 string_format( _( "Can be <info>activated</info> to deploy as furniture (<stat>%s</stat>)." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Can be <info>activated</info> to deploy as furniture (<stat>%s</stat>)."
) ) ),
1033 furn_name ) );
1034 } else {
1035 std::string furn_usages = enumerate_as_string( can_function_as, enumeration_conjunction::or_ );
1036 dump.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
1037 string_format(
1038 _( "Can be <info>activated</info> to deploy as furniture (<stat>%s</stat>), which can then be used as %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Can be <info>activated</info> to deploy as furniture (<stat>%s</stat>), which can then be used as %s."
) ) ),
1039 furn_name, furn_usages ) );
1040 }
1041}
1042
1043void deploy_furn_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
1044{
1045 furn_type = furn_str_id( obj.get_string( "furn_type" ) );
1046}
1047
1048
1049static ret_val<tripoint> check_deploy_square( Character *p, item &it, const tripoint &pos )
1050{
1051 if( p->cant_do_mounted() ) {
1052 return ret_val<tripoint>::make_failure( pos );
1053 }
1054 tripoint pnt = pos;
1055 if( pos == p->pos() ) {
1056 if( const std::optional<tripoint> pnt_ = choose_adjacent( _( "Deploy where?" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Deploy where?" ) ) ) ) ) {
1057 pnt = *pnt_;
1058 } else {
1059 return ret_val<tripoint>::make_failure( pos );
1060 }
1061 }
1062
1063 if( pnt == p->pos() ) {
1064 return ret_val<tripoint>::make_failure( pos,
1065 _( "You attempt to become one with the %s. It doesn't work." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You attempt to become one with the %s. It doesn't work."
) ) ), it.tname() );
1066 }
1067
1068 map &here = get_map();
1069 optional_vpart_position veh_there = here.veh_at( pnt );
1070 if( veh_there.has_value() ) {
1071 // TODO: check for protrusion+short furniture, wheels+tiny furniture, NOCOLLIDE flag, etc.
1072 // and/or integrate furniture deployment with construction (which already seems to perform these checks sometimes?)
1073 return ret_val<tripoint>::make_failure( pos,
1074 _( "The space under %s is too cramped to deploy a %s in." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "The space under %s is too cramped to deploy a %s in."
) ) ),
1075 veh_there.value().vehicle().disp_name(), it.tname() );
1076 }
1077
1078 // For example: dirt = 2, long grass = 3
1079 if( here.move_cost( pnt ) != 2 && here.move_cost( pnt ) != 3 ) {
1080 return ret_val<tripoint>::make_failure( pos, _( "You can't deploy a %s there." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You can't deploy a %s there."
) ) ), it.tname() );
1081 }
1082
1083 if( here.has_furn( pnt ) ) {
1084 return ret_val<tripoint>::make_failure( pos, _( "The %s at that location is blocking the %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "The %s at that location is blocking the %s."
) ) ),
1085 here.furnname( pnt ), it.tname() );
1086 }
1087
1088 if( here.has_items( pnt ) ) {
1089 // Check that there are no other people's belongings in the place where the furniture is placed.
1090 // Avoid easy theft of NPC items (e.g. carton theft).
1091 map &temp = get_map();
1092 for( item &i : temp.i_at( pnt ) ) {
1093 if( !i.is_owned_by( *p, true ) ) {
1094 return ret_val<tripoint>::make_failure( pos,
1095 _( "You can't deploy the %s on other people's belongings!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You can't deploy the %s on other people's belongings!"
) ) ), it.tname() );
1096 }
1097 }
1098
1099 // Check that there is no liquid on the floor.
1100 // If there is, it needs to be mopped dry with a mop.
1101 if( here.terrain_moppable( tripoint_bub_ms( pnt ) ) ) {
1102 if( get_avatar().crafting_inventory().has_quality( qual_MOP ) ) {
1103 here.mop_spills( tripoint_bub_ms( pnt ) );
1104 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You mopped up the spill with a nearby mop when deploying a %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You mopped up the spill with a nearby mop when deploying a %s."
) ) ),
1105 it.tname() );
1106 p->moves -= 15;
1107 } else {
1108 return ret_val<tripoint>::make_failure( pos,
1109 _( "You need a mop to clean up liquids before deploying the %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You need a mop to clean up liquids before deploying the %s."
) ) ), it.tname() );
1110 }
1111 }
1112 }
1113
1114 return ret_val<tripoint>::make_success( pnt );
1115}
1116
1117std::optional<int> deploy_furn_actor::use( Character *p, item &it,
1118 const tripoint &pos ) const
1119{
1120 ret_val<tripoint> suitable = check_deploy_square( p, it, pos );
1121 if( !suitable.success() ) {
1122 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, suitable.str() );
1123 return std::nullopt;
1124 }
1125
1126 get_map().furn_set( suitable.value(), furn_type );
1127 it.spill_contents( suitable.value() );
1128 p->mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 2_seconds ) );
1129 return 1;
1130}
1131
1132std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> deploy_appliance_actor::clone() const
1133{
1134 return std::make_unique<deploy_appliance_actor>( *this );
1135}
1136
1137void deploy_appliance_actor::info( const item &, std::vector<iteminfo> &dump ) const
1138{
1139 dump.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
1140 string_format( _( "Can be <info>activated</info> to deploy as an appliance (<stat>%s</stat>)." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Can be <info>activated</info> to deploy as an appliance (<stat>%s</stat>)."
) ) ),
1141 vpart_appliance_from_item( appliance_base )->name() ) );
1142}
1143
1144void deploy_appliance_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
1145{
1146 mandatory( obj, false, "base", appliance_base );
1147}
1148
1149std::optional<int> deploy_appliance_actor::use( Character *p, item &it, const tripoint &pos ) const
1150{
1151 ret_val<tripoint> suitable = check_deploy_square( p, it, pos );
1152 if( !suitable.success() ) {
1153 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, suitable.str() );
1154 return std::nullopt;
1155 }
1156
1157 place_appliance( suitable.value(), vpart_appliance_from_item( appliance_base ) );
1158 it.spill_contents( suitable.value() );
1159 p->mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 2_seconds ) );
1160 return 1;
1161}
1162
1163std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> reveal_map_actor::clone() const
1164{
1165 return std::make_unique<reveal_map_actor>( *this );
1166}
1167
1168void reveal_map_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
1169{
1170 radius = obj.get_int( "radius" );
1171 obj.get_member( "message" ).read( message );
1172 std::string ter;
1173 ot_match_type ter_match_type;
1174 for( const JsonValue entry : obj.get_array( "terrain" ) ) {
1175 if( entry.test_string() ) {
1176 ter = entry.get_string();
1177 ter_match_type = ot_match_type::contains;
1178 } else {
1179 JsonObject jo = entry.get_object();
1180 ter = jo.get_string( "om_terrain" );
1181 ter_match_type = jo.get_enum_value<ot_match_type>( "om_terrain_match_type",
1182 ot_match_type::contains );
1183 }
1184 omt_types.emplace_back( ter, ter_match_type );
1185 }
1186}
1187
1188void reveal_map_actor::reveal_targets( const tripoint_abs_omt &center,
1189 const std::pair<std::string, ot_match_type> &target,
1190 int reveal_distance ) const
1191{
1192 const auto places = overmap_buffer.find_all( center, target.first, radius, false,
1193 target.second );
1194 for( const tripoint_abs_omt &place : places ) {
1195 overmap_buffer.reveal( place, reveal_distance );
1196 // Should be replaced with the character using the item passed as an argument if NPCs ever learn to use maps
1197 get_avatar().map_revealed_omts.emplace( place );
1198 }
1199}
1200
1201std::optional<int> reveal_map_actor::use( Character *p, item &it, const tripoint & ) const
1202{
1203 if( it.already_used_by_player( *p ) ) {
1204 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "There isn't anything new on the %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "There isn't anything new on the %s."
) ) ), it.tname() );
1205 return std::nullopt;
1206 } else if( p->fine_detail_vision_mod() > 4 ) {
1207 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "It's too dark to read." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "It's too dark to read." ) ) ) );
1208 return std::nullopt;
1209 }
1210 const tripoint_abs_omt center( it.get_var( "reveal_map_center_omt",
1211 p->global_omt_location().raw() ) );
1212 // Clear highlight on previously revealed OMTs before revealing new ones
1213 p->map_revealed_omts.clear();
1214 for( const auto &omt : omt_types ) {
1215 for( int z = -OVERMAP_DEPTH; z <= OVERMAP_HEIGHT; z++ ) {
1216 reveal_targets( tripoint_abs_omt( center.xy(), z ), omt, 0 );
1217 }
1218 }
1219 if( !message.empty() ) {
1220 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, "%s", message );
1221 }
1222 it.mark_as_used_by_player( *p );
1223 return 0;
1224}
1225
1226void firestarter_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
1227{
1228 moves_cost_fast = obj.get_int( "moves", moves_cost_fast );
1229 moves_cost_slow = obj.get_int( "moves_slow", moves_cost_fast * 10 );
1230 need_sunlight = obj.get_bool( "need_sunlight", false );
1231}
1232
1233std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> firestarter_actor::clone() const
1234{
1235 return std::make_unique<firestarter_actor>( *this );
1236}
1237
1238bool firestarter_actor::prep_firestarter_use( const Character &p, tripoint_bub_ms &pos )
1239{
1240 // checks for fuel are handled by use and the activity, not here
1241 if( pos == p.pos_bub() ) {
1242 if( const std::optional<tripoint> pnt_ = choose_adjacent( _( "Light where?" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Light where?" ) ) ) ) ) {
1243 // TODO: fix point types
1244 pos = tripoint_bub_ms( *pnt_ );
1245 } else {
1246 return false;
1247 }
1248 }
1249 if( pos == p.pos_bub() ) {
1250 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You would set yourself on fire." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You would set yourself on fire."
) ) ) );
1251 p.add_msg_if_player( _( "But you're already smokin' hot." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "But you're already smokin' hot."
) ) ) );
1252 return false;
1253 }
1254 map &here = get_map();
1255 if( here.get_field( pos, fd_fire ) ) {
1256 // check if there's already a fire
1257 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "There is already a fire." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "There is already a fire." ) )
) );
1258 return false;
1259 }
1260 // check if there's a fire fuel source spot
1261 bool target_is_firewood = false;
1262 if( here.tr_at( pos ).id == tr_firewood_source ) {
1263 target_is_firewood = true;
1264 } else {
1265 zone_manager &mgr = zone_manager::get_manager();
1266 auto zones = mgr.get_zones( zone_type_SOURCE_FIREWOOD, here.getglobal( pos ) );
1267 if( !zones.empty() ) {
1268 target_is_firewood = true;
1269 }
1270 }
1271 if( target_is_firewood ) {
1272 if( !query_yn( _( "Do you really want to burn your firewood source?" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Do you really want to burn your firewood source?"
) ) ) ) ) {
1273 return false;
1274 }
1275 }
1276 // Check for an adjacent fire container
1277 for( const tripoint_bub_ms &query : here.points_in_radius( pos, 1 ) ) {
1278 // Don't ask if we're setting a fire on top of a fireplace
1279 // TODO: fix point types
1280 if( here.has_flag_furn( "FIRE_CONTAINER", pos.raw() ) ) {
1281 break;
1282 }
1283 // Skip the position we're trying to light on fire
1284 if( query == pos ) {
1285 continue;
1286 }
1287 // TODO: fix point types
1288 if( here.has_flag_furn( "FIRE_CONTAINER", query.raw() ) ) {
1289 if( !query_yn( _( "Are you sure you want to start fire here? There's a fireplace adjacent." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Are you sure you want to start fire here? There's a fireplace adjacent."
) ) ) ) ) {
1290 return false;
1291 } else {
1292 // Don't ask multiple times if they say no and there are multiple fireplaces
1293 break;
1294 }
1295 }
1296 }
1297 // Check for a brazier.
1298 bool has_unactivated_brazier = false;
1299 for( const item &i : here.i_at( pos ) ) {
1300 if( i.typeId() == itype_brazier ) {
1301 has_unactivated_brazier = true;
1302 }
1303 }
1304 return !has_unactivated_brazier ||
1305 query_yn(
1306 _( "There's a brazier there but you haven't set it up to contain the fire. Continue?" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "There's a brazier there but you haven't set it up to contain the fire. Continue?"
) ) ) );
1307}
1308
1309void firestarter_actor::resolve_firestarter_use( Character *p, const tripoint_bub_ms &pos )
1310{
1311 if( get_map().add_field( pos, fd_fire, 1, 10_minutes ) ) {
1312 if( !p->has_trait( trait_PYROMANIA ) ) {
1313 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You successfully light a fire." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You successfully light a fire."
) ) ) );
1314 } else {
1315 if( one_in( 4 ) ) {
1316 p->add_msg_if_player( m_mixed,
1317 _( "You light a fire, but it isn't enough. You need to light more." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You light a fire, but it isn't enough. You need to light more."
) ) ) );
1318 } else {
1319 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You happily light a fire." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You happily light a fire." )
) ) );
1320 p->add_morale( MORALE_PYROMANIA_STARTFIRE, 5, 10, 6_hours, 4_hours );
1321 p->rem_morale( MORALE_PYROMANIA_NOFIRE );
1322 }
1323 }
1324 }
1325}
1326
1327ret_val<void> firestarter_actor::can_use( const Character &p, const item &it,
1328 const tripoint & ) const
1329{
1330 if( p.is_underwater() ) {
1331 return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "You can't do that while underwater." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You can't do that while underwater."
) ) ) );
1332 }
1333
1334 if( !it.ammo_sufficient( &p ) ) {
1335 return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "This tool doesn't have enough charges." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "This tool doesn't have enough charges."
) ) ) );
1336 }
1337
1338 if( need_sunlight && light_mod( p.pos() ) <= 0.0f ) {
1339 return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "You need direct sunlight to light a fire with this." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You need direct sunlight to light a fire with this."
) ) ) );
1340 }
1341
1342 return ret_val<void>::make_success();
1343}
1344
1345float firestarter_actor::light_mod( const tripoint &pos ) const
1346{
1347 if( !need_sunlight ) {
1348 return 1.0f;
1349 }
1350 if( g->is_sheltered( pos ) ) {
1351 return 0.0f;
1352 }
1353
1354 if( incident_sun_irradiance( get_weather().weather_id, calendar::turn ) > irradiance::moderate ) {
1355 return std::pow( g->natural_light_level( pos.z ) / 80.0f, 8 );
1356 }
1357
1358 return 0.0f;
1359}
1360
1361int firestarter_actor::moves_cost_by_fuel( const tripoint_bub_ms &pos ) const
1362{
1363 map &here = get_map();
1364 if( here.flammable_items_at( pos, 100 ) ) {
1365 return moves_cost_fast;
1366 }
1367
1368 if( here.flammable_items_at( pos, 10 ) ) {
1369 return ( moves_cost_slow + moves_cost_fast ) / 2;
1370 }
1371
1372 return moves_cost_slow;
1373}
1374
1375std::optional<int> firestarter_actor::use( Character *p, item &it,
1376 const tripoint &spos ) const
1377{
1378 if( !p ) {
1379 debugmsg( "%s called action firestarter that requires character but no character is present",realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/iuse_actor.cpp"
, "1380", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "%s called action firestarter that requires character but no character is present"
, it.typeId().str())
1380 it.typeId().str() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/iuse_actor.cpp"
, "1380", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "%s called action firestarter that requires character but no character is present"
, it.typeId().str());
1381 return std::nullopt;
1382 }
1383
1384 // TODO: fix point types
1385 tripoint_bub_ms pos( spos );
1386 float light = light_mod( p->pos() );
1387 if( !prep_firestarter_use( *p, pos ) ) {
1388 return std::nullopt;
1389 }
1390
1391 double skill_level = p->get_skill_level( skill_survival );
1392 /** @EFFECT_SURVIVAL speeds up fire starting */
1393 float moves_modifier = std::pow( 0.8, std::min( 5.0, skill_level ) );
1394 const int moves_base = moves_cost_by_fuel( pos );
1395 const double moves_per_turn = to_moves<double>( 1_turns );
1396 const int min_moves = std::min<int>(
1397 moves_base, std::sqrt( 1 + moves_base / moves_per_turn ) * moves_per_turn );
1398 const int moves = std::max<int>( min_moves, moves_base * moves_modifier ) / light;
1399 if( moves > to_moves<int>( 1_minutes ) ) {
1400 // If more than 1 minute, inform the player
1401 const int minutes = moves / to_moves<int>( 1_minutes );
1402 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, need_sunlight ?
1403 n_gettext( "If the current weather holds, it will take around %d minute to light a fire.",
1404 "If the current weather holds, it will take around %d minutes to light a fire.", minutes ) :
1405 n_gettext( "At your skill level, it will take around %d minute to light a fire.",
1406 "At your skill level, it will take around %d minutes to light a fire.", minutes ),
1407 minutes );
1408 } else if( moves < to_moves<int>( 2_turns ) && get_map().is_flammable( pos ) ) {
1409 // If less than 2 turns, don't start a long action
1410 resolve_firestarter_use( p, pos );
1411 p->mod_moves( -moves );
1412 return 1;
1413 }
1414
1415 // skill gains are handled by the activity, but stored here in the index field
1416 const int potential_skill_gain = moves_modifier * ( std::min( 10.0, moves_cost_fast / 100.0 ) + 2 );
1417 p->assign_activity( ACT_START_FIRE, moves, potential_skill_gain,
1418 0, it.tname() );
1419 p->activity.targets.emplace_back( *p, &it );
1420 p->activity.values.push_back( g->natural_light_level( pos.z() ) );
1421 p->activity.placement = get_map().getglobal( pos );
1422 // charges to use are handled by the activity
1423 return 0;
1424}
1425
1426void salvage_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
1427{
1428 assign( obj, "cost", cost );
1429 assign( obj, "moves_per_part", moves_per_part );
1430}
1431
1432std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> salvage_actor::clone() const
1433{
1434 return std::make_unique<salvage_actor>( *this );
1435}
1436
1437std::optional<int> salvage_actor::use( Character *p, item &cutter, const tripoint & ) const
1438{
1439 if( !p ) {
1440 debugmsg( "%s called action salvage that requires character but no character is present",realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/iuse_actor.cpp"
, "1441", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "%s called action salvage that requires character but no character is present"
, cutter.typeId().str())
1441 cutter.typeId().str() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/iuse_actor.cpp"
, "1441", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "%s called action salvage that requires character but no character is present"
, cutter.typeId().str());
1442 return std::nullopt;
1443 }
1444
1445 item_location item_loc = game_menus::inv::salvage( *p, this );
1446 if( !item_loc ) {
1447 add_msg( _( "Never mind." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Never mind." ) ) ) );
1448 return std::nullopt;
1449 }
1450
1451 return salvage_actor::try_to_cut_up( *p, cutter, item_loc );
1452}
1453
1454std::optional<int> salvage_actor::try_to_cut_up
1455( Character &p, item &cutter, item_location &cut ) const
1456{
1457 if( !valid_to_cut_up( &p, *cut.get_item() ) ) {
1458 // Messages should have already been displayed.
1459 return std::nullopt;
1460 }
1461
1462 if( &cutter == cut.get_item() ) {
1463 add_msg( m_info, _( "You can not cut the %s with itself." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You can not cut the %s with itself."
) ) ), cutter.tname() );
1464 return std::nullopt;
1465 }
1466
1467 salvage_actor::cut_up( p, cut );
1468 // Return used charges from cutter
1469 return cost >= 0 ? cost : 1;
1470}
1471
1472// Helper to visit instances of all the sub-materials of an item.
1473static void visit_salvage_products( const item &it,
1474 const std::function<void( const item & )> &func )
1475{
1476 for( const auto &material : it.made_of() ) {
1477 if( const std::optional<itype_id> id = material.first->salvaged_into() ) {
1478 item exemplar( *id );
1479 func( exemplar );
1480 }
1481 }
1482}
1483
1484static units::mass proportional_weight( const item &it, int material_portions )
1485{
1486 int total_portions = std::max( 1, it.type->mat_portion_total );
1487 return it.weight() * material_portions / total_portions;
1488}
1489
1490// Helper to determine if there's enough of any material to even produce a result when cut up.
1491static bool can_produce_results( const item &it )
1492{
1493 for( const std::pair<const material_id, int> &mat : it.made_of() ) {
1494 if( const std::optional<itype_id> mat_id = mat.first->salvaged_into() ) {
1495 item material( *mat_id );
1496 if( material.count_by_charges() ) {
1497 material.charges = 1;
1498 }
1499 if( material.weight() <= proportional_weight( it, mat.second ) ) {
1500 return true;
1501 }
1502 }
1503 }
1504 return false;
1505}
1506
1507int salvage_actor::time_to_cut_up( const item &it ) const
1508{
1509 units::mass total_material_weight;
1510 int num_materials = 0;
1511 visit_salvage_products( it, [&total_material_weight, &num_materials]( const item & exemplar ) {
1512 total_material_weight += exemplar.weight();
1513 num_materials += 1;
1514 } );
1515 if( num_materials == 0 ) {
1516 return 0;
1517 }
1518 units::mass average_material_weight = total_material_weight / num_materials;
1519 int count = it.weight() / average_material_weight;
1520 return moves_per_part * count;
1521}
1522
1523// If p is a nullptr, it does not print messages or query for confirmation
1524// it here is the item that is a candidate for being cut up.
1525bool salvage_actor::valid_to_cut_up( const Character *const p, const item &it ) const
1526{
1527 // There must be some historical significance to these items.
1528 if( !it.is_salvageable() ) {
1529 if( p ) {
1530 add_msg( m_info, _( "Can't salvage anything from %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Can't salvage anything from %s."
) ) ), it.tname() );
1531 }
1532 if( it.is_disassemblable() ) {
1533 if( p ) {
1534 add_msg( m_info, _( "Try disassembling the %s instead." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Try disassembling the %s instead."
) ) ), it.tname() );
1535 }
1536 }
1537 return false;
1538 }
1539
1540 if( !it.empty() ) {
1541 if( p ) {
1542 add_msg( m_info, _( "Please empty the %s before cutting it up." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Please empty the %s before cutting it up."
) ) ), it.tname() );
1543 }
1544 return false;
1545 }
1546 if( !can_produce_results( it ) ) {
1547 if( p ) {
1548 add_msg( m_info, _( "The %s is too small to salvage material from." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "The %s is too small to salvage material from."
) ) ), it.tname() );
1549 }
1550 return false;
1551 }
1552 if( p ) {
1553 // Softer warnings at the end so we don't ask permission and then tell them no.
1554 if( &it == p->get_wielded_item().get_item() ) {
1555 return query_yn( _( "You are wielding that, are you sure?" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You are wielding that, are you sure?"
) ) ) );
1556 } else if( p->is_worn( it ) ) {
1557 return query_yn( _( "You're wearing that, are you sure?" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You're wearing that, are you sure?"
) ) ) );
1558 }
1559 }
1560
1561 return true;
1562}
1563
1564// Find a recipe that can be used to craft item x. Searches craft and uncraft recipes
1565// Used only by salvage_actor::cut_up
1566static std::optional<recipe> find_uncraft_recipe( const item &x )
1567{
1568 auto is_valid_uncraft = [&x]( const recipe & curr ) -> bool {
1569 return !( curr.obsolete || curr.result() != x.typeId()
1570 || curr.makes_amount() > 1 || curr.is_null() );
1571 };
1572
1573 // Check uncraft first, then crafting recipes if none was found
1574 recipe uncraft = recipe_dictionary::get_uncraft( x.typeId() );
1575 if( is_valid_uncraft( uncraft ) ) {
1576 return uncraft;
1577 }
1578
1579 auto iter = std::find_if( recipe_dict.begin(), recipe_dict.end(),
1580 [&]( const std::pair<const recipe_id, recipe> &curr ) {
1581 return is_valid_uncraft( curr.second );
1582 } );
1583 if( iter != recipe_dict.end() ) {
1584 return iter->second;
1585 }
1586 return std::nullopt;
1587}
1588
1589void salvage_actor::cut_up( Character &p, item_location &cut ) const
1590{
1591 // Map of salvaged items (id, count)
1592 std::map<itype_id, int> salvage;
1593 std::map<material_id, units::mass> mat_to_weight;
1594 std::set<material_id> mat_set;
1595 for( std::pair<material_id, int> mat : cut.get_item()->made_of() ) {
1596 mat_set.insert( mat.first );
1597 }
1598
1599 // Calculate efficiency losses
1600 float efficiency = 1.0;
1601 // Higher fabrication, less chance of entropy, but still a chance.
1602 /** @EFFECT_FABRICATION reduces chance of losing components when cutting items up */
1603 int entropy_threshold = std::max( 0,
1604 5 - static_cast<int>( round( p.get_skill_level( skill_fabrication ) ) ) );
1605 if( rng( 1, 10 ) <= entropy_threshold ) {
1606 efficiency *= 0.9;
1607 }
1608
1609 // Fail dex roll, potentially lose more parts.
1610 /** @EFFECT_DEX randomly reduces component loss when cutting items up */
1611 if( dice( 3, 4 ) > p.dex_cur ) {
1612 efficiency *= 0.95;
1613 }
1614
1615 // If the item being cut is damaged, additional losses will be incurred.
1616 efficiency *= std::pow( 0.8, cut.get_item()->damage_level() );
1617
1618 auto distribute_uniformly = [&mat_to_weight]( const item & x, float num_adjusted ) -> void {
1619 for( const auto &type : x.made_of() )
1620 {
1621 mat_to_weight[type.first] += proportional_weight( x, type.second ) * num_adjusted;
1622 }
1623 };
1624
1625 // efficiency is decreased every time the ingredients of a recipe have more mass than the output
1626 // num_adjusted represents the number of items and efficiency in one value
1627 std::function<void( item, float )> cut_up_component =
1628 [&salvage, &mat_set, &distribute_uniformly, &cut_up_component]
1629 ( const item & curr, float num_adjusted ) -> void {
1630
1631 // If it is one of the basic components, add it into the list
1632 if( curr.type->is_basic_component() )
1633 {
1634 int num_actual = static_cast<int>( num_adjusted );
1635 salvage[curr.typeId()] += num_actual;
1636 return;
1637 }
1638
1639 // Discard invalid component
1640 // Non-salvageable items are discarded even if made of appropriate material
1641 if( !curr.made_of_any( mat_set ) || !curr.is_salvageable() )
1642 {
1643 return;
1644 }
1645
1646 // Items count by charges are not always smaller than base materials
1647 // Necessary for e.g. bones -> bone splinters
1648 if( curr.count_by_charges() )
1649 {
1650 distribute_uniformly( curr, num_adjusted );
1651 return;
1652 }
1653
1654 // All intact components are also cut up and destroyed
1655 if( !curr.components.empty() )
1656 {
1657 for( const item_components::type_vector_pair &tvp : curr.components ) {
1658 for( const item &iter : tvp.second ) {
1659 cut_up_component( iter, num_adjusted );
1660 }
1661 }
1662 return;
1663 }
1664
1665 // Try to find an available recipe and "restore" its components
1666 std::optional<recipe> uncraft = find_uncraft_recipe( curr );
1667 if( uncraft )
1668 {
1669 const requirement_data requirements = uncraft->simple_requirements();
1670
1671 units::mass ingredient_weight = 0_gram;
1672 for( const auto &altercomps : requirements.get_components() ) {
1673 if( !altercomps.empty() && altercomps.front().type ) {
1674 ingredient_weight += altercomps.front().type->weight * altercomps.front().count;
1675 }
1676 }
1677 // We decrease efficiency so on avg no more mass is salvaged than the original item weighed
1678 num_adjusted *= std::min( 1.0f, static_cast<float>( curr.weight().value() )
1679 / static_cast<float>( ingredient_weight.value() ) );
1680
1681 // Find default components set from recipe
1682 for( const auto &altercomps : requirements.get_components() ) {
1683 const item_comp &comp = altercomps.front();
1684 item next = item( comp.type, calendar::turn );
1685 if( next.count_by_charges() ) {
1686 next.charges = 1;
1687 }
1688 cut_up_component( next, num_adjusted * comp.count );
1689 }
1690 } else
1691 {
1692 // No recipe was found so we guess and distribute the weight uniformly.
1693 // This is imprecise but it can't be exploited as no recipe exists for the item
1694 distribute_uniformly( curr, num_adjusted );
1695 }
1696 };
1697
1698 // Decompose the item into irreducible parts
1699 cut_up_component( *cut.get_item(), efficiency );
1700
1701 // Not much practice, and you won't get very far ripping things up.
1702 p.practice( skill_fabrication, rng( 0, 5 ), 1 );
1703
1704 // Add the uniformly distributed mass to the relevant salvage items
1705 for( const auto &iter : mat_to_weight ) {
1706 if( const std::optional<itype_id> id = iter.first->salvaged_into() ) {
1707 salvage[*id] += iter.second / id->obj().weight;
1708 }
1709 }
1710
1711 add_msg( m_info, _( "You try to salvage materials from the %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You try to salvage materials from the %s."
) ) ),
1712 cut.get_item()->tname() );
1713
1714 const item_location::type cut_type = cut.where();
1715 const tripoint pos = cut.position();
1716 const bool filthy = cut.get_item()->is_filthy();
1717
1718 // Clean up before removing the item.
1719 remove_ammo( *cut.get_item(), p );
1720 // Original item has been consumed.
1721 cut.remove_item();
1722 // Force an encumbrance update in case they were wearing that item.
1723 p.calc_encumbrance();
1724
1725 map &here = get_map();
1726 for( const auto &salvaged_mat : salvage ) {
1727 item result( salvaged_mat.first, calendar::turn );
1728 int amount = salvaged_mat.second;
1729 if( amount > 0 ) {
1730 // Time based on number of components.
1731 p.moves -= moves_per_part;
1732 if( result.count_by_charges() ) {
1733 result.charges = amount;
1734 amount = 1;
1735 }
1736 add_msg( m_good, n_gettext( "Salvaged %1$i %2$s.", "Salvaged %1$i %2$s.", amount ),
1737 amount, result.display_name( amount ) );
1738 if( filthy ) {
1739 result.set_flag( flag_FILTHY );
1740 }
1741 if( cut_type == item_location::type::character ) {
1742 p.i_add_or_drop( result, amount );
1743 } else {
1744 for( int i = 0; i < amount; i++ ) {
1745 here.add_item_or_charges( pos, result );
1746 }
1747 }
1748 } else {
1749 add_msg( m_bad, _( "Could not salvage a %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Could not salvage a %s." ) )
), result.display_name() );
1750 }
1751 }
1752}
1753
1754void inscribe_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
1755{
1756 assign( obj, "cost", cost );
1757 assign( obj, "on_items", on_items );
1758 assign( obj, "on_terrain", on_terrain );
1759 assign( obj, "material_restricted", material_restricted );
1760
1761 if( obj.has_array( "material_whitelist" ) ) {
1762 material_whitelist.clear();
1763 assign( obj, "material_whitelist", material_whitelist );
1764 }
1765
1766 assign( obj, "verb", verb );
1767 assign( obj, "gerund", gerund );
1768
1769 if( !on_items && !on_terrain ) {
1770 obj.throw_error(
1771 R"(Tried to create an useless inscribe_actor, at least on of "on_items" or "on_terrain" should be true)" );
1772 }
1773}
1774
1775std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> inscribe_actor::clone() const
1776{
1777 return std::make_unique<inscribe_actor>( *this );
1778}
1779
1780bool inscribe_actor::item_inscription( item &tool, item &cut ) const
1781{
1782 if( !cut.made_of( phase_id::SOLID ) ) {
1783 add_msg( m_info, _( "You can't inscribe an item that isn't solid!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You can't inscribe an item that isn't solid!"
) ) ) );
1784 return false;
1785 }
1786
1787 if( material_restricted && !cut.made_of_any( material_whitelist ) ) {
1788 std::wstring lower_verb = utf8_to_wstr( verb.translated() );
1789 std::transform( lower_verb.begin(), lower_verb.end(), lower_verb.begin(), towlower );
1790 add_msg( m_info, _( "You can't %1$s %2$s because of the material it is made of." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You can't %1$s %2$s because of the material it is made of."
) ) ),
1791 wstr_to_utf8( lower_verb ), cut.display_name() );
1792 return false;
1793 }
1794
1795 enum inscription_type {
1796 INSCRIPTION_LABEL,
1797 INSCRIPTION_NOTE,
1798 };
1799
1800 uilist menu;
1801 menu.text = string_format( _( "%s meaning?" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%s meaning?" ) ) ), verb );
1802 menu.addentry( INSCRIPTION_LABEL, true, -1, _( "It's a label" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "It's a label" ) ) ) );
1803 menu.addentry( INSCRIPTION_NOTE, true, -1, _( "It's a note" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "It's a note" ) ) ) );
1804 menu.query();
1805
1806 std::string carving;
1807 std::string carving_tool;
1808 switch( menu.ret ) {
1809 case INSCRIPTION_LABEL:
1810 carving = "item_label";
1811 carving_tool = "item_label_tool";
1812 break;
1813 case INSCRIPTION_NOTE:
1814 carving = "item_note";
1815 carving_tool = "item_note_tool";
1816 break;
1817 default:
1818 return false;
1819 }
1820
1821 const bool hasnote = cut.has_var( carving );
1822 std::string messageprefix = ( hasnote ? _( "(To delete, clear the text and confirm)\n" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "(To delete, clear the text and confirm)\n"
) ) ) : "" ) +
1823 //~ %1$s: gerund (e.g. carved), %2$s: item name
1824 string_format( pgettext( "carving", "%1$s on the %2$s is: " ),
1825 gerund, cut.type_name() );
1826
1827 string_input_popup popup;
1828 popup.title( string_format( _( "%s what?" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%s what?" ) ) ), verb ) )
1829 .width( 64 )
1830 .text( hasnote ? cut.get_var( carving ) : std::string() )
1831 .description( messageprefix )
1832 .identifier( "inscribe_item" )
1833 .max_length( 128 )
1834 .query();
1835 if( popup.canceled() ) {
1836 return false;
1837 }
1838 const std::string message = popup.text();
1839 if( message.empty() ) {
1840 cut.erase_var( carving );
1841 cut.erase_var( carving_tool );
1842 } else {
1843 cut.set_var( carving, message );
1844 cut.set_var( carving_tool, tool.typeId().str() );
1845 }
1846
1847 return true;
1848}
1849
1850std::optional<int> inscribe_actor::use( Character *p, item &it, const tripoint & ) const
1851{
1852 if( !p ) {
1853 debugmsg( "%s called action inscribe that requires character but no character is present",realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/iuse_actor.cpp"
, "1854", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "%s called action inscribe that requires character but no character is present"
, it.typeId().str())
1854 it.typeId().str() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/iuse_actor.cpp"
, "1854", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "%s called action inscribe that requires character but no character is present"
, it.typeId().str());
1855 return std::nullopt;
1856 }
1857
1858 int choice = INT_MAX2147483647;
1859 if( on_terrain && on_items ) {
1860 uilist imenu;
1861 imenu.text = string_format( _( "%s on what?" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%s on what?" ) ) ), verb );
1862 imenu.addentry( 0, true, MENU_AUTOASSIGN, _( "The terrain" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "The terrain" ) ) ) );
1863 imenu.addentry( 1, true, MENU_AUTOASSIGN, _( "An item" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "An item" ) ) ) );
1864 imenu.query();
1865 choice = imenu.ret;
1866 } else if( on_terrain ) {
1867 choice = 0;
1868 } else {
1869 choice = 1;
1870 }
1871
1872 if( choice < 0 || choice > 1 ) {
1873 return std::nullopt;
1874 }
1875
1876 if( choice == 0 ) {
1877 const std::optional<tripoint> dest_ = choose_adjacent( _( "Write where?" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Write where?" ) ) ) );
1878 if( !dest_ ) {
1879 return std::nullopt;
1880 }
1881 return iuse::handle_ground_graffiti( *p, &it, string_format( _( "%s what?" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%s what?" ) ) ), verb ),
1882 dest_.value() );
1883 }
1884
1885 item_location loc = game_menus::inv::titled_menu( get_avatar(), _( "Inscribe which item?" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Inscribe which item?" ) ) ) );
1886 if( !loc ) {
1887 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "Never mind." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Never mind." ) ) ) );
1888 return std::nullopt;
1889 }
1890 item &cut = *loc;
1891 if( &cut == &it ) {
1892 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You try to bend your %s, but fail." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You try to bend your %s, but fail."
) ) ), it.tname() );
1893 return 0;
1894 }
1895 // inscribe_item returns false if the action fails or is canceled somehow.
1896
1897 if( item_inscription( it, cut ) ) {
1898 return cost >= 0 ? cost : 1;
1899 }
1900
1901 return std::nullopt;
1902}
1903
1904void fireweapon_off_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
1905{
1906 obj.read( "target_id", target_id, true );
1907 obj.read( "success_message", success_message );
1908 obj.read( "failure_message", failure_message );
1909 noise = obj.get_int( "noise", 0 );
1910 moves = obj.get_int( "moves", 0 );
1911 success_chance = obj.get_int( "success_chance", INT_MIN(-2147483647 -1) );
1912}
1913
1914std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> fireweapon_off_actor::clone() const
1915{
1916 return std::make_unique<fireweapon_off_actor>( *this );
1917}
1918
1919std::optional<int> fireweapon_off_actor::use( Character *p, item &it,
1920 const tripoint & ) const
1921{
1922 if( !p ) {
1923 debugmsg( "%s called action fireweapon_off that requires character but no character is present",realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/iuse_actor.cpp"
, "1924", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "%s called action fireweapon_off that requires character but no character is present"
, it.typeId().str())
1924 it.typeId().str() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/iuse_actor.cpp"
, "1924", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "%s called action fireweapon_off that requires character but no character is present"
, it.typeId().str());
1925 return std::nullopt;
1926 }
1927
1928 p->moves -= moves;
1929 if( rng( 0, 10 ) - it.damage_level() > success_chance && !p->is_underwater() ) {
1930 if( noise > 0 ) {
1931 sounds::sound( p->pos(), noise, sounds::sound_t::combat, success_message );
1932 } else {
1933 p->add_msg_if_player( "%s", success_message );
1934 }
1935
1936 it.convert( target_id, p );
1937 it.active = true;
1938 } else if( !failure_message.empty() ) {
1939 p->add_msg_if_player( m_bad, "%s", failure_message );
1940 }
1941
1942 return 1;
1943}
1944
1945ret_val<void> fireweapon_off_actor::can_use( const Character &p, const item &it,
