1946 const tripoint & ) const
1947{
1948 if( !it.ammo_sufficient( &p ) ) {
1949 return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "This tool doesn't have enough charges." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "This tool doesn't have enough charges."
) ) ) );
1950 }
1951
1952 if( p.is_underwater() ) {
1953 return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "You can't do that while underwater." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You can't do that while underwater."
) ) ) );
1954 }
1955
1956 return ret_val<void>::make_success();
1957}
1958
1959void fireweapon_on_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
1960{
1961 obj.read( "noise_message", noise_message );
1962 obj.get_member( "charges_extinguish_message" ).read( charges_extinguish_message );
1963 obj.get_member( "water_extinguish_message" ).read( water_extinguish_message );
1964 noise_chance = obj.get_int( "noise_chance", 1 );
1965}
1966
1967std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> fireweapon_on_actor::clone() const
1968{
1969 return std::make_unique<fireweapon_on_actor>( *this );
1970}
1971
1972std::optional<int> fireweapon_on_actor::use( Character *p, item &it,
1973 const tripoint &pos ) const
1974{
1975 bool extinguish = true;
1976 translation deactivation_msg;
1977 if( !it.ammo_sufficient( p ) ) {
1978 deactivation_msg = charges_extinguish_message;
1979 } else if( p && p->is_underwater() ) {
1980 deactivation_msg = water_extinguish_message;
1981 } else {
1982 extinguish = false;
1983 }
1984
1985 if( !p ) {
1986 map &here = get_map();
1987 if( here.is_water_shallow_current( pos ) || here.is_divable( pos ) ) {
1988 // Item is on ground on water
1989 extinguish = true;
1990 }
1991 }
1992
1993 if( extinguish ) {
1994 it.deactivate( p, false );
1995 if( p ) {
1996 p->add_msg_if_player( m_bad, "%s", deactivation_msg );
1997 }
1998 return 0;
1999
2000 } else if( p && one_in( noise_chance ) ) {
2001 p->add_msg_if_player( "%s", noise_message );
2002 }
2003
2004 return 1;
2005}
2006
2007void manualnoise_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
2008{
2009 obj.get_member( "use_message" ).read( use_message );
2010 obj.read( "noise_message", noise_message );
2011 noise_id = obj.get_string( "noise_id", "misc" );
2012 noise_variant = obj.get_string( "noise_variant", "default" );
2013 noise = obj.get_int( "noise", 0 );
2014 moves = obj.get_int( "moves", 0 );
2015}
2016
2017std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> manualnoise_actor::clone() const
2018{
2019 return std::make_unique<manualnoise_actor>( *this );
2020}
2021
2022std::optional<int> manualnoise_actor::use( Character *p, item &, const tripoint & ) const
2023{
2024 p->moves -= moves;
2025 if( noise > 0 ) {
2026 sounds::sound( p->pos(), noise, sounds::sound_t::activity,
2027 noise_message.empty() ? _( "Hsss" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Hsss" ) ) ) : noise_message.translated(), true, noise_id, noise_variant );
2028 }
2029 p->add_msg_if_player( "%s", use_message );
2030 return 1;
2031}
2032
2033ret_val<void> manualnoise_actor::can_use( const Character &p, const item &it,
2034 const tripoint & ) const
2035{
2036 if( !it.ammo_sufficient( &p ) ) {
2037 return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "This tool doesn't have enough charges." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "This tool doesn't have enough charges."
) ) ) );
2038 }
2039
2040 return ret_val<void>::make_success();
2041}
2042
2043void play_instrument_iuse::load( const JsonObject & )
2044{
2045}
2046
2047std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> play_instrument_iuse::clone() const
2048{
2049 return std::make_unique<play_instrument_iuse>( *this );
2050}
2051
2052std::optional<int> play_instrument_iuse::use( Character *p, item &it, const tripoint & ) const
2053{
2054 if( it.active ) {
2055 it.active = false;
2056 p->add_msg_player_or_npc( _( "You stop playing your %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You stop playing your %s." )
) ),
2057 _( "<npcname> stops playing their %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<npcname> stops playing their %s."
) ) ),
2058 it.display_name() );
2059 } else {
2060 p->add_msg_player_or_npc( m_good,
2061 _( "You start playing your %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You start playing your %s." )
) ),
2062 _( "<npcname> starts playing their %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<npcname> starts playing their %s."
) ) ),
2063 it.display_name() );
2064 it.active = true;
2065 }
2066 return std::nullopt;
2067}
2068
2069ret_val<void> play_instrument_iuse::can_use( const Character &, const item &,
2070 const tripoint & ) const
2071{
2072 return ret_val<void>::make_success();
2073}
2074
2075std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> musical_instrument_actor::clone() const
2076{
2077 return std::make_unique<musical_instrument_actor>( *this );
2078}
2079
2080void musical_instrument_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
2081{
2082 speed_penalty = obj.get_int( "speed_penalty", 10 );
2083 volume = obj.get_int( "volume" );
2084 fun = obj.get_int( "fun" );
2085 fun_bonus = obj.get_int( "fun_bonus", 0 );
2086 description_frequency = time_duration::from_turns( obj.get_int( "description_frequency", 0 ) );
2087 if( !obj.read( "description_frequency", description_frequency ) ) {
2088 obj.throw_error( "missing member \"description_frequency\"" );
2089 }
2090 obj.read( "player_descriptions", player_descriptions );
2091 obj.read( "npc_descriptions", npc_descriptions );
2092}
2093
2094std::optional<int> musical_instrument_actor::use( Character *p, item &it,
2095 const tripoint & ) const
2096{
2097 if( !p ) {
2098 it.active = false;
2099 return std::nullopt;
2100 }
2101
2102 if( !p->is_npc() && music::is_active_music_id( music::music_id::instrument ) ) {
2103 music::deactivate_music_id( music::music_id::instrument );
2104 // Because musical instrument creates musical sound too
2105 if( music::is_active_music_id( music::music_id::sound ) ) {
2106 music::deactivate_music_id( music::music_id::sound );
2107 }
2108 }
2109
2110 if( p->is_mounted() ) {
2111 p->add_msg_player_or_npc( m_bad, _( "You can't play music while mounted." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You can't play music while mounted."
) ) ),
2112 _( "<npcname> can't play music while mounted." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<npcname> can't play music while mounted."
) ) ) );
2113 it.active = false;
2114 return std::nullopt;
2115 }
2116 if( p->is_underwater() ) {
2117 p->add_msg_player_or_npc( m_bad,
2118 _( "You can't play music underwater." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You can't play music underwater."
) ) ),
2119 _( "<npcname> can't play music underwater." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<npcname> can't play music underwater."
) ) ) );
2120 it.active = false;
2121 return std::nullopt;
2122 }
2123
2124 // Stop playing a wind instrument when winded or even eventually become winded while playing it?
2125 // It's impossible to distinguish instruments for now anyways.
2126 if( p->has_effect( effect_sleep ) || p->has_effect( effect_stunned ) ||
2127 p->has_effect( effect_asthma ) ) {
2128 p->add_msg_player_or_npc( m_bad,
2129 _( "You stop playing your %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You stop playing your %s." )
) ),
2130 _( "<npcname> stops playing their %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<npcname> stops playing their %s."
) ) ),
2131 it.display_name() );
2132 it.active = false;
2133 return std::nullopt;
2134 }
2135
2136 // Check for worn or wielded - no "floating"/bionic instruments for now
2137 // TODO: Distinguish instruments played with hands and with mouth, consider encumbrance
2138 const int inv_pos = p->get_item_position( &it );
2139 if( inv_pos >= 0 || inv_pos == INT_MIN(-2147483647 -1) ) {
2140 p->add_msg_player_or_npc( m_bad,
2141 _( "You need to hold or wear %s to play it." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You need to hold or wear %s to play it."
) ) ),
2142 _( "<npcname> needs to hold or wear %s to play it." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<npcname> needs to hold or wear %s to play it."
) ) ),
2143 it.display_name() );
2144 it.active = false;
2145 return std::nullopt;
2146 }
2147
2148 // At speed this low you can't coordinate your actions well enough to play the instrument
2149 if( p->get_speed() <= 25 + speed_penalty ) {
2150 p->add_msg_player_or_npc( m_bad,
2151 _( "You feel too weak to play your %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You feel too weak to play your %s."
) ) ),
2152 _( "<npcname> feels too weak to play their %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<npcname> feels too weak to play their %s."
) ) ),
2153 it.display_name() );
2154 it.active = false;
2155 return std::nullopt;
2156 }
2157
2158 // We can play the music now
2159 if( !p->is_npc() ) {
2160 music::activate_music_id( music::music_id::instrument );
2161 }
2162
2163 if( p->get_effect_int( effect_playing_instrument ) <= speed_penalty ) {
2164 // Only re-apply the effect if it wouldn't lower the intensity
2165 p->add_effect( effect_playing_instrument, 2_turns, false, speed_penalty );
2166 }
2167
2168 std::string desc = "music";
2169 /** @EFFECT_PER increases morale bonus when playing an instrument */
2170 const int morale_effect = fun + fun_bonus * p->per_cur;
2171 if( morale_effect >= 0 && calendar::once_every( description_frequency ) ) {
2172 if( !player_descriptions.empty() && p->is_avatar() ) {
2173 desc = random_entry( player_descriptions ).translated();
2174 } else if( !npc_descriptions.empty() && p->is_npc() ) {
2175 //~ %1$s: npc name, %2$s: npc action description
2176 desc = string_format( pgettext( "play music", "%1$s %2$s" ), p->disp_name( false ),
2177 random_entry( npc_descriptions ) );
2178 }
2179 } else if( morale_effect < 0 && calendar::once_every( 1_minutes ) ) {
2180 // No musical skills = possible morale penalty
2181 if( p->is_avatar() ) {
2182 desc = _( "You produce an annoying sound." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You produce an annoying sound."
) ) );
2183 } else {
2184 desc = string_format( _( "%s produces an annoying sound." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%s produces an annoying sound."
) ) ), p->disp_name( false ) );
2185 }
2186 }
2187
2188 if( morale_effect >= 0 ) {
2189 sounds::sound( p->pos(), volume, sounds::sound_t::music, desc, true, "musical_instrument",
2190 it.typeId().str() );
2191 } else {
2192 sounds::sound( p->pos(), volume, sounds::sound_t::music, desc, true, "musical_instrument_bad",
2193 it.typeId().str() );
2194 }
2195
2196 if( !p->has_effect( effect_music ) && p->can_hear( p->pos(), volume ) ) {
2197 // Sound code doesn't describe noises at the player position
2198 if( p->is_avatar() && desc != "music" ) {
2199 add_msg( m_info, desc );
2200 }
2201 p->add_effect( effect_music, 1_turns );
2202 const int sign = morale_effect > 0 ? 1 : -1;
2203 p->add_morale( MORALE_MUSIC, sign, morale_effect, 5_minutes, 2_minutes, true );
2204 }
2205
2206 return 0;
2207}
2208
2209ret_val<void> musical_instrument_actor::can_use( const Character &p, const item &,
2210 const tripoint & ) const
2211{
2212 // TODO: (maybe): Mouth encumbrance? Smoke? Lack of arms? Hand encumbrance?
2213 if( p.is_underwater() ) {
2214 return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "You can't do that while underwater." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You can't do that while underwater."
) ) ) );
2215 }
2216 if( p.is_mounted() ) {
2217 return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "You can't do that while mounted." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You can't do that while mounted."
) ) ) );
2218 }
2219
2220 return ret_val<void>::make_success();
2221}
2222
2223std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> learn_spell_actor::clone() const
2224{
2225 return std::make_unique<learn_spell_actor>( *this );
2226}
2227
2228void learn_spell_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
2229{
2230 spells = obj.get_string_array( "spells" );
2231}
2232
2233void learn_spell_actor::info( const item &, std::vector<iteminfo> &dump ) const
2234{
2235 std::string message;
2236 if( spells.size() == 1 ) {
2237 message = _( "This can teach you a spell." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "This can teach you a spell."
) ) );
2238 } else {
2239 message = _( "This can teach you a number of spells." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "This can teach you a number of spells."
) ) );
2240 }
2241 dump.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", message );
2242 dump.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", _( "Spells Contained:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Spells Contained:" ) ) ) );
2243 avatar &pc = get_avatar();
2244 for( const std::string &sp_id_str : spells ) {
2245 const spell_id sp_id( sp_id_str );
2246 std::string spell_text = sp_id->name.translated();
2247 if( sp_id->spell_class.is_valid() ) {
2248 spell_text = string_format( pgettext( "spell name, spell class", "%s, %s" ),
2249 spell_text, sp_id->spell_class->name() );
2250 }
2251 if( pc.has_trait( trait_ILLITERATE ) ) {
2252 dump.emplace_back( "SPELL", spell_text );
2253 } else {
2254 if( pc.magic->knows_spell( sp_id ) ) {
2255 const spell sp = pc.magic->get_spell( sp_id );
2256 spell_text += ": " + string_format( _( "Level %u" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Level %u" ) ) ), sp.get_level() );
2257 if( sp.is_max_level( pc ) ) {
2258 spell_text = string_format( _( "<color_light_green>%1$s (Max)</color>" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<color_light_green>%1$s (Max)</color>"
) ) ), spell_text );
2259 } else {
2260 spell_text = string_format( "<color_yellow>%s</color>", spell_text );
2261 }
2262 } else {
2263 if( pc.magic->can_learn_spell( pc, sp_id ) ) {
2264 spell_text = string_format( "<color_light_blue>%s</color>", spell_text );
2265 }
2266 }
2267 dump.emplace_back( "SPELL", spell_text );
2268 }
2269 }
2270}
2271
2272std::optional<int> learn_spell_actor::use( Character *p, item &, const tripoint & ) const
2273{
2274 if( p->fine_detail_vision_mod() > 4 ) {
2275 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "It's too dark to read." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "It's too dark to read." ) ) ) );
2276 return std::nullopt;
2277 }
2278 if( p->has_trait( trait_ILLITERATE ) ) {
2279 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You can't read." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You can't read." ) ) ) );
2280 return std::nullopt;
2281 }
2282 std::vector<uilist_entry> uilist_initializer;
2283 uilist spellbook_uilist;
2284 spellbook_callback sp_cb;
2285 bool know_it_all = true;
2286 for( const std::string &sp_id_str : spells ) {
2287 const spell_id sp_id( sp_id_str );
2288 sp_cb.add_spell( sp_id );
2289 uilist_entry entry( sp_id.obj().name.translated() );
2290 if( p->magic->knows_spell( sp_id ) ) {
2291 const spell sp = p->magic->get_spell( sp_id );
2292 entry.ctxt = string_format( _( "Level %u" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Level %u" ) ) ), sp.get_level() );
2293 if( sp.is_max_level( *p ) ) {
2294 entry.ctxt += _( " (Max)" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( " (Max)" ) ) );
2295 entry.enabled = false;
2296 } else {
2297 know_it_all = false;
2298 }
2299 } else {
2300 if( p->magic->can_learn_spell( *p, sp_id ) ) {
2301 entry.ctxt = _( "Study to Learn" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Study to Learn" ) ) );
2302 know_it_all = false;
2303 } else {
2304 entry.ctxt = _( "Can't learn!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Can't learn!" ) ) );
2305 entry.enabled = false;
2306 }
2307 }
2308 uilist_initializer.emplace_back( entry );
2309 }
2310
2311 if( know_it_all ) {
2312 add_msg( m_info, _( "You already know everything this could teach you." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You already know everything this could teach you."
) ) ) );
2313 return std::nullopt;
2314 }
2315
2316 spellbook_uilist.entries = uilist_initializer;
2317 spellbook_uilist.w_height_setup = 24;
2318 spellbook_uilist.w_width_setup = 80;
2319 spellbook_uilist.callback = &sp_cb;
2320 spellbook_uilist.title = _( "Study a spell:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Study a spell:" ) ) );
2321 spellbook_uilist.pad_left_setup = 38;
2322 spellbook_uilist.query();
2323 const int action = spellbook_uilist.ret;
2324 if( action < 0 ) {
2325 return std::nullopt;
2326 }
2327 const bool knows_spell = p->magic->knows_spell( spells[action] );
2328 player_activity study_spell( ACT_STUDY_SPELL,
2329 p->magic->time_to_learn_spell( *p, spells[action] ) );
2330 study_spell.str_values = {
2331 "", // reserved for "until you gain a spell level" option [0]
2332 "learn"
2333 }; // [1]
2334 study_spell.values = { 0, 0, 0 };
2335 if( knows_spell ) {
2336 study_spell.str_values[1] = "study";
2337 const int study_time = uilist( _( "Spend how long studying?" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Spend how long studying?" ) )
), {
2338 { to_moves<int>( 30_minutes ), true, -1, _( "30 minutes" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "30 minutes" ) ) ) },
2339 { to_moves<int>( 1_hours ), true, -1, _( "1 hour" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "1 hour" ) ) ) },
2340 { to_moves<int>( 2_hours ), true, -1, _( "2 hours" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "2 hours" ) ) ) },
2341 { to_moves<int>( 4_hours ), true, -1, _( "4 hours" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "4 hours" ) ) ) },
2342 { to_moves<int>( 8_hours ), true, -1, _( "8 hours" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "8 hours" ) ) ) },
2343 { 10100, true, -1, _( "Until you gain a spell level" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Until you gain a spell level"
) ) ) }
2344 } );
2345 if( study_time <= 0 ) {
2346 return std::nullopt;
2347 }
2348 study_spell.moves_total = study_time;
2349 spell &studying = p->magic->get_spell( spell_id( spells[action] ) );
2350 if( studying.get_difficulty( *p ) < static_cast<int>( p->get_skill_level( studying.skill() ) ) ) {
2351 p->handle_skill_warning( studying.skill(),
2352 true ); // show the skill warning on start reading, since we don't show it during
2353 }
2354 }
2355 study_spell.moves_left = study_spell.moves_total;
2356 if( study_spell.moves_total == 10100 ) {
2357 study_spell.str_values[0] = "gain_level";
2358 study_spell.values[0] = 0; // reserved for xp
2359 study_spell.values[1] = p->magic->get_spell( spell_id( spells[action] ) ).get_level() + 1;
2360 }
2361 study_spell.name = spells[action];
2362 p->assign_activity( study_spell );
2363 return 0;
2364}
2365
2366std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> cast_spell_actor::clone() const
2367{
2368 return std::make_unique<cast_spell_actor>( *this );
2369}
2370
2371void cast_spell_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
2372{
2373 no_fail = obj.get_bool( "no_fail" );
2374 item_spell = spell_id( obj.get_string( "spell_id" ) );
2375 spell_level = obj.get_int( "level" );
2376 need_worn = obj.get_bool( "need_worn", false );
2377 need_wielding = obj.get_bool( "need_wielding", false );
2378 mundane = obj.get_bool( "mundane", false );
2379}
2380
2381void cast_spell_actor::info( const item &, std::vector<iteminfo> &dump ) const
2382{
2383 if( mundane ) {
2384 const std::string message = string_format( _( "This item when activated: %1$s" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "This item when activated: %1$s"
) ) ),
2385 item_spell->description );
2386 dump.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", message );
2387 } else {
2388 //~ %1$s: spell name, %2$i: spell level
2389 const std::string message = string_format( _( "This item casts %1$s at level %2$i." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "This item casts %1$s at level %2$i."
) ) ),
2390 item_spell->name, spell_level );
2391 dump.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", message );
2392 if( no_fail ) {
2393 dump.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", _( "This item never fails." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "This item never fails." ) ) ) );
2394 }
2395 }
2396}
2397
2398std::string cast_spell_actor::get_name() const
2399{
2400 return mundane ? _( "Activate" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Activate" ) ) ) : _( "Cast spell" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Cast spell" ) ) );
2401}
2402
2403std::optional<int> cast_spell_actor::use( Character *p, item &it, const tripoint & ) const
2404{
2405 if( need_worn && !p->is_worn( it ) ) {
2406 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You need to wear the %1$s before activating it." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You need to wear the %1$s before activating it."
) ) ), it.tname() );
2407 return std::nullopt;
2408 }
2409 if( need_wielding && !p->is_wielding( it ) ) {
2410 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You need to wield the %1$s before activating it." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You need to wield the %1$s before activating it."
) ) ), it.tname() );
2411 return std::nullopt;
2412 }
2413
2414 spell casting = spell( spell_id( item_spell ) );
2415
2416 player_activity cast_spell( ACT_SPELLCASTING, casting.casting_time( *p ) );
2417 // [0] this is used as a spell level override for items casting spells
2418 cast_spell.values.emplace_back( spell_level );
2419 if( no_fail ) {
2420 // [1] if this value is 1, the spell never fails
2421 cast_spell.values.emplace_back( 1 );
2422 } else {
2423 // [1]
2424 cast_spell.values.emplace_back( 0 );
2425 }
2426 cast_spell.name = casting.id().c_str();
2427 if( it.has_flag( flag_USE_PLAYER_ENERGY ) ) {
2428 // [2] this value overrides the mana cost if set to 0
2429 cast_spell.values.emplace_back( 1 );
2430 } else {
2431 // [2]
2432 cast_spell.values.emplace_back( 0 );
2433 }
2434 p->assign_activity( cast_spell );
2435 p->activity.targets.emplace_back( *p, &it );
2436 // Actual handling of charges_to_use is in activity_handlers::spellcasting_finish
2437 return 0;
2438}
2439
2440std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> holster_actor::clone() const
2441{
2442 return std::make_unique<holster_actor>( *this );
2443}
2444
2445void holster_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
2446{
2447 obj.read( "holster_prompt", holster_prompt );
2448 obj.read( "holster_msg", holster_msg );
2449}
2450
2451bool holster_actor::can_holster( const item &holster, const item &obj ) const
2452{
2453 return obj.active ? false : holster.can_contain( obj ).success();
2454}
2455
2456bool holster_actor::store( Character &you, item &holster, item &obj ) const
2457{
2458 if( obj.is_null() || holster.is_null() ) {
2459 debugmsg( "Null item was passed to holster_actor" )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/iuse_actor.cpp"
, "2459", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Null item was passed to holster_actor"
);
2460 return false;
2461 }
2462
2463 const ret_val<void> contain = holster.can_contain( obj );
2464 if( !contain.success() ) {
2465 you.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, contain.str(), holster.tname(), obj.tname() );
2466 }
2467 if( obj.active ) {
2468 you.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You don't think putting your %1$s in your %2$s is a good idea" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You don't think putting your %1$s in your %2$s is a good idea"
) ) ),
2469 obj.tname(), holster.tname() );
2470 return false;
2471 }
2472 you.add_msg_if_player( holster_msg.empty() ? _( "You holster your %s" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You holster your %s" ) ) ) : holster_msg.translated(),
2473 obj.tname(), holster.tname() );
2474
2475 // holsters ignore penalty effects (e.g. GRABBED) when determining number of moves to consume
2476 you.as_character()->store( holster, obj, false, holster.obtain_cost( obj ),
2477 pocket_type::CONTAINER, true );
2478 return true;
2479}
2480
2481template<typename T>
2482static item_location form_loc_recursive( T &loc, item &it )
2483{
2484 item *parent = loc.find_parent( it );
2485 if( parent != nullptr ) {
2486 return item_location( form_loc_recursive( loc, *parent ), &it );
2487 }
2488
2489 return item_location( loc, &it );
2490}
2491
2492static item_location form_loc( Character &you, const tripoint &p, item &it )
2493{
2494 if( you.has_item( it ) ) {
2495 return form_loc_recursive( you, it );
2496 }
2497 map_cursor mc( p );
2498 if( mc.has_item( it ) ) {
2499 return form_loc_recursive( mc, it );
2500 }
2501 map &here = get_map();
2502 const optional_vpart_position vp = here.veh_at( p );
2503 if( vp ) {
2504 vehicle_cursor vc( vp->vehicle(), vp->part_index() );
2505 if( vc.has_item( it ) ) {
2506 return form_loc_recursive( vc, it );
2507 }
2508 }
2509
2510 debugmsg( "Couldn't find item %s to form item_location, forming dummy location to ensure minimum functionality",realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/iuse_actor.cpp"
, "2511", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Couldn't find item %s to form item_location, forming dummy location to ensure minimum functionality"
, it.display_name())
2511 it.display_name() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/iuse_actor.cpp"
, "2511", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Couldn't find item %s to form item_location, forming dummy location to ensure minimum functionality"
, it.display_name());
2512 return item_location( you, &it );
2513}
2514
2515std::optional<int> holster_actor::use( Character *you, item &it, const tripoint &p ) const
2516{
2517 if( you->is_wielding( it ) ) {
1
Assuming the condition is false
→
2
←
Taking false branch
→
2518 you->add_msg_if_player( _( "You need to unwield your %s before using it." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You need to unwield your %s before using it."
) ) ), it.tname() );
2519 return std::nullopt;
2520 }
2521
2522 int pos = 0;
2523 std::vector<std::string> opts;
2524
2525 std::string prompt = holster_prompt.empty() ? _( "Holster item" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Holster item" ) ) ) : holster_prompt.translated();
3
←
Assuming the condition is false
→
4
←
'?' condition is false
→
2526 opts.push_back( prompt );
2527 pos = -1;
2528 std::list<item *> all_items = it.all_items_top(
2529 pocket_type::CONTAINER );
2530 std::transform( all_items.begin(), all_items.end(), std::back_inserter( opts ),
2531 []( const item * elem ) {
2532 return string_format( _( "Draw %s" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Draw %s" ) ) ), elem->display_name() );
2533 } );
2534
2535 item *internal_item = nullptr;
2536 if( opts.size() > 1 ) {
5
←
Assuming the condition is true
→
6
←
Taking true branch
→
2537 int ret = uilist( string_format( _( "Use %s" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Use %s" ) ) ), it.tname() ), opts );
2538 if( ret < 0 ) {
7
←
Assuming 'ret' is >= 0
→
8
←
Taking false branch
→
2539 pos = -2;
2540 } else {
2541 pos += ret;
2542 if( opts.size() != it.num_item_stacks() ) {
9
←
Assuming the condition is false
→
10
←
Taking false branch
→
2543 ret--;
2544 }
2545 auto iter = std::next( all_items.begin(), ret );
2546 internal_item = *iter;
11
←
Past-the-end iterator dereferenced
2547 }
2548 } else {
2549 if( !all_items.empty() ) {
2550 internal_item = all_items.front();
2551 }
2552 }
2553
2554 if( pos < -1 ) {
2555 you->add_msg_if_player( _( "Never mind." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Never mind." ) ) ) );
2556 return std::nullopt;
2557 }
2558
2559 if( pos >= 0 ) {
2560 item_location weapon = you->get_wielded_item();
2561 if( weapon && weapon.get_item()->has_flag( flag_NO_UNWIELD ) ) {
2562 you->add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "You can't unwield your %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You can't unwield your %s." )
) ), weapon.get_item()->tname() );
2563 return std::nullopt;
2564 }
2565
2566 // worn holsters ignore penalty effects (e.g. GRABBED) when determining number of moves to consume
2567 if( you->is_worn( it ) ) {
2568 you->wield_contents( it, internal_item, false, it.obtain_cost( *internal_item ) );
2569 } else {
2570 you->wield_contents( it, internal_item );
2571 }
2572
2573 } else {
2574 if( you->as_avatar() == nullptr ) {
2575 return std::nullopt;
2576 }
2577
2578 // iuse_actor really needs to work with item_location
2579 item_location item_loc = form_loc( *you, p, it );
2580 game_menus::inv::insert_items( *you->as_avatar(), item_loc );
2581 }
2582
2583 return 0;
2584}
2585
2586void holster_actor::info( const item &, std::vector<iteminfo> &dump ) const
2587{
2588 std::string message = _( "Can be activated to store suitable items." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Can be activated to store suitable items."
) ) );
2589 dump.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", message );
2590}
2591
2592std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> ammobelt_actor::clone() const
2593{
2594 return std::make_unique<ammobelt_actor>( *this );
2595}
2596
2597void ammobelt_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
2598{
2599 belt = itype_id( obj.get_string( "belt" ) );
2600}
2601
2602void ammobelt_actor::info( const item &, std::vector<iteminfo> &dump ) const
2603{
2604 dump.emplace_back( "AMMO", string_format( _( "Can be used to assemble: %s" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Can be used to assemble: %s"
) ) ),
2605 item::nname( belt ) ) );
2606}
2607
2608std::optional<int> ammobelt_actor::use( Character *p, item &, const tripoint & ) const
2609{
2610 item mag( belt );
2611 mag.ammo_unset();
2612
2613 if( p->rate_action_reload( mag ) != hint_rating::good ) {
2614 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "Insufficient ammunition to assemble %s" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Insufficient ammunition to assemble %s"
) ) ), mag.tname() );
2615 return std::nullopt;
2616 }
2617
2618 item_location loc = p->i_add( mag );
2619 item::reload_option opt = p->select_ammo( loc, true );
2620 if( opt ) {
2621 p->assign_activity( reload_activity_actor( std::move( opt ) ) );
2622 } else {
2623 loc.remove_item();
2624 }
2625
2626 return 0;
2627}
2628
2629void repair_item_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
2630{
2631 // Mandatory:
2632 for( const std::string line : obj.get_array( "materials" ) ) {
2633 materials.emplace( line );
2634 }
2635
2636 // TODO: Make skill non-mandatory while still erroring on invalid skill
2637 const std::string skill_string = obj.get_string( "skill" );
2638 used_skill = skill_id( skill_string );
2639 if( !used_skill.is_valid() ) {
2640 obj.throw_error_at( "skill", "Invalid skill" );
2641 }
2642
2643 cost_scaling = obj.get_float( "cost_scaling" );
2644
2645 // Optional
2646 tool_quality = obj.get_int( "tool_quality", 0 );
2647 move_cost = obj.get_int( "move_cost", 500 );
2648 trains_skill_to = obj.get_int( "trains_skill_to", 5 ) - 1;
2649}
2650
2651bool repair_item_actor::can_use_tool( const Character &p, const item &tool, bool print_msg ) const
2652{
2653 if( p.has_effect( effect_incorporeal ) ) {
2654 if( print_msg ) {
2655 p.add_msg_player_or_npc( m_bad, _( "You can't do that while incorporeal." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You can't do that while incorporeal."
) ) ),
2656 _( "<npcname> can't do that while incorporeal." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<npcname> can't do that while incorporeal."
) ) ) );
2657 }
2658 return false;
2659 }
2660 if( p.cant_do_underwater( print_msg ) ) {
2661 return false;
2662 }
2663 if( p.cant_do_mounted( print_msg ) ) {
2664 return false;
2665 }
2666 if( p.fine_detail_vision_mod() > 4 ) {
2667 if( print_msg ) {
2668 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You can't see to do that!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You can't see to do that!" )
) ) );
2669 }
2670 return false;
2671 }
2672 if( !tool.ammo_sufficient( &p ) ) {
2673 if( print_msg ) {
2674 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "Your tool does not have enough charges to do that." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your tool does not have enough charges to do that."
) ) ) );
2675 }
2676 return false;
2677 }
2678
2679 return true;
2680}
2681
2682static item_location get_item_location( Character &p, item &it, const tripoint &pos )
2683{
2684 // Item on a character
2685 if( p.has_item( it ) ) {
2686 return item_location( p, &it );
2687 }
2688
2689 // Item in a vehicle
2690 if( const optional_vpart_position &vp = get_map().veh_at( pos ) ) {
2691 vehicle_cursor vc( vp->vehicle(), vp->part_index() );
2692 bool found_in_vehicle = false;
2693 vc.visit_items( [&]( const item * e, item * ) {
2694 if( e == &it ) {
2695 found_in_vehicle = true;
2696 return VisitResponse::ABORT;
2697 }
2698 return VisitResponse::NEXT;
2699 } );
2700 if( found_in_vehicle ) {
2701 return item_location( vc, &it );
2702 }
2703 }
2704
2705 // Item on the map
2706 return item_location( map_cursor( pos ), &it );
2707}
2708
2709std::optional<int> repair_item_actor::use( Character *p, item &it,
2710 const tripoint &position ) const
2711{
2712 if( !can_use_tool( *p, it, true ) ) {
2713 return std::nullopt;
2714 }
2715
2716 p->assign_activity( ACT_REPAIR_ITEM, 0, p->get_item_position( &it ), INT_MIN(-2147483647 -1) );
2717 // We also need to store the repair actor subtype in the activity
2718 p->activity.str_values.push_back( type );
2719 // storing of item_location to support repairs by tools on the ground
2720 p->activity.targets.emplace_back( get_item_location( *p, it, position ) );
2721 // All repairs are done in the activity, including charge cost and target item selection
2722 return 0;
2723}
2724
2725std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> repair_item_actor::clone() const
2726{
2727 return std::make_unique<repair_item_actor>( *this );
2728}
2729
2730std::set<itype_id> repair_item_actor::get_valid_repair_materials( const item &fix ) const
2731{
2732 std::set<itype_id> valid_entries;
2733 for( const auto &mat : materials ) {
2734 if( fix.can_repair_with( mat ) ) {
2735 const itype_id &component_id = mat.obj().repaired_with();
2736 // Certain (different!) materials are repaired with the same components (steel, iron, hard steel use scrap metal).
2737 // This checks avoids adding the same component twice, which is annoying to the user.
2738 if( valid_entries.find( component_id ) != valid_entries.end() ) {
2739 continue;
2740 }
2741 valid_entries.insert( component_id );
2742 }
2743 }
2744 return valid_entries;
2745}
2746
2747bool repair_item_actor::handle_components( Character &pl, const item &fix,
2748 bool print_msg, bool just_check, bool check_consumed_available ) const
2749{
2750 // Entries valid for repaired items
2751 std::set<itype_id> valid_entries = get_valid_repair_materials( fix );
2752
2753 if( valid_entries.empty() ) {
2754 if( print_msg ) {
2755 pl.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "Your %s is not made of any of:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your %s is not made of any of:"
) ) ),
2756 fix.tname() );
2757 for( const auto &mat_name : materials ) {
2758 const material_type &mat = mat_name.obj();
2759 pl.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "%s (repaired using %s)" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%s (repaired using %s)" ) ) ), mat.name(),
2760 item::nname( mat.repaired_with(), 2 ) );
2761 }
2762 }
2763
2764 return false;
2765 }
2766
2767 const inventory &crafting_inv = pl.crafting_inventory();
2768
2769 // Repairing or modifying items requires at least 1 repair item,
2770 // otherwise number is related to size of item
2771 // Round up if checking, but roll if actually consuming
2772 // TODO: should 250_ml be part of the cost_scaling?
2773 const int items_needed = std::max<int>( 1, just_check ?
2774 std::ceil( fix.base_volume() / 250_ml * cost_scaling ) :
2775 roll_remainder( fix.base_volume() / 250_ml * cost_scaling ) );
2776
2777 std::function<bool( const item & )> filter;
2778 if( fix.is_filthy() ) {
2779 filter = []( const item & component ) {
2780 return component.allow_crafting_component();
2781 };
2782 } else {
2783 filter = is_crafting_component;
2784 }
2785
2786 // Go through all discovered repair items and see if we have any of them available
2787 std::vector<item_comp> comps;
2788 for( const itype_id &component_id : valid_entries ) {
2789 if( item::count_by_charges( component_id ) ) {
2790 if( crafting_inv.has_charges( component_id, items_needed ) ) {
2791 comps.emplace_back( component_id, items_needed );
2792 }
2793 } else if( crafting_inv.has_amount( component_id, items_needed, false, filter ) ) {
2794 comps.emplace_back( component_id, items_needed );
2795 }
2796 }
2797
2798 if( check_consumed_available && comps.empty() ) {
2799 if( print_msg ) {
2800 for( const itype_id &mat_comp : valid_entries ) {
2801 pl.add_msg_if_player( m_info,
2802 _( "You don't have enough clean %s to do that. Have: %d, need: %d" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You don't have enough clean %s to do that. Have: %d, need: %d"
) ) ),
2803 item::nname( mat_comp, 2 ),
2804 item::find_type( mat_comp )->count_by_charges() ?
2805 crafting_inv.charges_of( mat_comp, items_needed ) :
2806 crafting_inv.amount_of( mat_comp, false ),
2807 items_needed );
2808 }
2809 }
2810
2811 return false;
2812 }
2813
2814 if( !just_check ) {
2815 if( comps.empty() ) {
2816 // This shouldn't happen - the check in can_repair_target should prevent it
2817 // But report it, just in case
2818 debugmsg( "Attempted repair with no components" )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/iuse_actor.cpp"
, "2818", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Attempted repair with no components"
);
2819 }
2820
2821 pl.consume_items( comps, 1, filter );
2822 }
2823
2824 return true;
2825}
2826
2827// Find the difficulty of the recipe for the item type.
2828// Base difficulty is the repair difficulty of the hardest thing to repair it is made of.
2829// if the training variable is true, then we're just repairing the easiest part of the thing.
2830// so instead take the easiest thing to repair it is made of.
2831static std::pair<int, bool> find_repair_difficulty( const itype &it )
2832{
2833 int difficulty = -1;
2834 bool difficulty_defined = false;
2835
2836 if( !it.materials.empty() ) {
2837 for( const auto &mats : it.materials ) {
2838 if( mats.first->repair_difficulty() && difficulty < mats.first->repair_difficulty() ) {
2839 difficulty = mats.first->repair_difficulty();
2840 difficulty_defined = true;
2841 }
2842 }
2843 }
2844
2845 return { difficulty, difficulty_defined };
2846}
2847
2848// Returns the level of the most difficult material to repair in the item
2849// Or if it has a repairs_like, the lowest level recipe that results in that.
2850// If none exist the difficulty is 10
2851int repair_item_actor::repair_recipe_difficulty( const item &fix ) const
2852{
2853 std::pair<int, bool> ret;
2854 ret = find_repair_difficulty( *fix.type );
2855 int diff = ret.first;
2856 bool defined = ret.second;
2857
2858 // See if there's a repairs_like that has a defined difficulty
2859 if( !defined && !fix.type->repairs_like.is_empty() ) {
2860 ret = find_repair_difficulty( fix.type->repairs_like.obj() );
2861 if( ret.second ) {
2862 diff = ret.first;
2863 defined = true;
2864 }
2865 }
2866
2867 // If we still don't find a difficulty, difficulty is 10
2868 if( !defined ) {
2869 diff = 10;
2870 }
2871
2872 return diff;
2873}
2874
2875bool repair_item_actor::can_repair_target( Character &pl, const item &fix, bool print_msg,
2876 bool check_consumed_available ) const
2877{
2878 // In some rare cases (indices getting scrambled after inventory overflow)
2879 // our `fix` can be a different item.
2880 if( fix.is_null() ) {
2881 if( print_msg ) {
2882 pl.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You do not have that item!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You do not have that item!" )
) ) );
2883 }
2884 return false;
2885 }
2886 if( fix.is_firearm() ) {
2887 if( print_msg ) {
2888 pl.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "That requires gunsmithing tools." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "That requires gunsmithing tools."
) ) ) );
2889 }
2890 return false;
2891 }
2892 if( fix.count_by_charges() || fix.has_flag( flag_NO_REPAIR ) ) {
2893 if( print_msg ) {
2894 pl.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You cannot repair this type of item." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You cannot repair this type of item."
) ) ) );
2895 }
2896 return false;
2897 }
2898
2899 if( any_of( materials.begin(), materials.end(), [&fix]( const material_id & mat ) {
2900 return mat.obj()
2901 .repaired_with() == fix.typeId();
2902 } ) ) {
2903 if( print_msg ) {
2904 pl.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "This can be used to repair other items, not itself." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "This can be used to repair other items, not itself."
) ) ) );
2905 }
2906 return false;
2907 }
2908
2909 if( !handle_components( pl, fix, print_msg, true, check_consumed_available ) ) {
2910 return false;
2911 }
2912
2913 const bool can_be_refitted = fix.has_flag( flag_VARSIZE );
2914 if( can_be_refitted && !fix.has_flag( flag_FIT ) ) {
2915 return true;
2916 }
2917
2918 const bool resizing_matters = fix.get_sizing( pl ) != item::sizing::ignore;
2919 const bool small = pl.get_size() == creature_size::tiny;
2920 const bool can_resize = small != fix.has_flag( flag_UNDERSIZE );
2921 if( can_be_refitted && resizing_matters && can_resize ) {
2922 return true;
2923 }
2924
2925 if( fix.damage() > fix.degradation() ) {
2926 return true;
2927 }
2928
2929 if( print_msg ) {
2930 pl.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You cannot improve your %s any more this way." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You cannot improve your %s any more this way."
) ) ), fix.tname() );
2931 }
2932 return false;
2933}
2934
2935std::pair<float, float> repair_item_actor::repair_chance(
2936 const Character &pl, const item &fix, repair_item_actor::repair_type action_type ) const
2937{
2938 /** @EFFECT_TAILOR randomly improves clothing repair efforts */
2939 /** @EFFECT_MECHANICS randomly improves metal repair efforts */
2940 const float skill = pl.get_skill_level( used_skill );
2941 const int material_difficulty = repair_recipe_difficulty( fix );
2942 int action_difficulty = 0;
2943 switch( action_type ) {
2944 case RT_NOTHING: /* fallthrough */
2945 case RT_DOWNSIZING: /* fallthrough */
2946 case RT_UPSIZING:
2947 break;
2948 case RT_REPAIR:
2949 action_difficulty = fix.damage_level();
2950 break;
2951 case RT_REFIT:
2952 // Let's make refitting as hard as recovering an almost-wrecked item
2953 action_difficulty = fix.max_damage() / itype::damage_scale;
2954 break;
2955 case RT_PRACTICE:
2956 // Skill gain scales with recipe difficulty, so practice difficulty should too
2957 action_difficulty = material_difficulty;
2958 break;
2959 default:
2960 // 5 is obsoleted reinforcing, remove after 0.H
2961 action_difficulty = 1'000'000; // ensure failure
2962 break;
2963 }
2964
2965 const int difficulty = material_difficulty + action_difficulty;
2966 // Sample numbers - cotton and wool have diff 1, plastic diff 3 and kevlar diff 4:
2967 // This assumes that training is false, and under almost all circumstances that should be the case
2968 // Item | Damage | Skill | Dex | Success | Failure
2969 // Hoodie | 1 | 0 | 8 | 4.0% | 1.4%
2970 // Hoodie | Refit | 0 | 8 | 2.0% | 2.4%
2971 // Hoodie | Refit | 2 | 8 | 6.0% | 0.4%
2972 // Hoodie | Refit | 2 | 12 | 6.0% | 0.0%
2973 // Hoodie | Refit | 4 | 8 | 10.0% | 0.0%
2974 // Socks | 3 | 0 | 8 | 2.0% | 2.4%
2975 // Boots | 1 | 0 | 8 | 0.0% | 3.4%
2976 // Raincoat | Refit | 2 | 8 | 2.0% | 2.4%
2977 // Raincoat | Refit | 2 | 12 | 2.0% | 1.6%
2978 // Ski mask | Refit | 2 | 8 | 4.0% | 1.4%
2979 // Raincoat | Refit | 2 | 8 | 4.0% | 1.4%
2980 // Turnout | Refit | 2 | 8 | 0.0% | 4.4%
2981 // Turnout | Refit | 4 | 8 | 2.0% | 2.4%
2982
2983 float success_chance = ( 10 + 2 * skill - 2 * difficulty + tool_quality / 5.0f ) / 100.0f;
2984 /** @EFFECT_DEX reduces the chances of damaging an item when repairing */
2985 float damage_chance = ( difficulty - skill - ( tool_quality + pl.dex_cur ) / 5.0f ) / 100.0f;
2986
2987 damage_chance = std::max( 0.0f, std::min( 1.0f, damage_chance ) );
2988 success_chance = std::max( 0.0f, std::min( 1.0f - damage_chance, success_chance ) );
2989
2990 return std::make_pair( success_chance, damage_chance );
2991}
2992
2993repair_item_actor::repair_type repair_item_actor::default_action( const item &fix,
2994 int current_skill_level ) const
2995{
2996 if( fix.damage() > fix.degradation() ) {
2997 return RT_REPAIR;
2998 }
2999
3000 const bool can_be_refitted = fix.has_flag( flag_VARSIZE );
3001 const bool doesnt_fit = !fix.has_flag( flag_FIT );
3002 if( doesnt_fit && can_be_refitted ) {
3003 return RT_REFIT;
3004 }
3005
3006 Character &player_character = get_player_character();
3007 const bool smol = player_character.get_size() == creature_size::tiny;
3008
3009 const bool is_undersized = fix.has_flag( flag_UNDERSIZE );
3010 const bool is_oversized = fix.has_flag( flag_OVERSIZE );
3011 const bool resizing_matters = fix.get_sizing( player_character ) != item::sizing::ignore;
3012
3013 const bool too_big_while_smol = smol && !is_undersized && !is_oversized;
3014 if( too_big_while_smol && can_be_refitted && resizing_matters ) {
3015 return RT_DOWNSIZING;
3016 }
3017
3018 const bool too_small_while_big = !smol && is_undersized && !is_oversized;
3019 if( too_small_while_big && can_be_refitted && resizing_matters ) {
3020 return RT_UPSIZING;
3021 }
3022
3023 if( current_skill_level <= trains_skill_to ) {
3024 return RT_PRACTICE;
3025 }
3026
3027 return RT_NOTHING;
3028}
3029
3030static bool damage_item( Character &pl, item_location &fix )
3031{
3032 const std::string startdurability = fix->durability_indicator( true );
3033 const bool destroyed = fix->inc_damage();
3034 const std::string resultdurability = fix->durability_indicator( true );
3035 pl.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "You damage your %s! ( %s-> %s)" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You damage your %s! ( %s-> %s)"
) ) ), fix->tname( 1, false ),
3036 startdurability, resultdurability );
3037 if( destroyed ) {
3038 pl.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "You destroy it!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You destroy it!" ) ) ) );
3039 if( fix.where() == item_location::type::character ) {
3040 pl.i_rem_keep_contents( fix.get_item() );
3041 } else {
3042 for( const item *it : fix->all_items_top() ) {
3043 if( it->has_flag( flag_NO_DROP ) ) {
3044 continue;
3045 }
3046 put_into_vehicle_or_drop( pl, item_drop_reason::tumbling, { *it }, fix.pos_bub() );
3047 }
3048 fix.remove_item();
3049 }
3050
3051 pl.calc_encumbrance();
3052 pl.calc_discomfort();
3053
3054 return true;
3055 }
3056
3057 return false;
3058}
3059
3060repair_item_actor::attempt_hint repair_item_actor::repair( Character &pl, item &tool,
3061 item_location &fix, bool refit_only ) const
3062{
3063 if( !can_use_tool( pl, tool, true ) ) {
3064 return AS_CANT_USE_TOOL;
3065 }
3066 if( !can_repair_target( pl, *fix, true, true ) ) {
3067 return AS_CANT;
3068 }
3069
3070 const int current_skill_level = pl.get_skill_level( used_skill );
3071 repair_item_actor::repair_type action;
3072 if( refit_only ) {
3073 if( fix->has_flag( flag_FIT ) ) {
3074 pl.add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "The %s already fits!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "The %s already fits!" ) ) ), fix->tname() );
3075 return AS_CANT;
3076 } else if( !fix->has_flag( flag_VARSIZE ) ) {
3077 pl.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "This %s cannot be refitted!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "This %s cannot be refitted!"
) ) ), fix->tname() );
3078 return AS_CANT;
3079 } else {
3080 action = RT_REFIT;
3081 }
3082 } else {
3083 action = default_action( *fix, current_skill_level );
3084 }
3085 const auto chance = repair_chance( pl, *fix, action );
3086 int practice_amount = repair_recipe_difficulty( *fix ) / 2 + 1;
3087 float roll_value = rng_float( 0.0, 1.0 );
3088 enum roll_result {
3089 SUCCESS,
3090 FAILURE,
3091 NEUTRAL
3092 } roll;
3093
3094 if( roll_value > 1.0f - chance.second ) {
3095 roll = FAILURE;
3096 } else if( roll_value < chance.first ) {
3097 roll = SUCCESS;
3098 } else {
3099 roll = NEUTRAL;
3100 }
3101
3102 if( action == RT_NOTHING ) {
3103 pl.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "You won't learn anything more by doing that." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You won't learn anything more by doing that."
) ) ) );
3104 return AS_CANT;
3105 }
3106
3107 // If not for this if, it would spam a lot
3108 if( current_skill_level > trains_skill_to ) {
3109 practice_amount = 0;
3110 }
3111 pl.practice( used_skill, practice_amount, trains_skill_to );
3112
3113 if( roll == FAILURE ) {
3114 if( chance.first <= 0.0f ) {
3115 pl.add_msg_if_player( m_bad,
3116 _( "It seems working on your %s is just beyond your current level of expertise." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "It seems working on your %s is just beyond your current level of expertise."
) ) ),
3117 fix->tname() );
3118 }
3119 return damage_item( pl, fix ) ? AS_DESTROYED : AS_FAILURE;
3120 }
3121
3122 if( action == RT_PRACTICE ) {
3123 return AS_RETRY;
3124 }
3125
3126 if( action == RT_REPAIR ) {
3127 if( roll == SUCCESS ) {
3128 const std::string startdurability = fix->durability_indicator( true );
3129 handle_components( pl, *fix, false, false, true );
3130
3131 fix->mod_damage( -itype::damage_scale );
3132
3133 const std::string resultdurability = fix->durability_indicator( true );
3134 if( fix->repairable_levels() ) {
3135 pl.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You repair your %s! ( %s-> %s)" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You repair your %s! ( %s-> %s)"
) ) ),
3136 fix->tname( 1, false ), startdurability, resultdurability );
3137 } else {
3138 pl.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You repair your %s completely! ( %s-> %s)" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You repair your %s completely! ( %s-> %s)"
) ) ),
3139 fix->tname( 1, false ), startdurability, resultdurability );
3140 }
3141 return AS_SUCCESS;
3142 }
3143
3144 return AS_RETRY;
3145 }
3146
3147 if( action == RT_REFIT ) {
3148 if( roll == SUCCESS ) {
3149 if( !fix->has_flag( flag_FIT ) ) {
3150 pl.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You take your %s in, improving the fit." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You take your %s in, improving the fit."
) ) ),
3151 fix->tname() );
3152 fix->set_flag( flag_FIT );
3153
3154 pl.calc_encumbrance();
3155 }
3156 handle_components( pl, *fix, false, false, true );
3157 return AS_SUCCESS;
3158 }
3159
3160 return AS_RETRY;
3161 }
3162
3163 if( action == RT_DOWNSIZING ) {
3164 //We don't need to check for smallness or undersize because DOWNSIZING already guarantees that
3165 if( roll == SUCCESS ) {
3166 pl.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You resize the %s to accommodate your tiny build." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You resize the %s to accommodate your tiny build."
) ) ),
3167 fix->tname().c_str() );
3168 fix->set_flag( flag_UNDERSIZE );
3169 pl.calc_encumbrance();
3170 handle_components( pl, *fix, false, false, true );
3171 return AS_SUCCESS;
3172 }
3173 return AS_RETRY;
3174 }
3175
3176 if( action == RT_UPSIZING ) {
3177 //We don't need to check for smallness or undersize because UPSIZING already guarantees that
3178 if( roll == SUCCESS ) {
3179 pl.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You adjust the %s back to its normal size." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You adjust the %s back to its normal size."
) ) ),
3180 fix->tname().c_str() );
3181 fix->unset_flag( flag_UNDERSIZE );
3182 pl.calc_encumbrance();
3183 handle_components( pl, *fix, false, false, true );
3184 return AS_SUCCESS;
3185 }
3186 return AS_RETRY;
3187 }
3188
3189 pl.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You cannot improve your %s any more this way." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You cannot improve your %s any more this way."
) ) ), fix->tname() );
3190 return AS_CANT;
3191}
3192
3193std::string repair_item_actor::action_description( repair_item_actor::repair_type rt )
3194{
3195 static const std::array<std::string, NUM_REPAIR_TYPES> arr = {{
3196 translate_marker( "Nothing" )"Nothing",
3197 translate_marker( "Repairing" )"Repairing",
3198 translate_marker( "Refitting" )"Refitting",
3199 translate_marker( "Downsizing" )"Downsizing",
3200 translate_marker( "Upsizing" )"Upsizing",
3201 "Obsolete",
3202 translate_marker( "Practicing" )"Practicing"
3203 }
3204 };
3205
3206 return _( arr[rt] )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( arr[rt] ) ) );
3207}
3208
3209std::string repair_item_actor::get_name() const
3210{
3211 return _( "Repair" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Repair" ) ) );
3212}
3213
3214std::string repair_item_actor::get_description() const
3215{
3216 const std::string mats = enumerate_as_string( materials.begin(), materials.end(),
3217 []( const material_id & mid ) {
3218 return mid->name();
3219 } );
3220 return string_format( _( "Repair %s" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Repair %s" ) ) ), mats );
3221}
3222
3223void heal_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
3224{
3225 // Mandatory
3226 move_cost = obj.get_int( "move_cost" );
3227 limb_power = obj.get_float( "limb_power", 0 );
3228
3229 // Optional
3230 bandages_power = obj.get_float( "bandages_power", 0 );
3231 bandages_scaling = obj.get_float( "bandages_scaling", 0.25f * bandages_power );
3232 disinfectant_power = obj.get_float( "disinfectant_power", 0 );
3233 disinfectant_scaling = obj.get_float( "disinfectant_scaling", 0.25f * disinfectant_power );
3234
3235 head_power = obj.get_float( "head_power", 0.8f * limb_power );
3236 torso_power = obj.get_float( "torso_power", 1.5f * limb_power );
3237
3238 limb_scaling = obj.get_float( "limb_scaling", 0.25f * limb_power );
3239 double scaling_ratio = limb_power < 0.0001f ? 0.0 :
3240 static_cast<double>( limb_scaling / limb_power );
3241 head_scaling = obj.get_float( "head_scaling", scaling_ratio * head_power );
3242 torso_scaling = obj.get_float( "torso_scaling", scaling_ratio * torso_power );
3243
3244 bleed = obj.get_int( "bleed", 0 );
3245 bite = obj.get_float( "bite", 0.0f );
3246 infect = obj.get_float( "infect", 0.0f );
3247
3248 if( obj.has_array( "effects" ) ) {
3249 for( const JsonObject e : obj.get_array( "effects" ) ) {
3250 effects.push_back( load_effect_data( e ) );
3251 }
3252 }
3253
3254 if( obj.has_string( "used_up_item" ) ) {
3255 obj.read( "used_up_item", used_up_item_id, true );
3256 } else if( obj.has_object( "used_up_item" ) ) {
3257 JsonObject u = obj.get_object( "used_up_item" );
3258 u.read( "id", used_up_item_id, true );
3259 used_up_item_quantity = u.get_int( "quantity", used_up_item_quantity );
3260 used_up_item_charges = u.get_int( "charges", used_up_item_charges );
3261 used_up_item_flags = u.get_tags<flag_id>( "flags" );
3262 }
3263}
3264
3265static Character &get_patient( Character &healer, const tripoint &pos )
3266{
3267 if( healer.pos() == pos ) {
3268 return healer;
3269 }
3270
3271 Character *const person = get_creature_tracker().creature_at<Character>( pos );
3272 if( !person ) {
3273 // Default to heal self on failure not to break old functionality
3274 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_IUSE, "No heal target at position %d,%d,%d", pos.x, pos.y, pos.z )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_IUSE ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "No heal target at position %d,%d,%d"
, pos.x, pos.y, pos.z ) ) ); } } while( false );
3275 return healer;
3276 }
3277
3278 return *person;
3279}
3280
3281std::optional<int> heal_actor::use( Character *p, item &it, const tripoint &pos ) const
3282{
3283 if( p->cant_do_underwater() ) {
3284 return std::nullopt;
3285 }
3286 if( p->cant_do_mounted() ) {
3287 return std::nullopt;
3288 }
3289 if( it.is_filthy() ) {
3290 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You can't use filthy items for healing." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You can't use filthy items for healing."
) ) ) );
3291 return std::nullopt;
3292 }
3293
3294 Character &patient = get_patient( *p, pos );
3295 const bodypart_str_id hpp = use_healing_item( *p, patient, it, false ).id();
3296 if( hpp == bodypart_str_id::NULL_ID() ) {
3297 return std::nullopt;
3298 }
3299
3300 // each tier of proficiency cuts required time by half
3301 int cost = move_cost;
3302 cost = p->has_proficiency( proficiency_prof_wound_care_expert ) ? cost / 2 : cost;
3303 cost = p->has_proficiency( proficiency_prof_wound_care ) ? cost / 2 : cost;
3304
3305 p->assign_activity( firstaid_activity_actor( cost, it.tname(), patient.getID() ) );
3306
3307 // Player: Only time this item_location gets used in firstaid::finish() is when activating the item's
3308 // container from the inventory window, so an item_on_person impl is all that is needed.
3309 // Otherwise the proper item_location provided by menu selection supercedes it in consume::finish().
3310 // NPC: Will only use its inventory for first aid items.
3311 p->activity.targets.emplace_back( *p, &it );
3312 p->activity.str_values.emplace_back( hpp.c_str() );
3313 p->moves = 0;
3314 return 0;
3315}
3316
3317std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> heal_actor::clone() const
3318{
3319 return std::make_unique<heal_actor>( *this );
3320}
3321
3322int heal_actor::get_heal_value( const Character &healer, bodypart_id healed ) const
3323{
3324 int heal_base;
3325 float bonus_mult;
3326 if( healed == bodypart_id( "head" ) ) {
3327 heal_base = head_power;
3328 bonus_mult = head_scaling;
3329 } else if( healed == bodypart_id( "torso" ) ) {
3330 heal_base = torso_power;
3331 bonus_mult = torso_scaling;
3332 } else {
3333 heal_base = limb_power;
3334 bonus_mult = limb_scaling;
3335 }
3336
3337 if( heal_base > 0 ) {
3338 /** @EFFECT_FIRSTAID increases healing item effects */
3339 return round( heal_base + bonus_mult * healer.get_skill_level( skill_firstaid ) );
3340 }
3341
3342 return heal_base;
3343}
3344
3345int heal_actor::get_bandaged_level( const Character &healer ) const
3346{
3347 if( bandages_power > 0 ) {
3348 float prof_bonus = healer.get_skill_level( skill_firstaid );
3349 prof_bonus = healer.has_proficiency( proficiency_prof_wound_care ) ?
3350 prof_bonus + 1 : prof_bonus;
3351 prof_bonus = healer.has_proficiency( proficiency_prof_wound_care_expert ) ?
3352 prof_bonus + 2 : prof_bonus;
3353 /** @EFFECT_FIRSTAID increases healing item effects */
3354 float total_bonus = bandages_power + bandages_scaling * prof_bonus;
3355 total_bonus = healer.enchantment_cache->modify_value( enchant_vals::mod::BANDAGE_BONUS,
3356 total_bonus );
3357 return round( total_bonus );
3358 }
3359
3360 return bandages_power;
3361}
3362
3363int heal_actor::get_disinfected_level( const Character &healer ) const
3364{
3365 if( disinfectant_power > 0 ) {
3366 /** @EFFECT_FIRSTAID increases healing item effects */
3367 float prof_bonus = healer.get_skill_level( skill_firstaid );
3368 prof_bonus = healer.has_proficiency( proficiency_prof_wound_care ) ?
3369 prof_bonus + 1 : prof_bonus;
3370 prof_bonus = healer.has_proficiency( proficiency_prof_wound_care_expert ) ?
3371 prof_bonus + 2 : prof_bonus;
3372 float total_bonus = disinfectant_power + disinfectant_scaling * prof_bonus;
3373 total_bonus = healer.enchantment_cache->modify_value( enchant_vals::mod::DISINFECTANT_BONUS,
3374 total_bonus );
3375 return round( total_bonus );
3376 }
3377
3378 return disinfectant_power;
3379}
3380
3381int heal_actor::get_stopbleed_level( const Character &healer ) const
3382{
3383 if( bleed > 0 ) {
3384 /** @EFFECT_FIRSTAID increases healing item effects */
3385 float prof_bonus = healer.get_skill_level( skill_firstaid ) / 2;
3386 prof_bonus = healer.has_proficiency( proficiency_prof_wound_care ) ?
3387 prof_bonus + 1 : prof_bonus;
3388 prof_bonus = healer.has_proficiency( proficiency_prof_wound_care_expert ) ?
3389 prof_bonus + 2 : prof_bonus;
3390 float total_bonus = bleed * prof_bonus;
3391 total_bonus = healer.enchantment_cache->modify_value( enchant_vals::mod::BLEED_STOP_BONUS,
3392 total_bonus );
3393 return round( total_bonus );
3394 }
3395
3396 return bleed;
3397}
3398
3399int heal_actor::finish_using( Character &healer, Character &patient, item &it,
3400 bodypart_id healed ) const
3401{
3402 float practice_amount = limb_power * 3.0f;
3403 const int dam = get_heal_value( healer, healed );
3404 const int cur_hp = patient.get_part_hp_cur( healed );
3405
3406 if( ( cur_hp >= 1 ) && ( dam > 0 ) ) { // Prevent first-aid from mending limbs
3407 patient.heal( healed, dam );
3408 } else if( ( cur_hp >= 1 ) && ( dam < 0 ) ) {
3409 patient.apply_damage( nullptr, healed, -dam ); //hurt takes + damage
3410 }
3411
3412 Character &player_character = get_player_character();
3413 const bool u_see = healer.is_avatar() || patient.is_avatar() ||
3414 player_character.sees( healer ) || player_character.sees( patient );
3415 const bool player_healing_player = healer.is_avatar() && patient.is_avatar();
3416 // Need a helper here - messages are from healer's point of view
3417 // but it would be cool if NPCs could use this function too
3418 const auto heal_msg = [&]( game_message_type msg_type,
3419 const char *player_player_msg, const char *other_msg ) {
3420 if( !u_see ) {
3421 return;
3422 }
3423
3424 if( player_healing_player ) {
3425 add_msg( msg_type, player_player_msg );
3426 } else {
3427 add_msg( msg_type, other_msg );
3428 }
3429 };
3430
3431 if( patient.has_effect( effect_bleed, healed ) ) {
3432 // small band-aids won't stop big arterial bleeding, but with tourniquet they just might
3433 int pwr = 3 * get_stopbleed_level( healer );
3434 if( patient.worn_with_flag( flag_TOURNIQUET, healed ) ) {
3435 pwr *= 2;
3436 }
3437 if( pwr > patient.get_effect_int( effect_bleed, healed ) ) {
3438 effect &wound = patient.get_effect( effect_bleed, healed );
3439 time_duration dur = wound.get_duration() - ( get_stopbleed_level( healer ) *
3440 wound.get_int_dur_factor() );
3441 wound.set_duration( std::max( 0_turns, dur ) );
3442 if( wound.get_duration() == 0_turns ) {
3443 heal_msg( m_good, _( "You stop the bleeding." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You stop the bleeding." ) ) ), _( "The bleeding is stopped." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "The bleeding is stopped." ) )
) );
3444 } else {
3445 heal_msg( m_good, _( "You reduce the bleeding, but it's not stopped yet." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You reduce the bleeding, but it's not stopped yet."
) ) ),
3446 _( "The bleeding is reduced, but not stopped." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "The bleeding is reduced, but not stopped."
) ) ) );
3447 }
3448 } else {
3449 heal_msg( m_warning,
3450 _( "Your dressing is too ineffective for a bleeding of this extent, and you fail to stop it." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your dressing is too ineffective for a bleeding of this extent, and you fail to stop it."
) ) ),
3451 _( "The wound still bleeds." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "The wound still bleeds." ) )
) );
3452 }
3453 practice_amount += bleed / 3.0f;
3454 }
3455 if( patient.has_effect( effect_bite, healed ) ) {
3456 if( x_in_y( bite, 1.0f ) ) {
3457 patient.remove_effect( effect_bite, healed );
3458 heal_msg( m_good, _( "You clean the wound." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You clean the wound." ) ) ), _( "The wound is cleaned." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "The wound is cleaned." ) ) ) );
3459 } else {
3460 heal_msg( m_warning, _( "Your wound still aches." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your wound still aches." ) )
), _( "The wound still looks bad." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "The wound still looks bad." )
) ) );
3461 }
3462
3463 practice_amount += bite * 3.0f;
3464 }
3465 if( patient.has_effect( effect_infected, healed ) ) {
3466 if( x_in_y( infect, 1.0f ) ) {
3467 const time_duration infected_dur = patient.get_effect_dur( effect_infected, healed );
3468 patient.remove_effect( effect_infected, healed );
3469 patient.add_effect( effect_recover, infected_dur );
3470 heal_msg( m_good, _( "You disinfect the wound." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You disinfect the wound." ) )
), _( "The wound is disinfected." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "The wound is disinfected." )
) ) );
3471 } else {
3472 heal_msg( m_warning, _( "Your wound still hurts." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your wound still hurts." ) )
), _( "The wound still looks nasty." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "The wound still looks nasty."
) ) ) );
3473 }
3474
3475 practice_amount += infect * 10.0f;
3476 }
3477
3478 healer.add_msg_if_player( _( "You finish using the %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You finish using the %s." ) )
), it.tname() );
3479
3480 if( u_see && !healer.is_avatar() ) {
3481 //~ Healing complete message. %1$s is healer name, %2$s is item name.
3482 add_msg( _( "%1$s finishes using the %2$s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%1$s finishes using the %2$s."
) ) ), healer.disp_name(), it.tname() );
3483 }
3484
3485 for( const effect_data &eff : effects ) {
3486 patient.add_effect( eff.id, eff.duration, eff.bp, eff.permanent );
3487 }
3488
3489 if( !used_up_item_id.is_empty() ) {
3490 // If the item is a tool, `make` it the new form
3491 // Otherwise it probably was consumed, so create a new one
3492 if( it.is_tool() ) {
3493 it.convert( used_up_item_id, &healer );
3494 for( const auto &flag : used_up_item_flags ) {
3495 it.set_flag( flag );
3496 }
3497 } else {
3498 item used_up( used_up_item_id, it.birthday() );
3499 used_up.charges = used_up_item_charges;
3500 for( const auto &flag : used_up_item_flags ) {
3501 used_up.set_flag( flag );
3502 }
3503 healer.i_add_or_drop( used_up, used_up_item_quantity );
3504 }
3505 }
3506
3507 // apply healing over time effects
3508 if( bandages_power > 0 ) {
3509 int bandages_intensity = get_bandaged_level( healer );
3510 patient.add_effect( effect_bandaged, 1_turns, healed );
3511 effect &e = patient.get_effect( effect_bandaged, healed );
3512 e.set_duration( e.get_int_dur_factor() * bandages_intensity );
3513 patient.set_part_damage_bandaged( healed,
3514 patient.get_part_hp_max( healed ) - patient.get_part_hp_cur( healed ) );
3515 practice_amount += 2 * bandages_intensity;
3516 }
3517 if( disinfectant_power > 0 ) {
3518 int disinfectant_intensity = get_disinfected_level( healer );
3519 patient.add_effect( effect_disinfected, 1_turns, healed );
3520 effect &e = patient.get_effect( effect_disinfected, healed );
3521 e.set_duration( e.get_int_dur_factor() * disinfectant_intensity );
3522 patient.set_part_damage_disinfected( healed,
3523 patient.get_part_hp_max( healed ) - patient.get_part_hp_cur( healed ) );
3524 practice_amount += 2 * disinfectant_intensity;
3525 }
3526 practice_amount = std::max( 9.0f, practice_amount );
3527
3528 healer.practice( skill_firstaid, static_cast<int>( practice_amount ) );
3529 healer.practice_proficiency( proficiency_prof_wound_care,
3530 time_duration::from_turns( practice_amount ) );
3531 healer.practice_proficiency( proficiency_prof_wound_care_expert,
3532 time_duration::from_turns( practice_amount ) );
3533 return 1;
3534}
3535
3536static bodypart_id pick_part_to_heal(
3537 const Character &healer, const Character &patient,
3538 const std::string &menu_header,
3539 int limb_power, int head_bonus, int torso_bonus,
3540 int bleed_stop, float bite_chance, float infect_chance,
3541 bool force, float bandage_power, float disinfectant_power )
3542{
3543 const bool bleed = bleed_stop > 0;
3544 const bool bite = bite_chance > 0.0f;
3545 const bool infect = infect_chance > 0.0f;
3546 const bool precise = &healer == &patient ? false :
3547 /** @EFFECT_PER slightly increases precision when using first aid on someone else */
3548 /** @EFFECT_FIRSTAID increases precision when using first aid on someone else */
3549 ( ( healer.get_skill_level( skill_firstaid ) +
3550 ( healer.has_proficiency( proficiency_prof_wound_care ) ? 0 : 1 ) +
3551 ( healer.has_proficiency( proficiency_prof_wound_care ) ? 0 : 2 ) ) * 4 +
3552 healer.per_cur >= 20 );
3553 while( true ) {
3554 bodypart_id healed_part = patient.body_window( menu_header, force, precise,
3555 limb_power, head_bonus, torso_bonus,
3556 bleed_stop, bite_chance, infect_chance, bandage_power, disinfectant_power );
3557 if( healed_part == bodypart_id( "bp_null" ) ) {
3558 return bodypart_id( "bp_null" );
3559 }
3560
3561 if( healed_part->has_flag( json_flag_BIONIC_LIMB ) ) {
3562 add_msg( m_info, _( "You can't use first aid on a bionic limb." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You can't use first aid on a bionic limb."
) ) ) );
3563 continue;
3564 }
3565
3566 if( ( infect && patient.has_effect( effect_infected, healed_part ) ) ||
3567 ( bite && patient.has_effect( effect_bite, healed_part ) ) ||
3568 ( bleed && patient.has_effect( effect_bleed, healed_part ) ) ) {
3569 return healed_part;
3570 }
3571
3572 if( patient.is_limb_broken( healed_part ) ) {
3573 if( healed_part == bodypart_id( "arm_l" ) || healed_part == bodypart_id( "arm_r" ) ) {
3574 add_msg( m_info, _( "That arm is broken. It needs surgical attention or a splint." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "That arm is broken. It needs surgical attention or a splint."
) ) ) );
3575 } else if( healed_part == bodypart_id( "leg_l" ) || healed_part == bodypart_id( "leg_r" ) ) {
3576 add_msg( m_info, _( "That leg is broken. It needs surgical attention or a splint." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
