get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "That leg is broken. It needs surgical attention or a splint."
) ) ) );
3577 } else {
3578 debugmsg( "That body part is bugged. It needs developer's attention." )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/iuse_actor.cpp"
, "3578", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "That body part is bugged. It needs developer's attention."
);
3579 }
3580
3581 continue;
3582 }
3583
3584 if( force || patient.get_part_hp_cur( healed_part ) < patient.get_part_hp_max( healed_part ) ) {
3585 return healed_part;
3586 }
3587 }
3588}
3589
3590bodypart_id heal_actor::use_healing_item( Character &healer, Character &patient, item &it,
3591 bool force ) const
3592{
3593 bodypart_id healed = bodypart_id( "bp_null" );
3594 const int head_bonus = get_heal_value( healer, bodypart_id( "head" ) );
3595 const int limb_power = get_heal_value( healer, bodypart_id( "arm_l" ) );
3596 const int torso_bonus = get_heal_value( healer, bodypart_id( "torso" ) );
3597
3598 if( !patient.can_use_heal_item( it ) ) {
3599 patient.add_msg_player_or_npc( m_bad,
3600 _( "Your biology is not compatible with that item." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your biology is not compatible with that item."
) ) ),
3601 _( "<npcname>'s biology is not compatible with that item." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<npcname>'s biology is not compatible with that item."
) ) ) );
3602 return bodypart_id( "bp_null" ); // canceled
3603 }
3604
3605 if( healer.is_npc() ) {
3606 // NPCs heal whatever has sustained the most damage that they can heal but don't
3607 // rebandage parts unless they are bleeding significantly
3608 int highest_damage = 0;
3609 for( bodypart_id part_id : patient.get_all_body_parts( get_body_part_flags::only_main ) ) {
3610 int damage = 0;
3611 if( ( !patient.has_effect( effect_bandaged, part_id ) && bandages_power > 0 ) ||
3612 ( !patient.has_effect( effect_disinfected, part_id ) && disinfectant_power > 0 ) ) {
3613 damage += patient.get_part_hp_max( part_id ) - patient.get_part_hp_cur( part_id );
3614 damage += infect * patient.get_effect_dur( effect_infected, part_id ) / 10_minutes;
3615 }
3616 if( patient.get_effect_int( effect_bleed, part_id ) > 5 && bleed > 0 ) {
3617 damage += bleed * patient.get_effect_dur( effect_bleed, part_id ) / 5_minutes;
3618 }
3619 if( patient.has_effect( effect_bite, part_id ) && disinfectant_power > 0 ) {
3620 damage += bite * patient.get_effect_dur( effect_bite, part_id ) / 1_minutes;
3621 }
3622 if( damage > highest_damage ) {
3623 highest_damage = damage;
3624 healed = part_id;
3625 }
3626 }
3627 } else if( patient.is_avatar() ) {
3628 // Player healing self - let player select
3629 if( healer.activity.id() != ACT_FIRSTAID ) {
3630 const std::string menu_header = _( "Select a body part for: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Select a body part for: " ) )
) + it.tname();
3631 healed = pick_part_to_heal( healer, patient, menu_header, limb_power, head_bonus, torso_bonus,
3632 get_stopbleed_level( healer ), bite, infect, force, get_bandaged_level( healer ),
3633 get_disinfected_level( healer ) );
3634 if( healed == bodypart_id( "bp_null" ) ) {
3635 add_msg( m_info, _( "Never mind." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Never mind." ) ) ) );
3636 return bodypart_id( "bp_null" ); // canceled
3637 }
3638 return healed;
3639 } else {
3640 // Completed activity, extract body part from it.
3641 healed = bodypart_id( healer.activity.str_values[0] );
3642 }
3643 } else {
3644 // Player healing NPC
3645 // TODO: Remove this hack, allow using activities on NPCs
3646 const std::string menu_header = string_format( pgettext( "healing",
3647 //~ %1$s: patient name, %2$s: healing item name
3648 "Select a body part of %1$s for %2$s:" ),
3649 patient.disp_name(), it.tname() );
3650 healed = pick_part_to_heal( healer, patient, menu_header, limb_power, head_bonus, torso_bonus,
3651 get_stopbleed_level( healer ), bite, infect, force, get_bandaged_level( healer ),
3652 get_disinfected_level( healer ) );
3653 }
3654
3655 return healed;
3656}
3657
3658void heal_actor::info( const item &, std::vector<iteminfo> &dump ) const
3659{
3660 if( head_power > 0 || torso_power > 0 || limb_power > 0 || bandages_power > 0 ||
3661 disinfectant_power > 0 || bleed > 0 || bite > 0.0f || infect > 0.0f ) {
3662 dump.emplace_back( "HEAL", _( "<bold>Healing effects</bold> " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<bold>Healing effects</bold> "
) ) ) );
3663 }
3664
3665 Character &player_character = get_player_character();
3666 if( head_power > 0 || torso_power > 0 || limb_power > 0 ) {
3667 dump.emplace_back( "HEAL", _( "Base healing: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Base healing: " ) ) ) );
3668 dump.emplace_back( "HEAL_BASE", _( "Head: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Head: " ) ) ), "", iteminfo::no_newline, head_power );
3669 dump.emplace_back( "HEAL_BASE", _( " Torso: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( " Torso: " ) ) ), "", iteminfo::no_newline, torso_power );
3670 dump.emplace_back( "HEAL_BASE", _( " Limbs: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( " Limbs: " ) ) ), limb_power );
3671 if( g != nullptr ) {
3672 dump.emplace_back( "HEAL", _( "Actual healing: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Actual healing: " ) ) ) );
3673 dump.emplace_back( "HEAL_ACT", _( "Head: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Head: " ) ) ), "", iteminfo::no_newline,
3674 get_heal_value( player_character, bodypart_id( "head" ) ) );
3675 dump.emplace_back( "HEAL_ACT", _( " Torso: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( " Torso: " ) ) ), "", iteminfo::no_newline,
3676 get_heal_value( player_character, bodypart_id( "torso" ) ) );
3677 dump.emplace_back( "HEAL_ACT", _( " Limbs: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( " Limbs: " ) ) ), get_heal_value( player_character,
3678 bodypart_id( "arm_l" ) ) );
3679 }
3680 }
3681
3682 if( bandages_power > 0 ) {
3683 dump.emplace_back( "HEAL", _( "Base bandaging quality: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Base bandaging quality: " ) )
),
3684 texitify_base_healing_power( static_cast<int>( bandages_power ) ) );
3685 if( g != nullptr ) {
3686 dump.emplace_back( "HEAL", _( "Actual bandaging quality: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Actual bandaging quality: " )
) ),
3687 texitify_healing_power( get_bandaged_level( player_character ) ) );
3688 }
3689 }
3690
3691 if( disinfectant_power > 0 ) {
3692 dump.emplace_back( "HEAL", _( "Base disinfecting quality: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Base disinfecting quality: "
) ) ),
3693 texitify_base_healing_power( static_cast<int>( disinfectant_power ) ) );
3694 if( g != nullptr ) {
3695 dump.emplace_back( "HEAL", _( "Actual disinfecting quality: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Actual disinfecting quality: "
) ) ),
3696 texitify_healing_power( get_disinfected_level( player_character ) ) );
3697 }
3698 }
3699 if( bleed > 0 ) {
3700 dump.emplace_back( "HEAL", _( "Effect on bleeding: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Effect on bleeding: " ) ) ), texitify_bandage_power( bleed ) );
3701 if( g != nullptr ) {
3702 dump.emplace_back( "HEAL", _( "Actual effect on bleeding: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Actual effect on bleeding: "
) ) ),
3703 texitify_healing_power( get_stopbleed_level( get_player_character() ) ) );
3704 }
3705 }
3706 if( bite > 0.0f || infect > 0.0f ) {
3707 dump.emplace_back( "HEAL", _( "Chance to heal (percent): " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Chance to heal (percent): " )
) ) );
3708 if( bite > 0.0f ) {
3709 dump.emplace_back( "HEAL", _( "* Bite: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* Bite: " ) ) ),
3710 static_cast<int>( bite * 100 ) );
3711 }
3712 if( infect > 0.0f ) {
3713 dump.emplace_back( "HEAL", _( "* Infection: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "* Infection: " ) ) ),
3714 static_cast<int>( infect * 100 ) );
3715 }
3716 }
3717 dump.emplace_back( "HEAL", _( "Moves to use: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Moves to use: " ) ) ), move_cost );
3718}
3719
3720place_trap_actor::place_trap_actor( const std::string &type ) :
3721 iuse_actor( type ), needs_neighbor_terrain( ter_str_id::NULL_ID() ),
3722 outer_layer_trap( trap_str_id::NULL_ID() ) {}
3723
3724place_trap_actor::data::data() : trap( trap_str_id::NULL_ID() ) {}
3725
3726void place_trap_actor::data::load( const JsonObject &obj )
3727{
3728 assign( obj, "trap", trap );
3729 assign( obj, "done_message", done_message );
3730 assign( obj, "practice", practice );
3731 assign( obj, "moves", moves );
3732}
3733
3734void place_trap_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
3735{
3736 assign( obj, "allow_underwater", allow_underwater );
3737 assign( obj, "allow_under_player", allow_under_player );
3738 assign( obj, "needs_solid_neighbor", needs_solid_neighbor );
3739 assign( obj, "needs_neighbor_terrain", needs_neighbor_terrain );
3740 assign( obj, "bury_question", bury_question );
3741 if( !bury_question.empty() ) {
3742 JsonObject buried_json = obj.get_object( "bury" );
3743 buried_data.load( buried_json );
3744 }
3745 unburied_data.load( obj );
3746 assign( obj, "outer_layer_trap", outer_layer_trap );
3747}
3748
3749std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> place_trap_actor::clone() const
3750{
3751 return std::make_unique<place_trap_actor>( *this );
3752}
3753
3754static bool is_solid_neighbor( const tripoint &pos, const point &offset )
3755{
3756 map &here = get_map();
3757 const tripoint a = pos + tripoint( offset, 0 );
3758 const tripoint b = pos - tripoint( offset, 0 );
3759 return here.move_cost( a ) != 2 && here.move_cost( b ) != 2;
3760}
3761
3762static bool has_neighbor( const tripoint &pos, const ter_id &terrain_id )
3763{
3764 map &here = get_map();
3765 for( const tripoint &t : here.points_in_radius( pos, 1, 0 ) ) {
3766 if( here.ter( t ) == terrain_id ) {
3767 return true;
3768 }
3769 }
3770 return false;
3771}
3772
3773bool place_trap_actor::is_allowed( Character &p, const tripoint &pos,
3774 const std::string &name ) const
3775{
3776 if( !allow_under_player && pos == p.pos() ) {
3777 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "Yeah. Place the %s at your feet. Real damn smart move." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Yeah. Place the %s at your feet. Real damn smart move."
) ) ),
3778 name );
3779 return false;
3780 }
3781 map &here = get_map();
3782 if( here.move_cost( pos ) != 2 ) {
3783 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You can't place a %s there." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You can't place a %s there."
) ) ), name );
3784 return false;
3785 }
3786 if( needs_solid_neighbor ) {
3787 if( !is_solid_neighbor( pos, point_east ) && !is_solid_neighbor( pos, point_south ) &&
3788 !is_solid_neighbor( pos, point_south_east ) && !is_solid_neighbor( pos, point_north_east ) ) {
3789 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You must place the %s between two solid tiles." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You must place the %s between two solid tiles."
) ) ), name );
3790 return false;
3791 }
3792 }
3793 if( needs_neighbor_terrain && !has_neighbor( pos, needs_neighbor_terrain ) ) {
3794 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "The %s needs a %s adjacent to it." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "The %s needs a %s adjacent to it."
) ) ), name,
3795 needs_neighbor_terrain.obj().name() );
3796 return false;
3797 }
3798 const trap &existing_trap = here.tr_at( pos );
3799 if( !existing_trap.is_null() ) {
3800 if( existing_trap.can_see( pos, p ) ) {
3801 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info,
3802 existing_trap.is_benign()
3803 ? _( "You can't place a %s there. It contains a deployed object already." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You can't place a %s there. It contains a deployed object already."
) ) )
3804 : _( "You can't place a %s there. It contains a trap already." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You can't place a %s there. It contains a trap already."
) ) ),
3805 name );
3806 } else {
3807 p.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "You trigger a %s!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You trigger a %s!" ) ) ), existing_trap.name() );
3808 existing_trap.trigger( pos, p );
3809 }
3810 return false;
3811 }
3812 return true;
3813}
3814
3815static void place_and_add_as_known( Character &p, const tripoint &pos, const trap_str_id &id )
3816{
3817 map &here = get_map();
3818 here.trap_set( pos, id );
3819 const trap &tr = here.tr_at( pos );
3820 if( !tr.can_see( pos, p ) ) {
3821 p.add_known_trap( pos, tr );
3822 }
3823}
3824
3825std::optional<int> place_trap_actor::use( Character *p, item &it, const tripoint & ) const
3826{
3827 const bool could_bury = !bury_question.empty();
3828 if( !allow_underwater && p->cant_do_underwater() ) {
3829 return std::nullopt;
3830 }
3831 if( p->cant_do_mounted() ) {
3832 return std::nullopt;
3833 }
3834 const std::optional<tripoint> pos_ = choose_adjacent( string_format( _( "Place %s where?" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Place %s where?" ) ) ),
3835 it.tname() ) );
3836 if( !pos_ ) {
3837 return std::nullopt;
3838 }
3839 tripoint pos = *pos_;
3840
3841 if( !is_allowed( *p, pos, it.tname() ) ) {
3842 return std::nullopt;
3843 }
3844
3845 map &here = get_map();
3846 int distance_to_trap_center = unburied_data.trap.obj().get_trap_radius() +
3847 outer_layer_trap.obj().get_trap_radius() + 1;
3848 if( unburied_data.trap.obj().get_trap_radius() > 0 ) {
3849 // Math correction for multi-tile traps
3850 pos.x = ( pos.x - p->posx() ) * distance_to_trap_center + p->posx();
3851 pos.y = ( pos.y - p->posy() ) * distance_to_trap_center + p->posy();
3852 for( const tripoint &t : here.points_in_radius( pos, outer_layer_trap.obj().get_trap_radius(),
3853 0 ) ) {
3854 if( !is_allowed( *p, t, it.tname() ) ) {
3855 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info,
3856 _( "That trap needs a space in %d tiles radius to be clear, centered %d tiles from you." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "That trap needs a space in %d tiles radius to be clear, centered %d tiles from you."
) ) ),
3857 outer_layer_trap.obj().get_trap_radius(), distance_to_trap_center );
3858 return std::nullopt;
3859 }
3860 }
3861 }
3862
3863 const bool has_shovel = p->has_quality( qual_DIG, 3 );
3864 const bool is_diggable = here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_DIGGABLE, pos );
3865 bool bury = false;
3866 if( could_bury && has_shovel && is_diggable ) {
3867 bury = query_yn( "%s", bury_question );
3868 }
3869 const place_trap_actor::data &data = bury ? buried_data : unburied_data;
3870
3871 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, data.done_message.translated(), here.tername( pos ) );
3872 p->practice( skill_traps, data.practice );
3873 p->practice_proficiency( proficiency_prof_traps,
3874 time_duration::from_seconds( data.practice * 30 ) );
3875 p->practice_proficiency( proficiency_prof_trapsetting,
3876 time_duration::from_seconds( data.practice * 30 ) );
3877
3878 //Total time to set the trap will be determined by player's skills and proficiencies
3879 int move_cost_final = std::round( ( data.moves * std::min( 1,
3880 ( data.practice ^ 2 ) ) ) / ( p->get_skill_level( skill_traps ) <= 1 ? 1 : p->get_skill_level(
3881 skill_traps ) ) );
3882 if( !p->has_proficiency( proficiency_prof_trapsetting ) ) {
3883 move_cost_final = move_cost_final * 2;
3884 }
3885 if( !p->has_proficiency( proficiency_prof_traps ) ) {
3886 move_cost_final = move_cost_final * 4;
3887 }
3888
3889 //This probably needs to be done via assign_activity
3890 p->mod_moves( -move_cost_final );
3891
3892 place_and_add_as_known( *p, pos, data.trap );
3893 for( const tripoint &t : here.points_in_radius( pos, data.trap.obj().get_trap_radius(), 0 ) ) {
3894 if( t != pos ) {
3895 place_and_add_as_known( *p, t, outer_layer_trap );
3896 }
3897 }
3898 return 1;
3899}
3900
3901void emit_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
3902{
3903 assign( obj, "emits", emits );
3904 assign( obj, "scale_qty", scale_qty );
3905}
3906
3907std::optional<int> emit_actor::use( Character *, item &it, const tripoint &pos ) const
3908{
3909 map &here = get_map();
3910 const float scaling = scale_qty ? it.charges : 1.0f;
3911 for( const auto &e : emits ) {
3912 here.emit_field( pos, e, scaling );
3913 }
3914
3915 return 1;
3916}
3917
3918std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> emit_actor::clone() const
3919{
3920 return std::make_unique<emit_actor>( *this );
3921}
3922
3923void emit_actor::finalize( const itype_id &my_item_type )
3924{
3925 /*
3926 // TODO: This must be called after all finalization
3927 for( const auto& e : emits ) {
3928 if( !e.is_valid() ) {
3929 debugmsg( "Item %s has unknown emit source %s", my_item_type.c_str(), e.c_str() );
3930 }
3931 }
3932 */
3933
3934 if( scale_qty && !item::count_by_charges( my_item_type ) ) {
3935 debugmsg( "Item %s has emit_actor with scale_qty, but is not counted by charges",realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/iuse_actor.cpp"
, "3936", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Item %s has emit_actor with scale_qty, but is not counted by charges"
, my_item_type.c_str())
3936 my_item_type.c_str() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/iuse_actor.cpp"
, "3936", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Item %s has emit_actor with scale_qty, but is not counted by charges"
, my_item_type.c_str());
3937 scale_qty = false;
3938 }
3939}
3940
3941void saw_barrel_actor::load( const JsonObject &jo )
3942{
3943 assign( jo, "cost", cost );
3944}
3945
3946//Todo: Make this consume charges if performed with a tool that uses charges.
3947std::optional<int> saw_barrel_actor::use( Character *p, item &it, const tripoint & ) const
3948{
3949 if( !p ) {
3950 debugmsg( "%s called action saw_barrel that requires character but no character is present",realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/iuse_actor.cpp"
, "3951", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "%s called action saw_barrel that requires character but no character is present"
, it.typeId().str())
3951 it.typeId().str() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/iuse_actor.cpp"
, "3951", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "%s called action saw_barrel that requires character but no character is present"
, it.typeId().str());
3952 return std::nullopt;
3953 }
3954
3955 item_location loc = game_menus::inv::saw_barrel( *p, it );
3956
3957 if( !loc ) {
3958 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "Never mind." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Never mind." ) ) ) );
3959 return std::nullopt;
3960 }
3961
3962 item &obj = *loc.obtain( *p );
3963 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You saw down the barrel of your %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You saw down the barrel of your %s."
) ) ), obj.tname() );
3964 obj.put_in( item( "barrel_small", calendar::turn ), pocket_type::MOD );
3965
3966 return 0;
3967}
3968
3969ret_val<void> saw_barrel_actor::can_use_on( const Character &, const item &,
3970 const item &target ) const
3971{
3972 if( !target.is_gun() ) {
3973 return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "It's not a gun." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "It's not a gun." ) ) ) );
3974 }
3975
3976 if( target.type->gun->barrel_volume <= 0_ml ) {
3977 return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "The barrel is too small." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "The barrel is too small." ) )
) );
3978 }
3979
3980 if( target.gunmod_find( itype_barrel_small ) ) {
3981 return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "The barrel is already sawn-off." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "The barrel is already sawn-off."
) ) ) );
3982 }
3983
3984 const auto gunmods = target.gunmods();
3985 const bool modified_barrel = std::any_of( gunmods.begin(), gunmods.end(),
3986 []( const item * mod ) {
3987 return mod->type->gunmod->location == gunmod_location( "barrel" );
3988 } );
3989
3990 if( modified_barrel ) {
3991 return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "Can't saw off modified barrels." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Can't saw off modified barrels."
) ) ) );
3992 }
3993
3994 return ret_val<void>::make_success();
3995}
3996
3997std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> saw_barrel_actor::clone() const
3998{
3999 return std::make_unique<saw_barrel_actor>( *this );
4000}
4001
4002void saw_stock_actor::load( const JsonObject &jo )
4003{
4004 assign( jo, "cost", cost );
4005}
4006
4007//Todo: Make this consume charges if performed with a tool that uses charges.
4008std::optional<int> saw_stock_actor::use( Character *p, item &it, const tripoint & ) const
4009{
4010 if( !p ) {
4011 debugmsg( "%s called action saw_stock that requires character but no character is present",realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/iuse_actor.cpp"
, "4012", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "%s called action saw_stock that requires character but no character is present"
, it.typeId().str())
4012 it.typeId().str() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/iuse_actor.cpp"
, "4012", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "%s called action saw_stock that requires character but no character is present"
, it.typeId().str());
4013 return std::nullopt;
4014 }
4015
4016 item_location loc = game_menus::inv::saw_stock( *p, it );
4017
4018 if( !loc ) {
4019 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "Never mind." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Never mind." ) ) ) );
4020 return std::nullopt;
4021 }
4022
4023 item &obj = *loc.obtain( *p );
4024 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You saw down the stock of your %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You saw down the stock of your %s."
) ) ), obj.tname() );
4025 obj.put_in( item( "stock_none", calendar::turn ), pocket_type::MOD );
4026
4027 return 0;
4028}
4029
4030ret_val<void> saw_stock_actor::can_use_on( const Character &, const item &,
4031 const item &target ) const
4032{
4033 if( !target.is_gun() ) {
4034 return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "It's not a gun." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "It's not a gun." ) ) ) );
4035 }
4036
4037 if( target.gunmod_find( itype_stock_none ) ) {
4038 return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "The stock is already sawn-off." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "The stock is already sawn-off."
) ) ) );
4039 }
4040
4041 if( target.gun_type() == gun_type_type( "pistol" ) ) {
4042 return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "This gun doesn't have a stock." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "This gun doesn't have a stock."
) ) ) );
4043 }
4044
4045 const auto gunmods = target.gunmods();
4046 const bool modified_stock = std::any_of( gunmods.begin(), gunmods.end(),
4047 []( const item * mod ) {
4048 return mod->type->gunmod->location == gunmod_location( "stock" );
4049 } );
4050
4051 const bool accessorized_stock = std::any_of( gunmods.begin(), gunmods.end(),
4052 []( const item * mod ) {
4053 return mod->type->gunmod->location == gunmod_location( "stock accessory" );
4054 } );
4055
4056 if( target.get_free_mod_locations( gunmod_location( "stock mount" ) ) < 1 ) {
4057 return ret_val<void>::make_failure(
4058 _( "Can't cut off modern composite stocks (must have an empty stock mount)." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Can't cut off modern composite stocks (must have an empty stock mount)."
) ) ) );
4059 }
4060
4061 if( modified_stock ) {
4062 return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "Can't cut off modified stocks." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Can't cut off modified stocks."
) ) ) );
4063 }
4064
4065 if( accessorized_stock ) {
4066 return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "Can't cut off accessorized stocks." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Can't cut off accessorized stocks."
) ) ) );
4067 }
4068
4069 return ret_val<void>::make_success();
4070}
4071
4072std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> saw_stock_actor::clone() const
4073{
4074 return std::make_unique<saw_stock_actor>( *this );
4075}
4076
4077void molle_attach_actor::load( const JsonObject &jo )
4078{
4079 assign( jo, "size", size );
4080 assign( jo, "moves", moves );
4081}
4082
4083std::optional<int> molle_attach_actor::use( Character *p, item &it,
4084 const tripoint & ) const
4085{
4086 if( !p ) {
4087 debugmsg( "%s called action molle_attach that requires character but no character is present",realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/iuse_actor.cpp"
, "4088", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "%s called action molle_attach that requires character but no character is present"
, it.typeId().str())
4088 it.typeId().str() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/iuse_actor.cpp"
, "4088", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "%s called action molle_attach that requires character but no character is present"
, it.typeId().str());
4089 return std::nullopt;
4090 }
4091
4092 item_location loc = game_menus::inv::molle_attach( *p, it );
4093
4094 if( !loc ) {
4095 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "Never mind." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Never mind." ) ) ) );
4096 return std::nullopt;
4097 }
4098
4099 item &obj = *loc.get_item();
4100 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You attach %s to your MOLLE webbing." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You attach %s to your MOLLE webbing."
) ) ), obj.tname() );
4101
4102 it.get_contents().add_pocket( obj );
4103
4104 // the item has been added to the vest it should no longer exist in the world
4105 loc.remove_item();
4106
4107 return 0;
4108}
4109
4110std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> molle_attach_actor::clone() const
4111{
4112 return std::make_unique<molle_attach_actor>( *this );
4113}
4114
4115std::optional<int> molle_detach_actor::use( Character *p, item &it,
4116 const tripoint & ) const
4117{
4118
4119 std::vector<const item *> items_attached = it.get_contents().get_added_pockets();
4120 uilist prompt;
4121 prompt.text = _( "Remove which accessory?" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Remove which accessory?" ) )
);
4122
4123 for( size_t i = 0; i != items_attached.size(); ++i ) {
4124 prompt.addentry( i, true, -1, items_attached[i]->tname() );
4125 }
4126
4127 prompt.query();
4128
4129 if( prompt.ret >= 0 ) {
4130 p->i_add( it.get_contents().remove_pocket( prompt.ret ) );
4131 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You remove the item from your %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You remove the item from your %s."
) ) ), it.tname() );
4132 return 0;
4133 }
4134
4135 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "Never mind." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Never mind." ) ) ) );
4136 return std::nullopt;
4137}
4138
4139std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> molle_detach_actor::clone() const
4140{
4141 return std::make_unique<molle_detach_actor>( *this );
4142}
4143
4144void molle_detach_actor::load( const JsonObject &jo )
4145{
4146 assign( jo, "moves", moves );
4147}
4148
4149std::optional<int> install_bionic_actor::use( Character *p, item &it,
4150 const tripoint & ) const
4151{
4152 if( p->can_install_bionics( *it.type, *p, false ) ) {
4153 if( !p->has_trait( trait_DEBUG_BIONICS ) && !p->has_flag( json_flag_MANUAL_CBM_INSTALLATION ) ) {
4154 p->consume_installation_requirement( it.type->bionic->id );
4155 p->consume_anesth_requirement( *it.type, *p );
4156 }
4157 if( p->install_bionics( *it.type, *p, false ) ) {
4158 return 1;
4159 }
4160 }
4161 return std::nullopt;
4162}
4163
4164ret_val<void> install_bionic_actor::can_use( const Character &p, const item &it,
4165 const tripoint & ) const
4166{
4167 if( !it.is_bionic() ) {
4168 return ret_val<void>::make_failure();
4169 }
4170 const bionic_id &bid = it.type->bionic->id;
4171 if( p.is_mounted() ) {
4172 return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "You can't install bionics while mounted." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You can't install bionics while mounted."
) ) ) );
4173 }
4174 if( !p.has_trait( trait_DEBUG_BIONICS ) ) {
4175 if( bid->installation_requirement.is_empty() && !p.has_flag( json_flag_MANUAL_CBM_INSTALLATION ) ) {
4176 return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "You can't self-install this CBM." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You can't self-install this CBM."
) ) ) );
4177 } else if( it.has_flag( flag_FILTHY ) ) {
4178 return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "You can't install a filthy CBM!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You can't install a filthy CBM!"
) ) ) );
4179 } else if( it.has_flag( flag_NO_STERILE ) ) {
4180 return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "This CBM is not sterile, you can't install it." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "This CBM is not sterile, you can't install it."
) ) ) );
4181 } else if( it.has_fault( fault_bionic_salvaged ) ) {
4182 return ret_val<void>::make_failure(
4183 _( "This CBM is already deployed. You need to reset it to factory state." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "This CBM is already deployed. You need to reset it to factory state."
) ) ) );
4184 } else if( units::energy( std::numeric_limits<int>::max(), units::energy::unit_type{} ) -
4185 p.get_max_power_level() < bid->capacity ) {
4186 return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "Max power capacity already reached" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Max power capacity already reached"
) ) ) );
4187 }
4188 }
4189
4190 if( p.has_bionic( bid ) && !bid->dupes_allowed ) {
4191 return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "You have already installed this bionic." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You have already installed this bionic."
) ) ) );
4192 } else if( bid->upgraded_bionic && !p.has_bionic( bid->upgraded_bionic ) ) {
4193 return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "There is nothing to upgrade." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "There is nothing to upgrade."
) ) ) );
4194 } else {
4195 const bool downgrade =
4196 std::any_of( bid->available_upgrades.begin(), bid->available_upgrades.end(),
4197 [&p]( const bionic_id & b ) {
4198 return p.has_bionic( b );
4199 } );
4200
4201 if( downgrade ) {
4202 return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "You have a superior version installed." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You have a superior version installed."
) ) ) );
4203 }
4204 }
4205
4206 return ret_val<void>::make_success();
4207}
4208
4209std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> install_bionic_actor::clone() const
4210{
4211 return std::make_unique<install_bionic_actor>( *this );
4212}
4213
4214void install_bionic_actor::finalize( const itype_id &my_item_type )
4215{
4216 if( !item::find_type( my_item_type )->bionic ) {
4217 debugmsg( "Item %s has install_bionic actor, but it's not a bionic.", my_item_type.c_str() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/iuse_actor.cpp"
, "4217", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Item %s has install_bionic actor, but it's not a bionic."
, my_item_type.c_str());
4218 }
4219}
4220
4221std::optional<int> detach_gunmods_actor::use( Character *p, item &it,
4222 const tripoint & ) const
4223{
4224 auto filter_irremovable = []( std::vector<item *> &gunmods ) {
4225 gunmods.erase(
4226 std::remove_if(
4227 gunmods.begin(), gunmods.end(), []( const item * i ) {
4228 return i->is_irremovable();
4229 } ),
4230 gunmods.end() );
4231 };
4232
4233 item gun_copy = item( it );
4234 std::vector<item *> mods = it.gunmods();
4235 std::vector<item *> mods_copy = gun_copy.gunmods();
4236
4237 filter_irremovable( mods );
4238 filter_irremovable( mods_copy );
4239
4240 item_location mod_loc = game_menus::inv::gunmod_to_remove( *p, it );
4241
4242 if( !mod_loc ) {
4243 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "Never mind." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Never mind." ) ) ) );
4244 return std::nullopt;
4245 }
4246
4247 // Find the index of the mod to be removed
4248 // used in identifying the mod in mods and mods_copy
4249 int mod_index = -1;
4250 for( size_t i = 0; i != mods.size(); ++i ) {
4251 if( mods[ i ] == mod_loc.get_item() ) {
4252 mod_index = i;
4253 break;
4254 }
4255 }
4256
4257 if( mod_index >= 0 ) {
4258 gun_copy.remove_item( *mods_copy[mod_index] );
4259
4260 if( p->meets_requirements( *mods[mod_index], gun_copy ) ||
4261 query_yn( _( "Are you sure? You may be lacking the skills needed to reattach this modification." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Are you sure? You may be lacking the skills needed to reattach this modification."
) ) ) ) ) {
4262
4263 if( game_menus::inv::compare_items( it, gun_copy, _( "Remove modification?" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Remove modification?" ) ) ) ) ) {
4264 p->gunmod_remove( it, *mods[mod_index] );
4265 return 0;
4266 }
4267 }
4268 }
4269
4270 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "Never mind." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Never mind." ) ) ) );
4271 return std::nullopt;
4272}
4273
4274ret_val<void> detach_gunmods_actor::can_use( const Character &p, const item &it,
4275 const tripoint & ) const
4276{
4277 const std::vector<const item *> mods = it.gunmods();
4278
4279 if( mods.empty() ) {
4280 return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "Doesn't appear to be modded." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Doesn't appear to be modded."
) ) ) );
4281 }
4282
4283 const bool no_removables =
4284 std::all_of( mods.begin(), mods.end(),
4285 []( const item * mod ) {
4286 return mod->is_irremovable();
4287 } );
4288
4289 if( no_removables ) {
4290 return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "None of the mods can be removed." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "None of the mods can be removed."
) ) ) );
4291 }
4292
4293 if( p.is_worn(
4294 it ) ) { // Prevent removal of shoulder straps and thereby making the gun un-wearable again.
4295 return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "Has to be taken off first." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Has to be taken off first." )
) ) );
4296 }
4297
4298 return ret_val<void>::make_success();
4299}
4300
4301std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> detach_gunmods_actor::detach_gunmods_actor::clone() const
4302{
4303 return std::make_unique<detach_gunmods_actor>( *this );
4304}
4305
4306void detach_gunmods_actor::finalize( const itype_id &my_item_type )
4307{
4308 if( !item::find_type( my_item_type )->gun ) {
4309 debugmsg( "Item %s has detach_gunmods_actor actor, but it's a gun.", my_item_type.c_str() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/iuse_actor.cpp"
, "4309", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Item %s has detach_gunmods_actor actor, but it's a gun."
, my_item_type.c_str());
4310 }
4311}
4312
4313std::optional<int> modify_gunmods_actor::use( Character *p, item &it,
4314 const tripoint &pnt ) const
4315{
4316
4317 std::vector<item *> mods;
4318 for( item *mod : it.gunmods() ) {
4319 if( mod->is_transformable() ) {
4320 mods.push_back( mod );
4321 }
4322 }
4323
4324 uilist prompt;
4325 prompt.text = _( "Modify which part" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Modify which part" ) ) );
4326
4327 for( size_t i = 0; i != mods.size(); ++i ) {
4328 prompt.addentry( i, true, -1, string_format( "%s: %s", mods[i]->tname(),
4329 mods[i]->get_use( "transform" )->get_name() ) );
4330 }
4331
4332 prompt.query();
4333
4334 if( prompt.ret >= 0 ) {
4335 // set gun to default in case this changes anything
4336 it.gun_set_mode( gun_mode_DEFAULT );
4337 p->invoke_item( mods[prompt.ret], "transform", pnt );
4338 it.on_contents_changed();
4339 return 0;
4340 }
4341
4342 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "Never mind." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Never mind." ) ) ) );
4343 return std::nullopt;
4344}
4345
4346ret_val<void> modify_gunmods_actor::can_use( const Character &p, const item &it,
4347 const tripoint & ) const
4348{
4349 if( !p.is_wielding( it ) ) {
4350 return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "Need to be wielding." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Need to be wielding." ) ) ) );
4351 }
4352 const std::vector<const item *> mods = it.gunmods();
4353
4354 if( mods.empty() ) {
4355 return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "Doesn't appear to be modded." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Doesn't appear to be modded."
) ) ) );
4356 }
4357
4358 const bool modifiables = std::any_of( mods.begin(), mods.end(),
4359 []( const item * mod ) {
4360 return mod->is_transformable();
4361 } );
4362
4363 if( !modifiables ) {
4364 return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "None of the mods can be modified." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "None of the mods can be modified."
) ) ) );
4365 }
4366
4367 if( p.is_worn(
4368 it ) ) { // I don't know if modifying really needs this but its for future proofing.
4369 return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "Has to be taken off first." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Has to be taken off first." )
) ) );
4370 }
4371
4372 return ret_val<void>::make_success();
4373}
4374
4375std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> modify_gunmods_actor::modify_gunmods_actor::clone() const
4376{
4377 return std::make_unique<modify_gunmods_actor>( *this );
4378}
4379
4380void modify_gunmods_actor::finalize( const itype_id &my_item_type )
4381{
4382 if( !item::find_type( my_item_type )->gun ) {
4383 debugmsg( "Item %s has modify_gunmods_actor actor, but it's a gun.", my_item_type.c_str() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/iuse_actor.cpp"
, "4383", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Item %s has modify_gunmods_actor actor, but it's a gun."
, my_item_type.c_str());
4384 }
4385}
4386
4387void link_up_actor::load( const JsonObject &jo )
4388{
4389 jo.read( "cable_length", cable_length );
4390 jo.read( "charge_rate", charge_rate );
4391 jo.read( "efficiency", efficiency );
4392 jo.read( "move_cost", move_cost );
4393 jo.read( "menu_text", menu_text );
4394 jo.read( "targets", targets );
4395 jo.read( "can_extend", can_extend );
4396}
4397
4398std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> link_up_actor::clone() const
4399{
4400 return std::make_unique<link_up_actor>( *this );
4401}
4402
4403std::string link_up_actor::get_name() const
4404{
4405 if( !menu_text.empty() ) {
4406 return menu_text.translated();
4407 }
4408 return iuse_actor::get_name();
4409}
4410
4411void link_up_actor::info( const item &it, std::vector<iteminfo> &dump ) const
4412{
4413 std::vector<std::string> targets_strings;
4414 bool appliance = false;
4415 if( targets.count( link_state::vehicle_port ) > 0 ) {
4416 targets_strings.emplace_back( _( "vehicle controls" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "vehicle controls" ) ) ) );
4417 appliance = true;
4418 }
4419 if( targets.count( link_state::vehicle_battery ) > 0 ) {
4420 targets_strings.emplace_back( _( "vehicle battery" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "vehicle battery" ) ) ) );
4421 appliance = true;
4422 }
4423 if( appliance ) {
4424 targets_strings.emplace_back( _( "appliance" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "appliance" ) ) ) );
4425 }
4426 if( targets.count( link_state::bio_cable ) > 0 ) {
4427 targets_strings.emplace_back( _( "bionic" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "bionic" ) ) ) );
4428 }
4429 if( targets.count( link_state::ups ) > 0 ) {
4430 targets_strings.emplace_back( _( "UPS" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "UPS" ) ) ) );
4431 }
4432 if( targets.count( link_state::solarpack ) > 0 ) {
4433 targets_strings.emplace_back( _( "solar pack" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "solar pack" ) ) ) );
4434 }
4435 if( targets.count( link_state::vehicle_tow ) > 0 ) {
4436 dump.emplace_back( "TOOL", _( "<bold>Can tow a vehicle</bold>." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<bold>Can tow a vehicle</bold>."
) ) ) );
4437 }
4438 if( !targets_strings.empty() ) {
4439 std::string targets_string = enumerate_as_string( targets_strings, enumeration_conjunction::or_ );
4440 dump.emplace_back( "TOOL",
4441 string_format( _( "<bold>Can be plugged into</bold>: %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<bold>Can be plugged into</bold>: %s."
) ) ), targets_string ) );
4442 }
4443
4444 const bool no_extensions = it.cables().empty();
4445 item dummy( it );
4446 dummy.update_link_traits();
4447
4448 std::string length_all_info = string_format( _( "<bold>Cable length</bold>: %d" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<bold>Cable length</bold>: %d"
) ) ),
4449 dummy.max_link_length() );
4450 std::string length_solo_info = no_extensions ? "" : string_format( _( " (%d without extensions)" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( " (%d without extensions)" ) )
),
4451 cable_length != -1 ? cable_length : dummy.type->maximum_charges() );
4452 dump.emplace_back( "TOOL", length_all_info, length_solo_info );
4453
4454 if( charge_rate != 0_W ) {
4455 //~ Power in Watts. %+4.1f is a 4 digit number with 1 decimal point (ex: 4737.3 W)
4456 dump.emplace_back( "TOOL", _( "<bold>Wattage</bold>: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<bold>Wattage</bold>: "
) ) ), string_format( _( "%+4.1f W" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%+4.1f W" ) ) ),
4457 units::to_milliwatt( charge_rate ) / 1000.f ) );
4458 }
4459
4460 if( !can_extend.empty() ) {
4461 std::vector<std::string> cable_types;
4462 cable_types.reserve( can_extend.size() );
4463 for( const std::string &cable_type : can_extend ) {
4464 cable_types.emplace_back( cable_type == "ELECTRICAL_DEVICES" ? _( "electrical device cables" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "electrical device cables" ) )
) :
4465 itype_id( cable_type )->nname( 1 ) );
4466 }
4467 std::string cable_type_list = enumerate_as_string( cable_types, enumeration_conjunction::or_ );
4468 dump.emplace_back( "TOOL", string_format( _( "<bold>Can extend</bold>: %s" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<bold>Can extend</bold>: %s"
) ) ), cable_type_list ) );
4469 }
4470}
4471
4472std::optional<int> link_up_actor::use( Character *p, item &it, const tripoint &pnt ) const
4473{
4474 if( !p ) {
4475 debugmsg( "%s called action link_up that requires character but no character is present",realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/iuse_actor.cpp"
, "4476", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "%s called action link_up that requires character but no character is present"
, it.typeId().str())
4476 it.typeId().str() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/iuse_actor.cpp"
, "4476", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "%s called action link_up that requires character but no character is present"
, it.typeId().str());
4477 return std::nullopt;
4478 }
4479
4480 if( targets.empty() ) {
4481 debugmsg( "Link up action for %s doesn't have any targets!", it.tname() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/iuse_actor.cpp"
, "4481", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Link up action for %s doesn't have any targets!"
, it.tname());
4482 return std::nullopt;
4483 }
4484
4485 const bool is_cable_item = it.has_flag( flag_CABLE_SPOOL );
4486 const bool unspooled = it.link_length() == -1;
4487 const bool has_loose_end = !unspooled && is_cable_item ?
4488 it.link_has_state( link_state::no_link ) : it.has_no_links();
4489
4490 const int respool_time_per_square = 200;
4491 const bool past_respool_threshold = it.link_length() > item::LINK_RESPOOL_THRESHOLD;
4492 const int respool_time_total = !past_respool_threshold ? 0 :
4493 ( it.link_length() - item::LINK_RESPOOL_THRESHOLD ) * respool_time_per_square;
4494
4495 vehicle *t_veh = it.has_link_data() ? it.link().t_veh.get() : nullptr;
4496
4497 uilist link_menu;
4498 if( !is_cable_item || it.has_no_links() ) {
4499 // This is either a device or a cable item without any connections.
4500 link_menu.text = string_format( _( "What to do with the %s?%s" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "What to do with the %s?%s" )
) ), it.link_name(), t_veh ?
4501 string_format( _( "\nAttached to: %s" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "\nAttached to: %s" ) ) ), t_veh->name ) : "" );
4502 if( targets.count( link_state::vehicle_port ) > 0 ) {
4503 link_menu.addentry( 0, has_loose_end, -1, _( "Attach to vehicle controls or appliance" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Attach to vehicle controls or appliance"
) ) ) );
4504 }
4505 if( targets.count( link_state::vehicle_battery ) > 0 ) {
4506 link_menu.addentry( 1, has_loose_end, -1, _( "Attach to vehicle battery or appliance" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Attach to vehicle battery or appliance"
) ) ) );
4507 }
4508 if( targets.count( link_state::vehicle_tow ) > 0 ) {
4509 link_menu.addentry( 10, has_loose_end, -1, _( "Attach tow cable to towing vehicle" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Attach tow cable to towing vehicle"
) ) ) );
4510 link_menu.addentry( 11, has_loose_end, -1, _( "Attach tow cable to towed vehicle" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Attach tow cable to towed vehicle"
) ) ) );
4511 }
4512 if( targets.count( link_state::bio_cable ) > 0 ) {
4513 if( !p->get_remote_fueled_bionic().is_empty() ) {
4514 link_menu.addentry( 20, has_loose_end, -1, _( "Attach to Cable Charger System CBM" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Attach to Cable Charger System CBM"
) ) ) );
4515 }
4516 }
4517 if( targets.count( link_state::ups ) > 0 && p->cache_has_item_with( flag_IS_UPS ) ) {
4518 link_menu.addentry( 21, has_loose_end, -1, _( "Attach to UPS" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Attach to UPS" ) ) ) );
4519 }
4520 if( targets.count( link_state::solarpack ) > 0 ) {
4521 const bool has_solar_pack_on = p->worn_with_flag( flag_SOLARPACK_ON );
4522 if( has_solar_pack_on || p->worn_with_flag( flag_SOLARPACK ) ) {
4523 link_menu.addentry( 22, has_loose_end && has_solar_pack_on, -1, _( "Attach to solar pack" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Attach to solar pack" ) ) ) );
4524 }
4525 }
4526 if( !is_cable_item || !can_extend.empty() ) {
4527 const bool has_extensions = !unspooled &&
4528 !it.all_items_top( pocket_type::CABLE ).empty();
4529 link_menu.addentry( 30, has_loose_end, -1,
4530 is_cable_item ? _( "Extend another cable" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Extend another cable" ) ) ) : _( "Extend with another cable" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Extend with another cable" )
) ) );
4531 link_menu.addentry( 31, has_extensions, -1, _( "Remove cable extensions" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Remove cable extensions" ) )
) );
4532 }
4533 if( targets.count( link_state::no_link ) > 0 ) {
4534 if( unspooled ) {
4535 link_menu.addentry( 998, true, -1, _( "Re-spool" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Re-spool" ) ) ) );
4536 } else {
4537 link_menu.addentry( 999, !it.has_no_links(), -1,
4538 past_respool_threshold ? _( "Detach and re-spool" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Detach and re-spool" ) ) ) : _( "Detach" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Detach" ) ) ) );
4539 }
4540 }
4541
4542 } else if( it.link_has_state( link_state::vehicle_tow ) ) {
4543 // Cables that started a tow can finish one or detach; nothing else.
4544 link_menu.text = string_format( _( "What to do with the %s?%s" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "What to do with the %s?%s" )
) ), it.link_name(), t_veh ?
4545 string_format( _( "\nAttached to: %s" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "\nAttached to: %s" ) ) ), t_veh->name ) : "" );
4546
4547 link_menu.addentry( 10, has_loose_end && it.link().target == link_state::vehicle_tow, -1,
4548 _( "Attach loose end to towing vehicle" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Attach loose end to towing vehicle"
) ) ) );
4549 link_menu.addentry( 11, has_loose_end && it.link().source == link_state::vehicle_tow, -1,
4550 _( "Attach loose end to towed vehicle" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Attach loose end to towed vehicle"
) ) ) );
4551 if( targets.count( link_state::no_link ) > 0 ) {
4552 if( unspooled ) {
4553 link_menu.addentry( 998, true, -1, _( "Re-spool" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Re-spool" ) ) ) );
4554 } else {
4555 link_menu.addentry( 999, true, -1,
4556 past_respool_threshold ? _( "Detach and re-spool" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Detach and re-spool" ) ) ) : _( "Detach" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Detach" ) ) ) );
4557 }
4558 }
4559
4560 } else {
4561 // This is a cable item with at least one connection already:
4562 std::string state_desc_lhs;
4563 std::string state_desc_rhs;
4564 if( it.link_has_state( link_state::no_link ) ) {
4565 state_desc_lhs = _( "\nAttached to " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "\nAttached to " ) ) );
4566 if( t_veh ) {
4567 state_desc_rhs = it.link().t_veh->name;
4568 } else if( it.link_has_state( link_state::bio_cable ) ) {
4569 state_desc_rhs = _( "Cable Charger System" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Cable Charger System" ) ) );
4570 } else if( it.link_has_state( link_state::ups ) ) {
4571 state_desc_rhs = _( "Unified Power Supply" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Unified Power Supply" ) ) );
4572 } else if( it.link_has_state( link_state::solarpack ) ) {
4573 state_desc_rhs = _( "solar backpack" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "solar backpack" ) ) );
4574 }
4575 } else {
4576 if( it.link().source == link_state::bio_cable ) {
4577 state_desc_lhs = _( "\nConnecting Cable Charger System to " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "\nConnecting Cable Charger System to "
) ) );
4578 } else if( it.link().source == link_state::ups ) {
4579 state_desc_lhs = _( "\nConnecting UPS to " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "\nConnecting UPS to " ) ) );
4580 } else if( it.link().source == link_state::solarpack ) {
4581 state_desc_lhs = _( "\nConnecting solar backpack to " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "\nConnecting solar backpack to "
) ) );
4582 }
4583 if( it.link().t_veh ) {
4584 state_desc_rhs = it.link().t_veh->name;
4585 } else if( it.link().target == link_state::bio_cable ) {
4586 state_desc_rhs = _( "Cable Charger System" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Cable Charger System" ) ) );
4587 }
4588 }
4589 link_menu.text = string_format( _( "What to do with the %s?%s%s" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "What to do with the %s?%s%s"
) ) ), it.link_name(),
4590 state_desc_lhs, state_desc_rhs );
4591
4592 // TODO: Allow plugging UPSes and Solar Packs into more than just bionics.
4593 // There is already code to support setting up a link, but none for actual functionality.
4594 if( targets.count( link_state::vehicle_port ) > 0 ) {
4595 link_menu.addentry( 0, has_loose_end && !it.link_has_state( link_state::ups ) &&
4596 !it.link_has_state( link_state::solarpack ),
4597 -1, _( "Attach loose end to vehicle controls or appliance" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Attach loose end to vehicle controls or appliance"
) ) ) );
4598 }
4599 if( targets.count( link_state::vehicle_battery ) > 0 ) {
4600 link_menu.addentry( 1, has_loose_end && !it.link_has_state( link_state::ups ) &&
4601 !it.link_has_state( link_state::solarpack ),
4602 -1, _( "Attach loose end to vehicle battery or appliance" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Attach loose end to vehicle battery or appliance"
) ) ) );
4603 }
4604 if( targets.count( link_state::bio_cable ) > 0 && !p->get_remote_fueled_bionic().is_empty() ) {
4605 link_menu.addentry( 20, has_loose_end && !it.link_has_state( link_state::bio_cable ),
4606 -1, _( "Attach loose end to Cable Charger System CBM" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Attach loose end to Cable Charger System CBM"
) ) ) );
4607 }
4608 if( targets.count( link_state::ups ) > 0 && p->cache_has_item_with( flag_IS_UPS ) ) {
4609 link_menu.addentry( 21, has_loose_end && it.link_has_state( link_state::bio_cable ),
4610 -1, _( "Attach loose end to UPS" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Attach loose end to UPS" ) )
) );
4611 }
4612 if( targets.count( link_state::solarpack ) > 0 ) {
4613 const bool has_solar_pack_on = p->worn_with_flag( flag_SOLARPACK_ON );
4614 if( has_solar_pack_on || p->worn_with_flag( flag_SOLARPACK ) ) {
4615 link_menu.addentry( 22, has_loose_end && has_solar_pack_on &&
4616 it.link_has_state( link_state::bio_cable ),
4617 -1, _( "Attach loose end to solar pack" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Attach loose end to solar pack"
) ) ) );
4618 }
4619 }
4620 if( !can_extend.empty() ) {
4621 const bool has_extensions = !unspooled &&
4622 !it.all_items_top( pocket_type::CABLE ).empty();
4623 link_menu.addentry( 30, has_loose_end, -1, _( "Extend another cable" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Extend another cable" ) ) ) );
4624 link_menu.addentry( 31, has_extensions, -1, _( "Remove cable extensions" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Remove cable extensions" ) )
) );
4625 }
4626 if( targets.count( link_state::no_link ) > 0 ) {
4627 if( unspooled ) {
4628 link_menu.addentry( 998, true, -1, _( "Re-spool" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Re-spool" ) ) ) );
4629 } else {
4630 link_menu.addentry( 999, true, -1,
4631 past_respool_threshold ? _( "Detach and re-spool" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Detach and re-spool" ) ) ) : _( "Detach" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Detach" ) ) ) );
4632 }
4633 }
4634 }
4635
4636 int choice = -1;
4637 if( targets.size() == 1 ) {
4638 choice = link_menu.entries.begin()->retval;
4639 } else {
4640 link_menu.query();
4641 choice = link_menu.ret;
4642 }
4643
4644 if( choice < 0 ) {
4645 // Cancelled selection.
4646 return std::nullopt;
4647
4648 } else if( choice >= 998 ) {
4649 // Selection: Detach & respool.
4650
4651 // Reopen the menu after respooling.
4652 p->assign_activity( invoke_item_activity_actor( item_location{*p, &it}, "link_up" ) );
4653 p->activity.auto_resume = true;
4654
4655 if( t_veh ) {
4656 // Cancel out the linked device's power draw so the vehicle's power display will be accurate.
4657 int power_draw = it.charge_linked_batteries( *t_veh, 0 );
4658 t_veh->linked_item_epower_this_turn += units::from_milliwatt( power_draw );
4659 }
4660
4661 it.reset_link( true, p );
4662 // Cables that are too long need to be manually rewound before reuse.
4663 if( it.link_length() == -1 ) {
4664 p->assign_activity( player_activity( reel_cable_activity_actor( respool_time_total, item_location{*p, &it} ) ) );
4665 return 0;
4666 } else {
4667 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, string_format( is_cable_item ? _( "You detach the %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You detach the %s." ) ) ) :
4668 _( "You gather the %s up with it." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You gather the %s up with it."
) ) ), it.link_name() ) );
4669 }
4670 return 0;
4671 }
4672
4673 if( choice == 0 || choice == 1 ) {
4674 // Selection: Attach electrical cable to vehicle ports / appliances, OR vehicle batteries.
4675 return link_to_veh_app( p, it, choice == 0 );
4676
4677 } else if( choice == 10 || choice == 11 ) {
4678 // Selection: Attach tow cable to towing/towed vehicle.
4679 return link_tow_cable( p, it, choice == 10 );
4680
4681 } else if( choice == 30 ) {
4682 // Selection: Attach to another cable, resulting in a longer one.
4683 return link_extend_cable( p, it, pnt );
4684
4685 } else if( choice == 31 ) {
4686 // Selection: Remove all cable extensions and give the individual cables to the player.
4687 return remove_extensions( p, it );
4688 }
4689
4690 map &here = get_map();
4691
4692 if( choice == 20 ) {
4693 // Selection: Attach electrical cable to Cable Charger System CBM.
4694 if( it.has_no_links() ) {
4695 it.link().target = link_state::bio_cable;
4696 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You attach the cable to your Cable Charger System." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You attach the cable to your Cable Charger System."
) ) ) );
4697 } else if( it.link().source == link_state::ups ) {
4698 it.link().target = link_state::bio_cable;
4699 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You are now plugged into the UPS." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You are now plugged into the UPS."
) ) ) );
4700 } else if( it.link().source == link_state::solarpack ) {
4701 it.link().target = link_state::bio_cable;
4702 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You are now plugged into the solar backpack." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You are now plugged into the solar backpack."
) ) ) );
4703 } else if( it.link().target == link_state::vehicle_port ||
4704 it.link().target == link_state::vehicle_battery ) {
4705 it.link().source = link_state::bio_cable;
4706 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You are now plugged into the vehicle." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You are now plugged into the vehicle."
) ) ) );
4707 }
4708
4709 it.update_link_traits();
4710 it.process( here, p, p->pos() );
4711 p->moves -= move_cost;
4712 return 0;
4713
4714 } else if( choice == 21 ) {
4715 // Selection: Attach electrical cable to ups.
4716 item_location loc;
4717 avatar *you = p->as_avatar();
4718 const std::string choose_ups = _( "Choose UPS:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Choose UPS:" ) ) );
4719 const std::string dont_have_ups = _( "You need an active UPS." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You need an active UPS." ) )
);
4720 auto ups_filter = [&]( const item & itm ) {
4721 return itm.has_flag( flag_IS_UPS );
4722 };
4723
4724 if( you != nullptr ) {
4725 loc = game_menus::inv::titled_filter_menu( ups_filter, *you, choose_ups, -1, dont_have_ups );
4726 }
4727 if( !loc ) {
4728 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "Never mind." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Never mind." ) ) ) );
4729 return std::nullopt;
4730 }
4731
4732 if( it.has_no_links() ) {
4733 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You attach the cable to the UPS." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You attach the cable to the UPS."
) ) ) );
4734 } else if( it.link().target == link_state::bio_cable ) {
4735 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You are now plugged into the UPS." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You are now plugged into the UPS."
) ) ) );
4736 } else if( it.link().source == link_state::solarpack ) {
4737 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You link up the UPS and the solar backpack." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You link up the UPS and the solar backpack."
) ) ) );
4738 } else if( it.link().target == link_state::vehicle_port ||
4739 it.link().target == link_state::vehicle_battery ) {
4740 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You link up the UPS and the vehicle." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You link up the UPS and the vehicle."
) ) ) );
4741 }
4742
4743 it.link().source = link_state::ups;
4744 loc->set_var( "cable", "plugged_in" );
4745 it.update_link_traits();
4746 it.process( here, p, p->pos() );
4747 p->moves -= move_cost;
4748 return 0;
4749
4750 } else if( choice == 22 ) {
4751 // Selection: Attach electrical cable to solar pack.
4752 item_location loc;
4753 avatar *you = p->as_avatar();
4754 const std::string choose_solar = _( "Choose solar pack:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Choose solar pack:" ) ) );
4755 const std::string dont_have_solar = _( "You need an unfolded solar pack." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You need an unfolded solar pack."
) ) );
4756 auto solar_filter = [&]( const item & itm ) {
4757 return itm.has_flag( flag_SOLARPACK_ON );
4758 };
4759
4760 if( you != nullptr ) {
4761 loc = game_menus::inv::titled_filter_menu( solar_filter, *you, choose_solar, -1, dont_have_solar );
4762 }
4763 if( !loc ) {
4764 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "Never mind." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Never mind." ) ) ) );
4765 return std::nullopt;
4766 }
4767
4768 if( it.has_no_links() ) {
4769 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You attach the cable to the solar pack." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You attach the cable to the solar pack."
) ) ) );
4770 } else if( it.link().target == link_state::bio_cable ) {
4771 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You are now plugged into the solar pack." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You are now plugged into the solar pack."
) ) ) );
4772 } else if( it.link().source == link_state::ups ) {
4773 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You link up the solar pack and the UPS." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You link up the solar pack and the UPS."
) ) ) );
4774 } else if( it.link().target == link_state::vehicle_port ||
4775 it.link().target == link_state::vehicle_battery ) {
4776 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You link up the solar pack and the vehicle." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You link up the solar pack and the vehicle."
) ) ) );
4777 }
4778
4779 it.link().source = link_state::solarpack;
4780 loc->set_var( "cable", "plugged_in" );
4781 it.update_link_traits();
4782 it.process( here, p, p->pos() );
4783 p->moves -= move_cost;
4784 return 0;
4785 }
4786 return std::nullopt;
4787}
4788
4789std::optional<int> link_up_actor::link_to_veh_app( Character *p, item &it,
4790 const bool to_ports ) const
4791{
4792 map &here = get_map();
4793 // Selection: Attach electrical cable to vehicle ports / appliances, OR vehicle batteries.
4794
4795 const auto can_link = [&here, &to_ports]( const tripoint & point ) {
4796 const optional_vpart_position ovp = here.veh_at( point );
4797 return ovp && ovp->vehicle().avail_linkable_part( ovp->mount(), to_ports ) != -1;
4798 };
4799 const std::optional<tripoint> pnt_ = choose_adjacent_highlight( _( "Attach the cable where?" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Attach the cable where?" ) )
),
4800 "", can_link, false, false );
4801 if( !pnt_ ) {
4802 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "Never mind." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Never mind." ) ) ) );
4803 return std::nullopt;
4804 }
4805 const tripoint &selection = *pnt_;
4806 const optional_vpart_position sel_vp = here.veh_at( selection );
4807 if( !sel_vp ) {
4808 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "There's no vehicle there." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "There's no vehicle there." )
) ) );
4809 return std::nullopt;
4810 }
4811
4812 // You used to be able to plug cables in anywhere on a vehicle, so there's extra effort here
4813 // to inform players that they can only plug them into dashboards or electrical controls now.
4814 if( !can_link( selection ) ) {
4815 if( to_ports && sel_vp && sel_vp->vehicle().has_part( "CABLE_PORTS" ) ) {
4816 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info,
4817 _( "You can't attach it there - try the dashboard or electronics controls." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You can't attach it there - try the dashboard or electronics controls."
) ) ) );
4818 } else if( !to_ports && sel_vp && !sel_vp->vehicle().batteries.empty() ) {
4819 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info,
4820 _( "You can't attach it there - try the battery." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You can't attach it there - try the battery."
) ) ) );
4821 } else {
4822 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You can't attach it there." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You can't attach it there." )
) ) );
4823 }
4824 return std::nullopt;
4825 }
4826
4827 if( !it.link_has_state( link_state::vehicle_port ) &&
4828 !it.link_has_state( link_state::vehicle_battery ) ) {
4829
4830 // Starting a new connection to a vehicle or connecting a cable CBM to a vehicle.
4831 bool had_bio_link = it.link_has_state( link_state::bio_cable );
4832 ret_val<void> result = it.link_to( sel_vp, to_ports ? link_state::vehicle_port :
4833 link_state::vehicle_battery );
4834 if( !result.success() ) {
4835 p->add_msg_if_player( m_bad, result.str() );
4836 return 0;
4837 }
4838
4839 // Get the part name for the connection message, using the vehicle name as a fallback.
4840 const int part_index = sel_vp->vehicle().avail_linkable_part( sel_vp->mount(), to_ports );
4841 const std::string sel_vp_name = part_index == -1 ? sel_vp->vehicle().name :
4842 sel_vp->vehicle().part( part_index ).name( false );
4843
4844 if( had_bio_link ) {
4845 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You are now plugged into the %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
