get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You are now plugged into the %s."
) ) ), sel_vp_name );
4846 it.link().source = link_state::bio_cable;
4847 } else {
4848 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You connect the %1$s to the %2$s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You connect the %1$s to the %2$s."
) ) ), it.type_name(), sel_vp_name );
4849 }
4850
4851 it.process( here, p, p->pos() );
4852 p->moves -= move_cost;
4853 return 0;
4854
4855 } else {
4856
4857 // Connecting two vehicles together.
4858 ret_val<void> result = it.link_to( sel_vp, to_ports ? link_state::vehicle_port :
4859 link_state::vehicle_battery );
4860 if( !result.success() ) {
4861 p->add_msg_if_player( m_bad, result.str() );
4862 return 0;
4863 }
4864 if( p->has_item( it ) ) {
4865 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, result.str() );
4866 }
4867
4868 if( it.typeId() != itype_power_cord ) {
4869 // Remove linked_flag from attached parts - the just-added cable vehicle parts do the same thing.
4870 it.reset_link( true, p );
4871 }
4872 p->moves -= move_cost;
4873 return 1; // Let the cable be destroyed.
4874 }
4875}
4876
4877std::optional<int> link_up_actor::link_tow_cable( Character *p, item &it,
4878 const bool to_towing ) const
4879{
4880 map &here = get_map();
4881
4882 const auto can_link = [&here]( const tripoint & point ) {
4883 const optional_vpart_position ovp = here.veh_at( point );
4884 return ovp && ovp->vehicle().is_external_part( point );
4885 };
4886
4887 const std::optional<tripoint> pnt_ = choose_adjacent_highlight(
4888 to_towing ? _( "Attach cable to the vehicle that will do the towing." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Attach cable to the vehicle that will do the towing."
) ) ) :
4889 _( "Attach cable to the vehicle that will be towed." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Attach cable to the vehicle that will be towed."
) ) ), "", can_link, false, false );
4890 if( !pnt_ ) {
4891 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "Never mind." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Never mind." ) ) ) );
4892 return std::nullopt;
4893 }
4894 const tripoint &selection = *pnt_;
4895 const optional_vpart_position sel_vp = here.veh_at( selection );
4896 if( !sel_vp ) {
4897 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "There's no vehicle there." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "There's no vehicle there." )
) ) );
4898 return std::nullopt;
4899 }
4900
4901 if( it.has_no_links() ) {
4902
4903 // Starting a new tow cable connection.
4904 ret_val<void> result = it.link_to( sel_vp, link_state::vehicle_tow );
4905 if( !result.success() ) {
4906 p->add_msg_if_player( m_bad, result.str() );
4907 return 0;
4908 }
4909 if( to_towing ) {
4910 it.link().source = link_state::vehicle_tow;
4911 it.link().target = link_state::no_link;
4912 } else {
4913 it.link().source = link_state::no_link;
4914 it.link().target = link_state::vehicle_tow;
4915 }
4916
4917 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You connect the %1$s to the %2$s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You connect the %1$s to the %2$s."
) ) ), it.type_name(),
4918 sel_vp->vehicle().name );
4919
4920 it.process( here, p, p->pos() );
4921 p->moves -= move_cost;
4922 return 0;
4923
4924 } else {
4925
4926 // Connecting two vehicles with tow cable.
4927 ret_val<void> result = it.link_to( sel_vp, link_state::vehicle_tow );
4928 if( !result.success() ) {
4929 p->add_msg_if_player( m_bad, result.str() );
4930 return 0;
4931 }
4932 if( p->has_item( it ) ) {
4933 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, result.str() );
4934 }
4935
4936 p->moves -= move_cost;
4937 return 1; // Let the cable be destroyed.
4938 }
4939}
4940
4941std::optional<int> link_up_actor::link_extend_cable( Character *p, item &it,
4942 const tripoint &pnt ) const
4943{
4944 avatar *you = p->as_avatar();
4945 if( !you ) {
4946 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "Never mind." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Never mind." ) ) ) );
4947 return std::nullopt;
4948 }
4949
4950 const bool is_cable_item = it.has_flag( flag_CABLE_SPOOL );
4951 item_location selected;
4952 if( is_cable_item ) {
4953 const bool can_extend_devices = can_extend.find( "ELECTRICAL_DEVICES" ) != can_extend.end();
4954 const auto filter = [this, &it, &can_extend_devices]( const item & inv ) {
4955 if( !inv.can_link_up() || inv.link_has_state( link_state::needs_reeling ) ||
4956 ( !inv.has_flag( flag_CABLE_SPOOL ) && !can_extend_devices ) ) {
4957 return false;
4958 }
4959 return can_extend.find( inv.typeId().c_str() ) != can_extend.end() && &inv != &it;
4960 };
4961 selected = game_menus::inv::titled_filter_menu( filter, *you, _( "Extend which cable?" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Extend which cable?" ) ) ), -1,
4962 _( "You don't have a compatible cable." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You don't have a compatible cable."
) ) ) );
4963 } else {
4964 const auto filter = []( const item & inv ) {
4965 if( !inv.can_link_up() || inv.link_has_state( link_state::needs_reeling ) ||
4966 !inv.has_flag( flag_CABLE_SPOOL ) ) {
4967 return false;
4968 }
4969 const link_up_actor *actor = static_cast<const link_up_actor *>
4970 ( inv.get_use( "link_up" )->get_actor_ptr() );
4971 return actor->can_extend.find( "ELECTRICAL_DEVICES" ) != actor->can_extend.end();
4972 };
4973 selected = game_menus::inv::titled_filter_menu( filter, *you, _( "Extend with which cable?" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Extend with which cable?" ) )
), -1,
4974 _( "You don't have a compatible cable." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You don't have a compatible cable."
) ) ) );
4975 }
4976 if( !selected ) {
4977 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "Never mind." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Never mind." ) ) ) );
4978 return std::nullopt;
4979 }
4980
4981 item_location extension = is_cable_item ? form_loc( *p, pnt, it ) : selected;
4982 item_location extended = is_cable_item ? selected : form_loc( *p, pnt, it );
4983 std::optional<item> extended_copy;
4984
4985 // We'll make a copy of the extended item and check pocket weight/volume capacity if:
4986 // 1. The extended item is in a container,
4987 // 2. The extended item and extension cord(s) aren't in the same pocket, and
4988 // 3. The extended item is in a pocket without enough remaining room for the extension cord(s).
4989 if( extended.where() == item_location::type::container &&
4990 extended.parent_pocket() != extension.parent_pocket() &&
4991 ( extended.volume_capacity() - extension->volume() < 0_ml ||
4992 extended.weight_capacity() - extension->weight() < 0_gram ) ) {
4993
4994 extended_copy = *extended;
4995 }
4996
4997 item *extended_ptr = extended_copy ? &extended_copy.value() : &*extended;
4998
4999 // Put the extension cable and all of its attached cables, if any, into the extended item's CABLE pocket.
5000 std::vector<const item *> all_cables = extension->cables();
5001 all_cables.emplace_back( &*extension );
5002 for( const item *cable : all_cables ) {
5003 item cable_copy( *cable );
5004 cable_copy.get_contents().clear_items();
5005 cable_copy.reset_link();
5006 if( !extended_ptr->put_in( cable_copy, pocket_type::CABLE ).success() ) {
5007 debugmsg( "Failed to put %s inside %s!", cable_copy.type_name(), extended_ptr->type_name() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/iuse_actor.cpp"
, "5007", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Failed to put %s inside %s!",
cable_copy.type_name(), extended_ptr->type_name());
5008 }
5009 }
5010 if( extension->has_link_data() ) {
5011 extended_ptr->link() = extension->link();
5012 }
5013 extended_ptr->update_link_traits();
5014 extended_ptr->process( get_map(), p, p->pos() );
5015
5016 if( extended_copy ) {
5017 // Check if there's another pocket on the same container that can hold the extended item, respecting pocket settings.
5018 item_location parent = extended.parent_item();
5019 if( parent->can_contain( *extended_ptr, false, false, false,
5020 item_location(), 10000000_ml, false ).success() ) {
5021 if( !parent->put_in( *extended_ptr, pocket_type::CONTAINER ).success() ) {
5022 debugmsg( "Failed to put %s inside %s!", extended_ptr->type_name(),realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/iuse_actor.cpp"
, "5023", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Failed to put %s inside %s!",
extended_ptr->type_name(), parent->type_name())
5023 parent->type_name() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/iuse_actor.cpp"
, "5023", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Failed to put %s inside %s!",
extended_ptr->type_name(), parent->type_name());
5024 return std::nullopt;
5025 }
5026 } else {
5027 if( !query_yn( _( "The %1$s can't contain the %2$s with the %3$s attached. Continue?" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "The %1$s can't contain the %2$s with the %3$s attached. Continue?"
) ) ),
5028 parent->type_name(), extended_ptr->type_name(), extension->type_name() ) ) {
5029 return std::nullopt;
5030 }
5031 // Attach the cord, even though it won't fit, and let it spill out naturally.
5032 extended.parent_pocket()->add( *extended_ptr );
5033 }
5034 extended.make_active();
5035 extended.remove_item();
5036 }
5037
5038 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You extend the %1$s with the %2$s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You extend the %1$s with the %2$s."
) ) ),
5039 extended_ptr->link_name(), extension->type_name() );
5040 extension.remove_item();
5041 p->invalidate_inventory_validity_cache();
5042 p->drop_invalid_inventory();
5043 p->moves -= move_cost;
5044 return 0;
5045}
5046
5047std::optional<int> link_up_actor::remove_extensions( Character *p, item &it ) const
5048{
5049 std::list<item *> all_cables = it.all_items_ptr( pocket_type::CABLE );
5050 all_cables.remove_if( []( const item * cable ) {
5051 return !cable->has_flag( flag_CABLE_SPOOL ) || !cable->can_link_up();
5052 } );
5053
5054 if( all_cables.empty() ) {
5055 // Delete any non-cables that somehow got into the pocket.
5056 it.get_contents().clear_pockets_if( []( item_pocket const & pocket ) {
5057 return pocket.is_type( pocket_type::CABLE );
5058 } );
5059 return 0;
5060 }
5061
5062 item cable_main_copy( *all_cables.back() );
5063 all_cables.pop_back();
5064 if( !all_cables.empty() ) {
5065 for( item *cable : all_cables ) {
5066 item cable_copy( *cable );
5067 cable_copy.get_contents().clear_items();
5068 cable_copy.reset_link();
5069 if( !cable_main_copy.put_in( cable_copy, pocket_type::CABLE ).success() ) {
5070 debugmsg( "Failed to put %s inside %s!", cable_copy.tname(), cable_main_copy.tname() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/iuse_actor.cpp"
, "5070", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Failed to put %s inside %s!",
cable_copy.tname(), cable_main_copy.tname());
5071 }
5072 }
5073 }
5074 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You disconnect the %1$s from the %2$s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You disconnect the %1$s from the %2$s."
) ) ),
5075 cable_main_copy.type_name(), it.type_name() );
5076
5077 it.get_contents().clear_pockets_if( []( item_pocket const & pocket ) {
5078 return pocket.is_type( pocket_type::CABLE );
5079 } );
5080
5081 if( it.has_link_data() ) {
5082 // If the item was linked, keep the extension cables linked.
5083 cable_main_copy.link() = it.link();
5084 cable_main_copy.update_link_traits();
5085 cable_main_copy.process( get_map(), p, p->pos() );
5086 it.reset_link( true, p );
5087 }
5088
5089 p->i_add_or_drop( cable_main_copy );
5090 p->moves -= move_cost;
5091 return 0;
5092}
5093
5094std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> deploy_tent_actor::clone() const
5095{
5096 return std::make_unique<deploy_tent_actor>( *this );
5097}
5098
5099void deploy_tent_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
5100{
5101 assign( obj, "radius", radius );
5102 assign( obj, "wall", wall );
5103 assign( obj, "floor", floor );
5104 assign( obj, "floor_center", floor_center );
5105 assign( obj, "door_opened", door_opened );
5106 assign( obj, "door_closed", door_closed );
5107 assign( obj, "broken_type", broken_type );
5108}
5109
5110std::optional<int> deploy_tent_actor::use( Character *p, item &it, const tripoint & ) const
5111{
5112 int diam = 2 * radius + 1;
5113 if( p->cant_do_mounted() ) {
5114 return std::nullopt;
5115 }
5116 const std::optional<tripoint> dir = choose_direction( string_format(
5117 _( "Put up the %s where (%dx%d clear area)?" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Put up the %s where (%dx%d clear area)?"
) ) ), it.tname(), diam, diam ) );
5118 if( !dir ) {
5119 return std::nullopt;
5120 }
5121 const tripoint direction = *dir;
5122
5123 map &here = get_map();
5124 // We place the center of the structure (radius + 1)
5125 // spaces away from the player.
5126 // First check there's enough room.
5127 const tripoint center = p->pos() + tripoint( ( radius + 1 ) * direction.x,
5128 ( radius + 1 ) * direction.y, 0 );
5129 creature_tracker &creatures = get_creature_tracker();
5130 for( const tripoint &dest : here.points_in_radius( center, radius ) ) {
5131 if( const optional_vpart_position vp = here.veh_at( dest ) ) {
5132 add_msg( m_info, _( "The %s is in the way." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "The %s is in the way." ) ) ), vp->vehicle().name );
5133 return std::nullopt;
5134 }
5135 if( const Creature *const c = creatures.creature_at( dest ) ) {
5136 add_msg( m_info, _( "The %s is in the way." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "The %s is in the way." ) ) ), c->disp_name() );
5137 return std::nullopt;
5138 }
5139 if( here.impassable( dest ) || !here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_FLAT, dest ) ) {
5140 add_msg( m_info, _( "The %s in that direction isn't suitable for placing the %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "The %s in that direction isn't suitable for placing the %s."
) ) ),
5141 here.name( dest ), it.tname() );
5142 return std::nullopt;
5143 }
5144 if( here.has_furn( dest ) ) {
5145 add_msg( m_info, _( "There is already furniture (%s) there." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "There is already furniture (%s) there."
) ) ), here.furnname( dest ) );
5146 return std::nullopt;
5147 }
5148 }
5149
5150 //checks done start activity:
5151 tent_placement_activity_actor actor( to_moves<int>( 20_minutes ), direction, radius, it, wall,
5152 floor, floor_center, door_closed );
5153 get_player_character().assign_activity( actor );
5154 p->i_rem( &it );
5155 return 0;
5156}
5157
5158bool deploy_tent_actor::check_intact( const tripoint &center ) const
5159{
5160 map &here = get_map();
5161 for( const tripoint &dest : here.points_in_radius( center, radius ) ) {
5162 const furn_id fid = here.furn( dest );
5163 if( dest == center && floor_center ) {
5164 if( fid != *floor_center ) {
5165 return false;
5166 }
5167 } else if( square_dist( dest, center ) < radius ) {
5168 // So we are inside the tent
5169 if( fid != floor ) {
5170 return false;
5171 }
5172 } else {
5173 // We are on the border of the tent
5174 if( fid != wall && fid != door_opened && fid != door_closed ) {
5175 return false;
5176 }
5177 }
5178 }
5179 return true;
5180}
5181
5182void weigh_self_actor::info( const item &, std::vector<iteminfo> &dump ) const
5183{
5184 dump.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION",
5185 _( "Use this item to weigh yourself. Includes everything you are wearing." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Use this item to weigh yourself. Includes everything you are wearing."
) ) ) );
5186}
5187
5188std::optional<int> weigh_self_actor::use( Character *p, item &, const tripoint & ) const
5189{
5190 if( p->is_mounted() ) {
5191 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You cannot weigh yourself while mounted." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You cannot weigh yourself while mounted."
) ) ) );
5192 return std::nullopt;
5193 }
5194 // this is a weight, either in kgs or in lbs.
5195 double weight = convert_weight( p->get_weight() );
5196 if( weight > convert_weight( max_weight ) ) {
5197 popup( _( "ERROR: Max weight of %.0f %s exceeded" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "ERROR: Max weight of %.0f %s exceeded"
) ) ), convert_weight( max_weight ), weight_units() );
5198 } else {
5199 popup( "%.0f %s", weight, weight_units() );
5200 }
5201 return 0;
5202}
5203
5204void weigh_self_actor::load( const JsonObject &jo )
5205{
5206 assign( jo, "max_weight", max_weight );
5207}
5208
5209std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> weigh_self_actor::clone() const
5210{
5211 return std::make_unique<weigh_self_actor>( *this );
5212}
5213
5214void sew_advanced_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
5215{
5216 // Mandatory:
5217 for( const std::string line : obj.get_array( "materials" ) ) {
5218 materials.emplace( line );
5219 }
5220 for( const std::string line : obj.get_array( "clothing_mods" ) ) {
5221 clothing_mods.emplace_back( line );
5222 }
5223
5224 // TODO: Make skill non-mandatory while still erroring on invalid skill
5225 const std::string skill_string = obj.get_string( "skill" );
5226 used_skill = skill_id( skill_string );
5227 if( !used_skill.is_valid() ) {
5228 obj.throw_error_at( "skill", "Invalid skill" );
5229 }
5230}
5231
5232std::optional<int> sew_advanced_actor::use( Character *p, item &it, const tripoint & ) const
5233{
5234 if( p->is_npc() ) {
5235 return std::nullopt;
5236 }
5237 if( p->cant_do_mounted() ) {
5238 return std::nullopt;
5239 }
5240 if( p->cant_do_underwater() ) {
5241 return std::nullopt;
5242 }
5243
5244 if( p->fine_detail_vision_mod() > 4 ) {
5245 add_msg( m_info, _( "You can't see to sew!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You can't see to sew!" ) ) ) );
5246 return std::nullopt;
5247 }
5248
5249 auto filter = [this]( const item & itm ) {
5250 return itm.is_armor() && !itm.is_firearm() && !itm.is_power_armor() && !itm.is_gunmod() &&
5251 itm.made_of_any( materials ) && !itm.has_flag( flag_INTEGRATED );
5252 };
5253 // note: if !p.is_npc() then p is avatar.
5254 item_location loc = game_menus::inv::titled_filter_menu(
5255 filter, *p->as_avatar(), _( "Enhance which clothing?" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Enhance which clothing?" ) )
) );
5256 if( !loc ) {
5257 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You do not have that item!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You do not have that item!" )
) ) );
5258 return std::nullopt;
5259 }
5260 item &mod = *loc;
5261 if( &mod == &it ) {
5262 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info,
5263 _( "This can be used to repair or modify other items, not itself." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "This can be used to repair or modify other items, not itself."
) ) ) );
5264 return std::nullopt;
5265 }
5266
5267 // Gives us an item with the mod added or removed (toggled)
5268 const auto modded_copy = []( const item & proto, const flag_id & mod_type ) {
5269 item mcopy = proto;
5270 if( mcopy.has_own_flag( mod_type ) == 0 ) {
5271 mcopy.set_flag( mod_type );
5272 } else {
5273 mcopy.unset_flag( mod_type );
5274 }
5275
5276 return mcopy;
5277 };
5278
5279 // Cache available materials
5280 std::map< itype_id, bool > has_enough;
5281 const int items_needed = mod.base_volume() / 750_ml + 1;
5282 const inventory &crafting_inv = p->crafting_inventory();
5283 const std::function<bool( const item & )> is_filthy_filter = is_crafting_component;
5284
5285 // Go through all discovered repair items and see if we have any of them available
5286 for( const clothing_mod &cm : clothing_mods::get_all() ) {
5287 has_enough[cm.item_string] = crafting_inv.has_amount( cm.item_string, items_needed, false,
5288 is_filthy_filter );
5289 }
5290
5291 int mod_count = 0;
5292 for( const clothing_mod &cm : clothing_mods::get_all() ) {
5293 mod_count += mod.has_own_flag( cm.flag );
5294 }
5295
5296 // We need extra thread to lose it on bad rolls
5297 const int thread_needed = mod.base_volume() / 125_ml + 10;
5298
5299 const auto valid_mods = mod.find_armor_data()->valid_mods;
5300
5301 const auto get_compare_color = [&]( const float before, const float after,
5302 const bool higher_is_better ) {
5303 return before == after ? c_unsetget_all_colors().get(def_c_unset) : ( ( after > before ) == higher_is_better ? c_light_greenget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_green) :
5304 c_redget_all_colors().get(def_c_red) );
5305 };
5306
5307 uilist tmenu;
5308 tmenu.text = _( "How do you want to modify it?" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "How do you want to modify it?"
) ) );
5309
5310 int index = 0;
5311 for( const clothing_mod_id &cm : clothing_mods ) {
5312 clothing_mod obj = cm.obj();
5313 item temp_item = modded_copy( mod, obj.flag );
5314 temp_item.update_clothing_mod_val();
5315
5316 bool enab = false;
5317 std::string prompt;
5318 if( !mod.has_own_flag( obj.flag ) ) {
5319 // Mod not already present, check if modification is possible
5320 if( obj.restricted &&
5321 std::find( valid_mods.begin(), valid_mods.end(), obj.flag.str() ) == valid_mods.end() ) {
5322 //~ %1$s: modification desc, %2$s: mod name
5323 prompt = string_format( _( "Can't %1$s (incompatible with %2$s)" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Can't %1$s (incompatible with %2$s)"
) ) ),
5324 lowercase_first_letter( obj.implement_prompt.translated() ),
5325 mod.tname( 1, false ) );
5326 } else if( !it.ammo_sufficient( p, thread_needed ) ) {
5327 //~ %1$s: modification desc, %2$d: number of thread needed
5328 prompt = string_format( _( "Can't %1$s (need %2$d thread loaded)" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Can't %1$s (need %2$d thread loaded)"
) ) ),
5329 lowercase_first_letter( obj.implement_prompt.translated() ), thread_needed );
5330 } else if( !has_enough[obj.item_string] ) {
5331 //~ %1$s: modification desc, %2$d: number of items needed, %3$s: items needed
5332 prompt = string_format( _( "Can't %1$s (need %2$d %3$s)" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Can't %1$s (need %2$d %3$s)"
) ) ),
5333 lowercase_first_letter( obj.implement_prompt.translated() ),
5334 items_needed, item::nname( obj.item_string, items_needed ) );
5335 } else {
5336 // Modification is possible
5337 enab = true;
5338 //~ %1$s: modification desc, %2$d: number of items needed, %3$s: items needed, %4$s: number of thread needed
5339 prompt = string_format( _( "%1$s (%2$d %3$s and %4$d thread)" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%1$s (%2$d %3$s and %4$d thread)"
) ) ),
5340 lowercase_first_letter( obj.implement_prompt.translated() ),
5341 items_needed, item::nname( obj.item_string, items_needed ), thread_needed );
5342 }
5343
5344 } else {
5345 // Mod already present, give option to destroy
5346 enab = true;
5347 prompt = obj.destroy_prompt.translated();
5348 }
5349 std::string desc;
5350 // FIXME: Remove sew_advanced_actor, no longer used since before 0.G
5351 desc += colorize( string_format( "%s: %.2f->%.2f\n", _( "Bash" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Bash" ) ) ), mod.resist( damage_bash ),
5352 temp_item.resist( damage_bash ) ), get_compare_color( mod.resist( damage_bash ),
5353 temp_item.resist( damage_bash ), true ) );
5354 desc += colorize( string_format( "%s: %.2f->%.2f\n", _( "Cut" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Cut" ) ) ), mod.resist( damage_cut ),
5355 temp_item.resist( damage_cut ) ), get_compare_color( mod.resist( damage_cut ),
5356 temp_item.resist( damage_cut ), true ) );
5357 desc += colorize( string_format( "%s: %.2f->%.2f\n", _( "Ballistic" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Ballistic" ) ) ),
5358 mod.resist( damage_bullet ),
5359 temp_item.resist( damage_bullet ) ), get_compare_color( mod.resist( damage_bullet ),
5360 temp_item.resist( damage_bullet ),
5361 true ) );
5362 desc += colorize( string_format( "%s: %.2f->%.2f\n", _( "Acid" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Acid" ) ) ), mod.resist( damage_acid ),
5363 temp_item.resist( damage_acid ) ), get_compare_color( mod.resist( damage_acid ),
5364 temp_item.resist( damage_acid ), true ) );
5365 desc += colorize( string_format( "%s: %.2f->%.2f\n", _( "Fire" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Fire" ) ) ), mod.resist( damage_heat ),
5366 temp_item.resist( damage_heat ) ), get_compare_color( mod.resist( damage_heat ),
5367 temp_item.resist( damage_heat ), true ) );
5368 desc += colorize( string_format( "%s: %d->%d\n", _( "Warmth" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Warmth" ) ) ), mod.get_warmth(),
5369 temp_item.get_warmth() ), get_compare_color( mod.get_warmth(), temp_item.get_warmth(), true ) );
5370 desc += colorize( string_format( "%s: %d->%d\n", _( "Encumbrance" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Encumbrance" ) ) ), mod.get_avg_encumber( *p ),
5371 temp_item.get_avg_encumber( *p ) ), get_compare_color( mod.get_avg_encumber( *p ),
5372 temp_item.get_avg_encumber( *p ), false ) );
5373
5374 tmenu.addentry_desc( index++, enab, MENU_AUTOASSIGN, prompt, desc );
5375 }
5376 tmenu.textwidth = 80;
5377 tmenu.desc_enabled = true;
5378 tmenu.query();
5379 const int choice = tmenu.ret;
5380
5381 if( choice < 0 || choice >= static_cast<int>( clothing_mods.size() ) ) {
5382 return std::nullopt;
5383 }
5384
5385 // The mod player picked
5386 const flag_id &the_mod = clothing_mods[choice].obj().flag;
5387
5388 // If the picked mod already exists, player wants to destroy it
5389 if( mod.has_own_flag( the_mod ) ) {
5390 if( query_yn( _( "Are you sure? You will not gain any materials back." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Are you sure? You will not gain any materials back."
) ) ) ) ) {
5391 mod.unset_flag( the_mod );
5392 }
5393 mod.update_clothing_mod_val();
5394
5395 return 0;
5396 }
5397
5398 // Get the id of the material used
5399 const itype_id &repair_item = clothing_mods[choice].obj().item_string;
5400
5401 std::vector<item_comp> comps;
5402 comps.emplace_back( repair_item, items_needed );
5403 p->moves -= to_moves<int>( 30_seconds * p->fine_detail_vision_mod() );
5404 p->practice( used_skill, items_needed * 3 + 3 );
5405 /** @EFFECT_TAILOR randomly improves clothing modification efforts */
5406 int rn = dice( 3, 2 + round( p->get_skill_level( used_skill ) ) ); // Skill
5407 /** @EFFECT_DEX randomly improves clothing modification efforts */
5408 rn += rng( 0, p->dex_cur / 2 ); // Dexterity
5409 /** @EFFECT_PER randomly improves clothing modification efforts */
5410 rn += rng( 0, p->per_cur / 2 ); // Perception
5411 rn -= mod_count * 10; // Other mods
5412
5413 if( rn <= 8 ) {
5414 const std::string startdurability = mod.durability_indicator( true );
5415 const bool destroyed = mod.inc_damage();
5416 const std::string resultdurability = mod.durability_indicator( true );
5417 p->add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "You damage your %s trying to modify it! ( %s-> %s)" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You damage your %s trying to modify it! ( %s-> %s)"
) ) ),
5418 mod.tname( 1, false ), startdurability, resultdurability );
5419 if( destroyed ) {
5420 p->add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "You destroy it!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You destroy it!" ) ) ) );
5421 p->i_rem_keep_contents( &mod );
5422 p->calc_encumbrance();
5423 p->calc_discomfort();
5424 }
5425 return thread_needed / 2;
5426 } else if( rn <= 10 ) {
5427 p->add_msg_if_player( m_bad,
5428 _( "You fail to modify the clothing, and you waste thread and materials." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You fail to modify the clothing, and you waste thread and materials."
) ) ) );
5429 p->consume_items( comps, 1, is_crafting_component );
5430 return thread_needed;
5431 } else if( rn <= 14 ) {
5432 p->add_msg_if_player( m_mixed, _( "You modify your %s, but waste a lot of thread." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You modify your %s, but waste a lot of thread."
) ) ),
5433 mod.tname() );
5434 p->consume_items( comps, 1, is_crafting_component );
5435 mod.set_flag( the_mod );
5436 mod.update_clothing_mod_val();
5437 p->calc_encumbrance();
5438 p->calc_discomfort();
5439 return thread_needed;
5440 }
5441
5442 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You modify your %s!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You modify your %s!" ) ) ), mod.tname() );
5443 mod.set_flag( the_mod );
5444 mod.update_clothing_mod_val();
5445 p->consume_items( comps, 1, is_crafting_component );
5446 p->calc_encumbrance();
5447 p->calc_discomfort();
5448 return thread_needed / 2;
5449}
5450
5451std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> sew_advanced_actor::clone() const
5452{
5453 return std::make_unique<sew_advanced_actor>( *this );
5454}
5455
5456void change_scent_iuse::load( const JsonObject &obj )
5457{
5458 scenttypeid = scenttype_id( obj.get_string( "scent_typeid" ) );
5459 if( !scenttypeid.is_valid() ) {
5460 obj.throw_error_at( "scent_typeid", "Invalid scent type id." );
5461 }
5462 if( obj.has_array( "effects" ) ) {
5463 for( JsonObject e : obj.get_array( "effects" ) ) {
5464 effects.push_back( load_effect_data( e ) );
5465 }
5466 }
5467 assign( obj, "moves", moves );
5468 assign( obj, "charges_to_use", charges_to_use );
5469 assign( obj, "scent_mod", scent_mod );
5470 assign( obj, "duration", duration );
5471 assign( obj, "waterproof", waterproof );
5472}
5473
5474std::optional<int> change_scent_iuse::use( Character *p, item &it, const tripoint & ) const
5475{
5476 p->set_value( "prev_scent", p->get_type_of_scent().c_str() );
5477 if( waterproof ) {
5478 p->set_value( "waterproof_scent", "true" );
5479 }
5480 p->add_effect( effect_masked_scent, duration, false, scent_mod );
5481 p->set_type_of_scent( scenttypeid );
5482 p->mod_moves( -moves );
5483 add_msg( m_info, _( "You use the %s to mask your scent" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You use the %s to mask your scent"
) ) ), it.tname() );
5484
5485 // Apply the various effects.
5486 for( const effect_data &eff : effects ) {
5487 p->add_effect( eff.id, eff.duration, eff.bp, eff.permanent );
5488 }
5489 return charges_to_use;
5490}
5491
5492std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> change_scent_iuse::clone() const
5493{
5494 return std::make_unique<change_scent_iuse>( *this );
5495}
5496
5497std::unique_ptr<iuse_actor> effect_on_conditons_actor::clone() const
5498{
5499 return std::make_unique<effect_on_conditons_actor>( *this );
5500}
5501
5502void effect_on_conditons_actor::load( const JsonObject &obj )
5503{
5504 obj.read( "description", description );
5505 obj.read( "menu_text", menu_text );
5506 for( JsonValue jv : obj.get_array( "effect_on_conditions" ) ) {
5507 eocs.emplace_back( effect_on_conditions::load_inline_eoc( jv, "" ) );
5508 }
5509}
5510
5511std::string effect_on_conditons_actor::get_name() const
5512{
5513 if( !menu_text.empty() ) {
5514 return menu_text.translated();
5515 }
5516 return iuse_actor::get_name();
5517}
5518
5519void effect_on_conditons_actor::info( const item &, std::vector<iteminfo> &dump ) const
5520{
5521 dump.emplace_back( "DESCRIPTION", description.translated() );
5522}
5523
5524std::optional<int> effect_on_conditons_actor::use( Character *p, item &it,
5525 const tripoint & ) const
5526{
5527 if( !p ) {
5528 debugmsg( "%s called action effect_on_conditons that requires character but no character is present",realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/iuse_actor.cpp"
, "5529", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "%s called action effect_on_conditons that requires character but no character is present"
, it.typeId().str())
5529 it.typeId().str() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/iuse_actor.cpp"
, "5529", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "%s called action effect_on_conditons that requires character but no character is present"
, it.typeId().str());
5530 return std::nullopt;
5531 }
5532
5533 Character *char_ptr = nullptr;
5534 if( avatar *u = p->as_avatar() ) {
5535 char_ptr = u;
5536 } else if( npc *n = p->as_npc() ) {
5537 char_ptr = n;
5538 }
5539
5540 item_location loc( *p->as_character(), &it );
5541 dialogue d( get_talker_for( char_ptr ), get_talker_for( loc ) );
5542 write_var_value( var_type::context, "npctalk_var_id", nullptr, &d, it.typeId().str() );
5543 for( const effect_on_condition_id &eoc : eocs ) {
5544 if( eoc->type == eoc_type::ACTIVATION ) {
5545 eoc->activate( d );
5546 } else {
5547 debugmsg( "Must use an activation eoc for activation. If you don't want the effect_on_condition to happen on its own (without the item's involvement), remove the recurrence min and max. Otherwise, create a non-recurring effect_on_condition for this item with its condition and effects, then have a recurring one queue it." )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/iuse_actor.cpp"
, "5547", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Must use an activation eoc for activation. If you don't want the effect_on_condition to happen on its own (without the item's involvement), remove the recurrence min and max. Otherwise, create a non-recurring effect_on_condition for this item with its condition and effects, then have a recurring one queue it."
);
5548 }
5549 }
5550 // Prevents crash from trying to spend charge with item removed
5551 if( !p->has_item( it ) ) {
5552 return 0;
5553 }
5554 return 1;
5555}
